loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is a 51-year-old married lady with two children. She sells charcoal in the Majengo Mapya area in Malindi and has been in this business for the past five years now. She earns a monthly income of about 5,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) from her business and usually uses the money to assist her husband in taking care of their family and educating their children.

Regina has asked for a loan of KES 35,000 from KADET LTD. This is her fourth loan from the company. She intends to use her loan to purchase additional sacks of charcoal and put up a strong wooden structure for her business, with a view to being able to serve her ever growing numbers of customers in the area. No one else has the same kind of business in the region. She plans to use the anticipated profits to add to her stock.

In the future she hopes to open a water selling point in the town.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal and put up a wooden structure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a wooden structure to serve as a business premise and to add stock into the business.

loans.name: Maravilla Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Maravilla, inicia su ciclo 6 con 14 socios los cuales se dedican a la venta de ropa por pedidos, cosméticos por catálogos, celulares, desayunos, venta de comida.  
Vanesa, es soltera, tiene 30 años, es la Presidenta del banco para éste ciclo, se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir, para damas caballeros y niños, cubrecamas, sabanas, etc, por pedidos. Está en FINCA Perú con éste el segundo ciclo, ingreso por iniciativa propia, le gusta por la facilidad de los préstamos, le prestan a base de confianza. Está ahorrando para tener más capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
The “Maravilla” communal bank starts its 6th cycle with 14 members who sell clothes on order, cosmetics via catalogue, cell phones, breakfasts and food.

Vanesa, 30, is single and bank President for this cycle.  She sells clothes for women, men and children, bedspreads, sheets, etc. on order.  This is her second cycle with FINCA Perú.  She joined on her own initiative and likes it because of the ease of the loans which are lent based on trust.  She is saving up to have more working capital.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 41 años, es feriante, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, huevo, harina, entre otros.
Rosa viaja la feria de San pedro de Cachi, donde vende abarrotes en general, verduras y frutas, ahí compra cereales y los vende en la Feria del Mercado las Americas los días domingos. Compra queso y panes chapla y los lleva a Lima cada 15 días y le va muy bien. 
Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal en FINCA Perú, por la facilidad de los préstamos y  les enseñan a ahorrar. Con sus ahorros puedo comprarse un mototaxi, ahora está ahorrando para comprarse otro mototaxi para su hijo.
texts.en:
Rosa, 41, is a member of the “Tarpuy” communal bank.  She’s a vendor.  She is asking for the loan to buy groceries like: rice, sugar, noodles, eggs and flour, among others.

Rosa goes to the farmers marked in San Pedro de Cachi to sell groceries in general, fruit and vegetables.  She buys cereals there which she then sells at the Sunday Las Americas Farmers Market.  She buys cheese and “chapla” (artisanal bread baked with eucalyptus) bread that she takes to Lima every two weeks to sell; she does very well.

She enjoys the communal bank meetings in FINCA Perú because of the ease of the loans and because they teach her how to save.  She was able to use her savings to buy a mototaxi and she’s saving to buy another one for her son.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, eggs and flour, among others.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.en:
Jonathan is 40 years old and married, with six children. He has been operating his charcoal business in Marereni town in Malindi for the past five years. He earns a monthly income of about KES 10,000, which he uses to take care of his family. 

He has been loaned KES 10,000 by KADET Ltd. This is his first loan from KADET. He intends to use his loan to purchase more sacks of charcoal and to repair the business premise. 

He plans to use the profit from his business to continue taking care of his family and educating his children as well as to save some of the money.

In the future, he hopes to buy a motorcycle to be used for light transport in Marereni town.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal and to repair the business premise.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys, es socia de Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 29 años, es soltera y un hijo de 13 años. Tiene cabinas de Internet. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de monitores planos para su negocio.
Gladys tiene una tienda de Cabinas de Internet en la casa de sus padres, comenzó con éste negocio hace tres años, decidió abrir este negocio porque antes ya habia trabajado en este rubro, aprovecho que en su cuadra no habia éste servicio y poco a poco lo fue implementando, ahora en sus cabinas también hay un locutorio telefonico, tambien vende gaseosas y golosinas. Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal en FINCA Perú, por la facilidad a los créditos y las capacitaciones que reciben por parte de sus promotora que le enseñan a trabajar. Ahora está ahorrando para comprarse un terreno.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the “Tarpuy” communal bank.  She’s 29 years old, single and has a 13-year-old son.  She has Internet access booths.  She is asking for the loan to buy flat screen monitors for her business.

Gladys has Internet access booths installed in her parents’ house.  She started the business three years ago.   She decided to open it because she had worked in this occupation previously and took advantage of the fact that this service was unavailable on her block.  She gradually equipped it.  Now, she also has a phone booth there and she sells soft drinks and snacks.

She enjoys the meetings of her communal bank in FINCA Perú because of the ease of the loans and the trainings they get from their advisor that teach them how to work.  Currently, she’s saving up to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: to buy flat screen monitors.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia, es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 65 años, es viuda y tiene 7 hijos. Julia tiene una panadería, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. harina, levadura y azúcar.
Julia ésta con el negocio D. la panadería hace 32 años, elabora todo tipo D. panes. Ingresó a FINCA Perú por la invitación D. su hija. Le gusta por la facilidad con la que acceD. a los créditos, se trabaja  a base D. confianza. Con sus ahorros puedo hacer mantenimiento D. su casa y otra parte en su capital D. trabajo. Ahora está ahorrando para la educación superior D. su hijo.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the communal bank "Tarpuy". She is 65 years old, a widow, and she has 7 children. Julia has a bakery. The loan which she requests will be invested in the purchase of flour, yeast, and sugar. 

Julia has had her bakery business for the past 32 years. She bakes all types of breads. She joined Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) following an invitation from her daughter. She appreciates the easy loan access based on trustworthiness. With her savings she will be able to make home improvements and a part will be used as working capital. She is now saving for her son's post-secondary education.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, and sugar

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 42 años, es conviviente y tiene dos hijos de 23 y 19 años, tiene una plastiquería y venta de descartables. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de descartables para surtir su tienda. Ingreso a FINCA Perú, por la invitación de su sobrina. Le gusta por la facilidad de los créditos y de la capacitaciones que reciben les enseñan a invertir su dinero. Su sueño es poder abrir una distribuidora en descartables y que sus hijos sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en: Gloria is a member of the communal bank "Tarpuy". She is 42 years old, married common-law, and she has two children, aged 23 and 19. She has a plastics and disposable products store. The loan which she requests will be invested in the purchase of disposable items to stock her store. She joined Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) following an invitation by her niece. She appreciates the easy loan process and the training sessions they receive on investing their money. Her dream is to start a distribution company of disposable products and for her children grow up to have successful careers.

loans.use: to purchase disposable products for resale.

loans.name: Lucy Isabel

texts.es:
Lucy, es socia del Banco Comunal Buena Suerte, tiene 59 años, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos. Se dedica al tejido de chompas, ropones y venta de ropa por pedidos, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de hilos y prendas de vestir.
Está en FINCA Perú, hace muchos años, ingresó por la invitación de su hermana, le gusta por la accesibilidad a los créditos, y porque se practican los valores. El contratiempo que tuvo éste año es que se puso mal de salud, pero lo bueno es que tuvo sus ahorros y lo utilizó en su tratamiento.
texts.en:
Lucy is a member of the communal bank "Buena Suerte", meaning "Good Luck". She is 59 years old and a single mother of 3 children. She knits sweaters and jackets and she sells clothing by taking orders. The loan which she requests will be invested in the purchase of yarn and articles of clothing.

She has been with Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for many years. She joined following an invitation from her sister. She appreciates the easy loan process and because they practice good values. The challenge she faced this year was when she took ill, but the positive part is that she had savings and she used them for her treatment.

loans.use: to purchase yarn and articles of clothing

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Esther; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como lápiz labiales, perfumes, cremas y esmaltes de uñas, la socia vende en forma independiente, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 a.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de productos de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de belleza al por mayor.
                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Liderado Las Palmeras". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Esther. She is 37 years old, married, and she has 2 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling cosmetics products, such as lipsticks, perfumes, skin lotins, and nail polish. She sells independently and she works from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. It is through this business that she is able to support her children. She wants to improve her cosmetics business. She requests a loan to purchase beauty products in wholesale.

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products in wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Ermis

texts.es:
José se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, es soltero vive con sus padres, él aprendió el trabajo  agrícola por su padre, lo realiza desde hace 10 años, su horario es de 6:00am a 3:00pm.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para la siembra de maíz y frijol y a si obtener mejores resultados, dándole un cuido adecuado.
Su aspiración es ayudarle a sus padres en los gastos  de la casa y obtener la cosecha para poder vender una parte.
texts.en:
José is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  He is single and lives with his parents.  He learned how to farm from his father and has been in the business for ten years.  He works from 6.00am to 3.00pm.

José is requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizers to grow his corn and bean crops and obtain better results by caring for his crops properly.

José's aspiration is to help his parents with their household expenses and to have a good harvest and be able to sell part of it.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Akwata Empola Women's Group

texts.en:
Patrick, 42, has been in a retail business for 12 years now. The father of five operates his business from Mukono. 

Before this business, he was for the most part engaged in a brick sales business. It is with savings from this brick sales business that he was able to take root in his current business venture. He still runs his brick sales business as a second fiddle supplementary business. 

From both businesses, he says he is able to make monthly sales profits to the tune of UGX 1,750,000 and he says with this Kiva loan, he is going to purchase more retail commodities like sugar, plastics, maize flour, cooking oil, bread, etc., to resell.

loans.use: to purchase retail commodities like sugar, cooking oil, plastics, maize flour, etc., to resell.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dolores; ella tiene 58 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara diferentes platos de comida como milanesas y caldos de carne y pollos, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el servicio de negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, carne, pollo y verduras.
                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Dolores is a member of the "Liderando Las Palmeras" community bank which is located in Cusco district, province and department.

Dolores is 58 years old, widowed, and has six children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her restaurant business.  Dolores prepares different dishes such as 'milanesas' (breaded meat fillets) and meat and chicken soups.  She works from 6.00am to 6.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Dolores would like to expand her restaurant business and is requesting this loan to buy food products to cook such as rice, meat, chicken and vegetables.

Dolores is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy food products to cook such as rice, meat, chicken and vegetables

loans.name: Sebenzuphile Group

texts.en:
Fikile is 55 years old and widowed with four children, aged between 2 and 23. Three attend school. In the photo above she is standing in the middle of her group raising up her hand.

She sells live chickens, brooms, mats, baskets, bags and hats at the pay points in Hlabisa, South Africa. She has been in this business for three years. She also earns the government’s child support grant. 

She requested this loan through WDB and Kiva to buy live chickens, brooms, mats, baskets, bags and hats to resell.
 
In five years time she would like to extend her business and have at least two employees. She says that extra income from this loan will help her renovate her house and buy new furniture.
 
She appreciates WDB and Kiva for helping her with this loan and hopes that WDB and Kiva will come and visit her business and also give other women the opportunity of borrowing money as they did to her.

loans.use: To buy brooms, mats, baskets, bags and hats.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El tiene 35 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de ganadería y agricultura, el vende ganados y también tiene una tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz, papa y habas y también el socio se dedica a la formulación de proyectos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de ganadería y agricultura. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y semillas para las tierras de cultivo. 
                                                      
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Liderando Las Palmeras" community bank which is located in Cusco district, province and department.

The borrower is 35 years old, single, and has one child.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business raising livestock and farming.  He sells livestock and owns farmland on which he grows corn, potatoes and beans.  He also works drawing up projects.  The borrower would like to expand his livestock raising and farming business.  He is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for his land.

The borrower is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for his land

loans.name: Edwin Manfredis

texts.es:
Edwin, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, es soltero, este trabajo lo hace desde hace ocho años, lo aprendió de su padre, quien le enseño todo el proceso necesario para hacer la milpa, el horario es de 6:00am a 2:00pm.
El préstamo lo necesita para la compra de abono, fertilizantes y tratamiento para las plagas, esta será una gran ayuda para Edwin, que le permitirá tener un buen cultivo con posible buena cosecha.
Su objetivo es ayudar a sus padres a cubrir los gastos de la casa e ir progresando poco a poco para su propia superación.
texts.en:
Edwin is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  He is single and has been in this line of work for eight years.  He learned the business from his father who taught him how to grow his crops.  He works from 6.00am to 2.00pm.

Edwin needs this loan to buy manure, fertilizers and pest treatments.  This will be a big help as it will allow him to have a good crop and a good harvest.

Edwin's goal is to help his parents to cover their household expenses and to continue making gradual progress in order to improve himself.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers and pest treatments

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia tiene 49 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. productos D. maíz y D. chuño, la socia lo trae D. lugares como Calca,pisaq y Urubamba y luego lo venD. en el mercado, ella trabaja desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio D. este negocio la socia saca adelante  a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. maíz. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz y D. chuño al por mayor.
                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Liderando Las Palmeras" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 49 years old, married, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling corn and 'chuño' (a freeze-dried potato product).  She buys her products in places such as Cala, Pisaq and Urubamba and then sells them in the local market.  She works from 8.00am to 6.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  The borrower would like to expand her business selling corn.  She is requesting this loan to buy corn and 'chuño' wholesale.

The borrower is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn and 'chuño' (freeze-dried potato product) wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 24 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de cuyes, el tiene un terreno en el distrito de Quiquijana y también siembra maíz y en algunas oportunidades le ayuda a su mama en el trabajo de movilidad escolar, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de crianza de cuyes. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para los cuyes y para comprar cuyes. 
                                                    
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Liderando Las Palmeras" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 24 years old and single.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business raising guinea pigs.  He owns a plot of land in Quiquijana district and he also grows corn.  Sometimes he helps his mom in her work transporting school children.  The borrower would like to expand and improve his business raising guinea pigs.  He is requesting this loan to buy guinea pig feed and guinea pigs.

The borrower is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pig feed and guinea pigs

loans.name: C4711 Tujyeheza Group

texts.en:
Alexandre is 36 years old and is married with seven children between the ages of 2 and 14. He is the representative of a group called "Tuyjeheza" in the local language. Alexandre is the first person on the right who is raising his hand. He has been in this business for one year. His business is well-organized, and he is open from 8am until 5pm every day and employs one person to help him. 

Alexandre and his group have requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more quantities of fruits and vegetables to sell. He will reinvest the profits in his business and save for his family.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Henry Ely

texts.es:
Henry, es soltero, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, vive con sus padres, el trabajo agrícola le fue inducido por su padre y trabaja todos los días desde muy temprano desde hace 10 años.
Actualmente solicita un  préstamo que lo invertirá en la compra de abono y tratamiento para plagas, estos materiales son muy necesarios para el cultivo de maíz y frijol, ya que si no se le da un tratamiento adecuado se corre el riesgo de que se dañe el cultivo.
Su sueño es hacer su propia casa y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos económicos del hogar, trabajando cada día con mucho esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Henry is single and lives with his parents.  He is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  He learned how to farm from his father and he works every day from very early in the morning.  He has been doing this for ten years.

Henry is currently requesting a loan which he will invest in buying fertilizers and pest treatments.  He really needs these materials for his corn and bean crops since, if he doesn't provide them with proper treatment, he runs the risk of his crops being ruined.

Henry's dream is to build his own home and to support his parents with their household expenses.  He will work hard every day in order to achieve this.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pest treatments

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia  tiene 56 años de edad y es separada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía, ella compra todo tipo de artesanía como chompas, azucareras, muñecas, chalinas entre otros tipos de artesanía, ella lo distribuye a distintos lugares que venden artesanía, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía al por mayor.
                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Liderando Las Palmeras" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 56 years old, separated, and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling handicrafts.  She buys all kinds of handicrafts such as sweaters, sugar bowls, dolls, jackets, etc.  She distributes her products in different places that sell handicrafts.  Through this business, she gets her son ahead in life.  The borrower would like to expand and improve her handicrafts business.  She is requesting this loan to buy handicrafts wholesale.

The borrower is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts wholesale

loans.name: Cesarea

texts.es:
Cesarea es socia del Banco Comunal Buena Surte, tiene 54 años, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos.
Es feriante y tiene un puesto D. papas en el mercado Mayorista D. Nery Garcia Zarate. El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. abarrotes como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, entre otros para surtir su mercadería.
Cesarea viaja a la feria D. Seccelambras. Tuvo problemas le asaltaron y le robaron toda su mercadería, pero ya se ésta recuperando y sigue para adelante trabajando.
Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Cesarea is a member of the "Buena Suerte" (Good Luck) community bank.  She is 54 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children.  She is a market seller and has a stall in the Nery Garcia Zarate wholesale market.  

Cesarea is requesting this loan to invest in buying groceries such as sugar, noodles, milk and other products, with which she will stock her business.

Cesarea travels to the Seccelambras market.  She had problems when some people assaulted her and stole all her merchandise.  However, she is now recovering and continues getting ahead by working.

Cesarea's dream is for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, noodles and milk

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de brindar servicio de movilidad escolar, ella es propietaria de una combi y lleva  a escolares a sus casas por las distintas calles de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar e implementar su carro para que mejore el servicio de movilidad escolar. La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro para comprar repuestos de carro.
                                                            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Liderando Las Palmeras" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 44 years old, married, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business providing a school transport service.  She owns a van and transports school children home through the streets of the city of Cusco.  She works from 7.00am to 7.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  The borrower would like to expand her business and work on her car so that she can improve her service.  She is requesting this loan to have maintenance work carried out on her car and to buy spare parts.

The borrower is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to have maintenance work done on her car and to buy spare parts

loans.name: Santos Eugenio

texts.es:
Santos,  se dedica a la venta helados y cocos, vive con su esposa y sus  dos hijos, Él vende de forma ambulante por los municipios, este negocio es la fuente de ingreso con la que cuenta para sostener el hogar.
El crédito lo necesita para comprar más cocos, helados (sorbetes, paletas)para el negocio, el cual le ayudara a tener más variedad de sabores en los helados, con lo que espera satisfacer mejor la demanda de sus clientes.
Su objetivo que su negocio crezca y que sus dos hijos estudien y comprar un lote para hacer una casa.
texts.en:
Santos sells ice cream and coconuts. He lives with his wife and their two children. He is a mobile salesman, walking through the towns. This business is his source of income for maintaining his home.

The loan will be used to buy more coconuts and frozen treats (sherberts, popsicles) for his business, which will help him to have a greater variety of ice cream flavors. He hopes this will better satisfy his customer's demands.

His goals are to grow his business,for his children to study and to buy a lot to build a house on.

loans.use: to buy coconuts, sherberts and popsicles.

loans.name: Jasiri Group

texts.en:
Swaumu, who is in her late 20s, is married and has two children. One of them is going to school and the other is very young.  

She has been selling charcoal for two years now. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Swaumu’s first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She hopes for a loan to buy more sacks of charcoal. 

Her dream is to one day build her own house.

Swaumu will share this loan with her loan group, “Jasiri,” which has a total of 15 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy and sell more charcoal.

loans.name: Joan Group

texts.es: ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA "JOAN", ESTA UBICADO EN EL ESTADO D. MÉXICO. EL GRUPO ESTA CONFORMADO POR 10 INTEGRANTES Y ES L. PRIMERA VEZ QUE SOLICITAN UN PRESTAMO. L. SEÑORA LAURA ES UNA INTEGRANTE DEL GRUPO TIENE 31 AÑOS D. EDAD, ESTUDIO L. PRIMARIA, ES CASADA, TIENA 3 HIJOS D. 10,8,Y 3 AÑOS RESPECTIVAMENTE. ELL. SE DEDICA A L. COMERCIALIZACION D. ZAPATOS POR CATALOGO DESD. HACE 3 AÑOS, SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO PARA ADQUIRIR CATALOGOS D. TEMPORADA Y ALGUNOS PEDIDOS QUE TIENE PENDIENTES. SUS CLIENTES COMENTAN QUE LES AGRADA COMPRAR CON ELL. PORQUE SIEMPRE ENTREGA TODO A TIEMPO, ES MUY AMABLE Y MUY RESPONSABLE. AL MOMENTO D. SOLICITAR ESTE PRESTAMO SE SIENTE CON MUCHOS ANIMOS PARA CONTINUAR INVIRTIENDO EN SU NEGOCIO YA QUE LE AYUDARA A SEGUIR INVIRTIENDO, TENER MÁS CLIETES. ESPERA TAMBIEN AHORRAR D. LAS GANANCIAS QUE OBTENGA PARA BRINDARLES UNA CARRERA PROFESIONAL A SUS HIJOS Y ASÍ LOGREN TENER UN MEJOR FUTURO.
texts.en:
This group, known as "Joan", is located in the state of Mexico. The group is maD. up of 10 members and this is their first time requesting a loan. 

One member of the group is Laura, 31 years old. She completed primary school, is married and has 3 children ages 10,8 and 3. For three years she has been selling shoes from catalogs. She is requesting a loan to get seasonal catalogs and place some pending orders. Her customers tell her that they like to buy from her because she always gets things to them on time, and is very friendly and responsible. At this time, she feels very motivated to continue investing in her business since it will help her to continue investing and to have more clients. She also hopes to save some of her earnings to put towards her children's professional careers so that they can have a better future.

loans.use: to buy more shoes for her business.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca, se dedica a la crianza y comercialización D. cerdos, este negocio lo tiene desD. hace seis años aproximadamente, a parte D. esta actividad trabaja en oficios domestico en un hotel,  ella  vive únicamente con su hijo D. 23 años D. edad.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo, que lo invertirá en la compra D. cerdos, esta compra será muy importante, ya que aumentara el numero D. cerdos en la granja, para luego venderlos y obtener ganancias.
El objetivo D. ella es que el negocio mejore, ayudar a su hijo en lo que sea necesario y poco a poco mejorar la infraestructura D. su vivienda.
texts.en:
Francisca raises and sells pigs. She has been doing this for about 6 years. AsiD. from this job, she also does housecleaning in a hotel. She lives with her 23-year-old son. 

Currently she is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of pigs. This purchase will be very important since it will increase the number of pigs on the farm, so that she can later sell them to earn money.

Her goal is to improve her business, help her son with what he needs and little-by-little make improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Becham Group

texts.en:
Roida, a single womanr in her late 20's with one child, sells tea with chapattis and other simple bites in the morning and cooked food in the afternoon. Working from 7:00 a.m. to 8.00 p.m. daily, she earns a small monthly profit.

This will be Roida’s second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, her previous one, since repaid, having been used to sell quarry stone, tea with small bites, and cooked food. She will use this new a loan to buy and sell more bites, tea milk and food stock. Roida will share this loan with her loan group “Becham” which has a total of 15 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more bites, tea milk and food stock.

loans.name: Anastacio

texts.es:
Anastasio, se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos, es soltero,  vive con su abuela, el  trabajo agrícola lo realiza desde hace treinta años, con un horario de 5:00am a 11:00am, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre, este trabajo tiene una desventaja, y es que su producción depende de las condiciones del clima.
El solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en los insumos agrícolas y pago de jornaleros para la siembra, con este préstamo él podrá, iniciar la siembra, tener los materiales necesarios para el cuido y tener la oportunidad obtener buena cosecha, después de recoger la cosecha llena los graneros y vende parte de esta.
Su objetivo es  obtener la seguridad alimentaria para él y su abuela y puedan vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Anastasio works cultivating basic grains.  He is single and lives with his grandmother. He has worked in agriculture for 30 years with a schedule of working from 5:00am to 11:00am. He learned this trade from his father.  The downside of this work is that the production is dependent on weather conditions. 

He is requesting a loan to invest in agricultural inputs and payment of laborers for planting.  With this loan he will be able to start planting, have the materials needed for the care, the opportunity to get good harvest, and after the harvest fills the granaries he can sell part of it.

His goal is to obtain food security for himself and his grandmother and to live better.

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizer and pay laborers.

loans.name: Ddc Group

texts.en:
Zakia, who is in her early 30s, is a divorcee with three children. Two of them go to school.  

She has been selling new clothes, bed sheets and curtains at a place called Kimara for two years now. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Zakia’s third loan from Tujijnge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase her business and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She hopes for a loan to buy and sell more ladies' clothes, bed sheets and curtains. Her dream is to one day open a grocery.

Zakia will share this loan with her loan group “DDC” which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy and sell more ladies' clothes, bedsheets and curtains.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
María,  se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, vive con su hermano, es madre soltera de tres hijos de 18, 10 y 2 años de edad, este negocio lo realiza desde hace veinte años, cría cerdos y aves de corral (gallinas, jolotes) atiende los oficios que demanda la granja todos los días desde las 4:00am.
Ella necesita un préstamo que lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos y compra de concentrado para la alimentación de los animales, con esta compra mejorara la granja, aumentándola y con alimentación suficiente.
Su sueño es comprar más cerdos y a si obtener mejores ingresos para darle mejor estabilidad a su hogar y ayudarles a sus hijos a  una mejor educación.
texts.en: Maria raises pigs and lives with her brother, she is a single mother with 3 children of ages: 18 and 2.  She has been in this business for 20 years raising pigs and poultry ( chickens, turkeys).  She tends to all the tasks required on a farm everyday beginning at 4AM.   She needs a loan which she would then vest towards purchasing pigs and supplements for their feed.  With such a purchase she would improve the farm by increasing its capacity and also have sufficient feed.  Her dream is to purchase more pigs and this way obtain higher earnings so she can provide better stability to her household and also help her kids obtain a better education.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and feed supplement

loans.name: Helene

texts.en:
Helene is 38 years old and married, with two children, ages 5 and 12, and two dependent relatives. 

Helene has a boutique where she sells soap, body lotion, bread, etc. She has four years' experience and one employee to help her. Her business is open from 5:30 a.m. until 18:30 p.m. every day.
 
Helene has requested a loan from Kiva in order to increase her boutique's stock by buying more quantity of water, juice, bread, soap, cooking oil, etc. 

With the additional profits from this, Helene will reinvest in her business and renovate her own house.

loans.use: To increase the stock of her boutique by buying water, juice, bread, soap, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: G-Tide Group

texts.en:
Mohamed, who is in his early 30s, is married and has two children. One is very young and the other one goes to school.  

Since 2005, he has had a business of selling fruits at a place called Tegeta. He works from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Mohamed’s sixth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans for household expenses and to increase his stock of fruits and has paid back all his loans successfully. He hopes for a loan to buy more fruits from Kariakoo markets for resale. His dream is to one day start selling rice in bulk.

Mohamed will share this loan with his loan group “G-tide” which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

One of the clients was looking at the chairperson who was busy filling the group loan agreement.

loans.use: To buy more fruits to resell.

loans.name: Ezeckiel

texts.en:
Ezeckiel, age 26 and married, has owned a motorcycle transport business for one year. His business is well-organized and he opens daily from 6 a.m. until 9 p.m every day. 

Ezeckiel has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy essential materials like tires for his motorcycle transport. With his profits, he plans to reinvest in his business and to renovate his own house.

loans.use: to buy essential materials like tires.

loans.name: Kisarawe Group

texts.en:
Fatuma, who is in her mid 30s, is married and has five children who go to school. 

She has had a business of selling new clothes from door to door for four years now. She works from 11:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Fatuma’s third loan from  Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to pay school fees and increase the clothes stock and has repaid all her loans successfully. She hopes for a loan to buy more clothes for resale. Her dream is to one day finish building her house.

Fatuma will share this loan with her loan group, “Kisarawe,” which has a total of 19 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Lupita I Group

texts.es: ESTA FOTO FUE TOMADA EN L. CASA D. L. SEÑORA LUISA QUIEN ES UNA INTEGRANTE DEL GRUPO LUPITA I, QUE ESTA UBICADO EN VERAC., MÉXICO. LUISA TIENE UN NEGOCIO D. VENTA D. ROPA QUE INICIO HACE 7 AÑOS. SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO PARA  INVERTIR EN SU NEGOCIO Y ASI TENER MÁS VENTAS, SUS CLIENTAS L. CONSIDERAN UNA PERSONA RESPONSABLE Y AGRADABLE, EN EL CUAL SE PUED. CONFIAR. AL MOMENTO D. SOLICITAR ESTE PRESTAMO SE SIENTE SATISFECHA POR PODER REINVERTIR EN SU NEGOCIO. ELL. TIENE 32 AÑOS, ESTUDIO HASTA L. SECUNDARIA, ES CASADA Y TIENE 1 HIJO. L. SEÑORA QUIERE EL PRESTAMO PARA INVERTIR EN ROPA PARA SU NEGOCIO Y ASÍ TENER MÁS VARIEDAD Y PARA TODOS LOS GUSTOS Y TALLAS YA QUE LE HACEN MUCHOS PEDIDOS, SUS CLIENTES COMENTAN QUE LES GUSTA COMPRAR CON ELL. POR QUE SI NO LO TIENE SE LOS CONSIGUE Y SIEMPRE TIENE ROPA D. TEMPORADA ADEMÁS D. SER MUY AMABLE. TAMBIEN ESPERA PODER AHORRA UNA PARTE CON LAS GANANCIAS QUE OBTENGA PARA CONTINUAR INVIRTIENDO EN SU NEGOCIO Y PARA L. EDUCACIÓN D. SU HIJO YA QUE ES SU MÁS GRAND. ORGULLO Y ANHEL. VERLO COMO UN PROFESIONISTA.
texts.en: This picture was taken at Luisa's home who is a member of the Lupita I group which is located in VeraC., Mexico.  Luisa has a business selling clothing which she initiated 7 years ago.  She is soliciting this loan to invest it in the business and this way have more sales.  Her clients consider her a responsible and pleasant person; one who can be trusted.  At the time of the loan request she felt very satisfied for being able to reinvest in her business.  She is 32 years and high school educated, she is also married with one child.  She would like this loan to invest it in the purchase of more clothing for her store, this way she can have a wider variety for all kinds of styles and sizes especially since she receives a lot of orders.  Her clients state that they like to shop with her because if she doesn't have it she will get it and she always has clothes that are in season, plus she is friendly.  She now hopes to save some of her earnings so she can continue reinvesting in the business and also for her child's education since he's her biggest source of priD. and she longs to see him as a professional.

loans.use: to invest in clothing for her business

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta D. cosméticos, oro, plata y enchape, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 12, 10 y 9 años D. edad, él negocio D. María es D. forma ambulante, visitando casa por casa a sus vecinos y amigos, desD. hace 6 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería, cremas, maquillajes, lociones, con esta mercadería podrá ofrecer a los clientes nuevos productos, dando la oportunidad D. que sus clientes demanden la nueva mercadería y le genere mayores ventas.
El  objetivo D.  ella es trabajar por sus hijos, que tengan alimentación, salud y puedan estudiar, también poco a poco mejorar la infraestructura D. su vivienda.
texts.en:
María sells cosmetics, gold, silver, and plated jewelry. She lives with her husband and three children (ages 12, 10, and 9). María operates her business as a traveling merchant, going house-to-house to visit neighbors and friends. She has been in business for six years.

María is currently requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as crèmes, makeup, and lotions. By acquiring this merchandise, she will be able to offer her customers new products so that they will have the opportunity to purchase them. As a result, she will generate more sales.

Her goal is to work on behalf of her children so that they will be well-fed, healthy, and educated. In addition, she hopes to gradually improve the infrastructure of her home.

loans.use: to purchase crèmes, makeup, and lotions.

loans.name: Victor Antonio

texts.es:
Víctor, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 21 y 17 años de edad, él se dedica a la siembra de maíz y a la albañilería, aprendió este negocio de su padre, y tiene aproximadamente 12 años de dedicarse a este oficio.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra, ya que necesita obreros que le ayuden a limpiar la tierra, este préstamo le ayudara a solventar los gastos de fertilizantes y pagar a sus mozos.
Su sueño es ayudar a que sus hijos terminen sus estudios, tengan una buena oportunidad de empleo para que se puedan superar.
texts.en:
Victor lives with his wife and two children (ages 21 and 17). He grows corn and works as a bricklayer, a trade he learned from his father. Victor has been in this business for approximately 12 years.

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and to pay for labor. Victor needs workers to help him with clearing his land. This loan will help him cover the cost of the fertilizers and the wages to be paid to his young workers.

His dream is to help his children finish their studies so that they will have a good opportunity to secure employment that will enable them to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase oil, beans, rice, corn, bread, cured meats, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 43 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ganados, el tiene un terreno en el distrito de Cotabambas,el vende los ganados en las distintas ferias que se realizan como la feria de Inquilpata en el distrito de Anta y también el socio se dedica al negocio de restaurant ayudando a su esposa y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere mejorar y ampliar el  lugar donde se crían los ganados. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ganados e implementar el establo de los ganados.
                                                    
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank “Liderando Las Palmeras” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 43 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children. The member divides his time between his daily activities and his business of buying and selling cattle. He has a plot of land in the District of Cotabambas. The member sells his cattle at different fairs, such as the one in Inquilpata and another in the District of Anta. He also manages a restaurant business with the help of his wife so that their children can get ahead. The member wants to improve and expand the area where he raises his cattle. He is requesting a loan to buy cattle and to build a stable to house them.

The member is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and materials to build a stable.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael, está casado, vive con su esposa y tienen 4 hijos, Rafael desde muy temprano inicia sus labores con el ganado, empieza con el ordeño de las vacas a las 4:00am, es un trabajo que requiere tiempo, él aprendió por herencia de sus padres.
Actualmente quiere comprar unas vacas y comprarles alimentos, vacunas y vitaminas, con esta compra le ayudara a tener en mejores condiciones el ganado, dándole lugar a comercializarlo mejor.
El sueño de Rafael es aumentar el número de reces, garantizar una mejor solvencia económica a su familia, ya que es un poco grande y requiere de mucho esfuerzo para tener una vida confortable.
texts.en:
Rafael is married. He lives with his wife and their four children. Very early in the morning, Rafael starts his work of taking care of his cattle. He milks the cows starting at 4am. This job requires a great amount of time. He learned this trade from his parents.

At the moment, Rafael wants to buy a few cows as well as feed, vaccines, and vitamins. This purchase will help improve the condition of his cattle, which will give them a better chance of being sold at market.

Rafael’s dream is to increase the number in his herd so that his family will be in better financial standing. He has a large family, so it requires much effort to provide them with a comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase cows, feed, vaccines, and vitamins.

loans.name: Milagro Del Socorro

texts.es:
Milagro, vive con su esposo y una hija de 16 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de pupusas y tostadas, este negocio fue fundado junto a su esposo hace 10 años, trabaja todos los días de 3:00pm a 7:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de quesillo, chicharrón, plátanos, aceite y condimentos,  estos materiales le servirán para preparar las pupusas y las enchiladas, con esta ayuda tendrá los materiales necesarios para comercializar los productos a los clientes.
Su objetivo es apoyar a su hija en sus estudios, para que pueda ingresar a la universidad y poder tener un futuro distinto con mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Milagro lives with her husband and 16-year-old daughter. She sells pupusas and tostadas. Milagro and her husband started this business 10 years ago. She works every day from 3pm to 7pm.

Milagro is requesting a loan to buy cheese, pork, plantains, oil, and condiments. These supplies will be used for preparing pupusas and enchiladas. By having these necessary supplies on hand, she will be able to sell her products to her customers.

Her goal is to support her daughter with her studies so that she can enroll in the university and have a bright future with better opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase cheese, pork, plantains, oil, and condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia  tiene 35 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas y también prepara postres y tortas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar y también para comprar sillas para el restaurant.
                                                           
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank “Liderando Las Palmeras” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 35 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children. The member divides her time between her daily activities and the management of her restaurant business. She prepares breakfast, lunch, and dinner, as well as pastries and cakes. The member works from 8am to 10pm. This business allows her children to get ahead. The member wants to expand and improve her restaurant business. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy ingredients for cooking and chairs for her restaurant.

The member is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for cooking and chairs for her restaurant.

loans.name: Yelena

texts.en:
Yelena is married and has a daughter, Nastya. She lives in Melitopol. 

Yelena sells men’s clothing in the central marketplace of her home town. She has been running the business for 16 years. Currently, she has 80,000 UAH in inventory. Her income amounts to 10,000 UAH. 

Yelena is seeking a 20,000 UAH loan to purchase seasonal men’s merchandise. She likes working with this type of merchandise. Yelena is hoping to expand her business and open an additional vending facility as a result.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal men’s clothing for resale.

loans.name: La Buena Fe Group

texts.en:
Marta is the coordinator of her group, L. Buena Fe ("The Good Faith"). Her group is located in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, a sleepy agricultural town. They are five businesspeople dedicated to selling different products. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and five of their six children.

Marta is excited to be taking out her fifth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business selling jewelry. She intends to use the loan capital to purchase rings, chains, bracelets, and other jewels. She will use the profits to save, complete construction on her home, and invest in her children's education. 

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently immigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy jewels

loans.name: Natalya

texts.en:
Natalya is married with a grown daughter. She is an entrepreneur from Melitopol who sells women’s footwear in the central marketplace of her home town. She offers a nice selection of inventory for sale in her kiosk. Natalya started this business nine years ago. Currently, she has 10,000 Grivnyas in inventory. Her net profit amounts to 8,000 Grivnyas per month.
Natalya is seeking a loan of 15,000 Grivnyas to purchase seasonal footwear so that she can better present the benefits of her products and services to her customers. She always tries to offer a nice variety of stylish shoes and sandals for ladies and avoids copying the products of other market vendors. Natalya has built a good reputation for the quality of her products and support services.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal footwear.

loans.name: Elba Ibel

texts.es:
Elba, es madre soltera de dos hijos, ella vive junto a su familia su padre y hermanos, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y venta de tortillas, el negocio lo estableció por iniciativa propia, no tiene un horario establecido.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para compra de cerdos y alimentación (concentrado), esta compra le ayudara a ampliar la granja y tener mayor disponibilidad para comercializar.
El objetivo de ella es tener una granja amplia, aumentar la clientela y tener una mejor condición económica con su familia.
texts.en:
Elba is a single mother of two children. She and her family live with her father and her siblings. Elba raises pigs and sells tortillas. She established her business through her own initiative, but she does not work on a set schedule.

Elba currently needs a loan to buy pigs and concentrated feed. This purchase will help to expand her farm and provide her greater accessibility to the marketplace. Her goals are to have a larger farm, expand her customer base, and establish a better financial condition for her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Volodymyr

texts.en:
Volodymyr is married with two children. He is a private businessman from Ganoosivka, Ivano-Frankivsk region. Volodymyr sells household items and construction supplies in small towns in his region. He has a car that facilitates his business endeavors. Every day he travels to a different town to sell his merchandise at reasonable prices. Presently, his monthly income amounts to 10,000 Grivnyas.
Volodymyr is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnyas to purchase 100 tins of assorted paint, as well as a ton of cement and assorted workwear for further retail sale in the markets of his region. Volodymyr has been in the trade for over six years. He has no competitors, which helps his business grow and develop even more rapidly. The business is the main source of income for his family. One of Volodymyr’s personal goals is to finish construction of his private house, which has been his long-nurtured dream.

loans.use: to purchase 100 tins of assorted paint, a ton of cement and assorted workwear.

loans.name: Buenas Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Doña Josefina es una señora casada, tiene 32 años D. edad, no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, tiene 4 hijos los cuales estudian el nivel primario, se dedica a los oficios D. la casa y a la confeccion D. faldas, lo cual es una fuente D. ingreso económico para ella, lleva 10 años D. experiencia en este trabajo, inició por iniciativa propia y deseos D. superación, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien también se dedica a la confección D. tejidos y al comercio. 

Organiza un grupo con el propósito D. solicitar un préstamo que servirá para ampliación D. su capital D. trabajo, para la compra D. telas para la cofección D. faldas, las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a diversas actividades productivas económicamente como: confeccion D. faldas, confeccion D. blusas, atención a tienda en general, venta D. ropa típica, y a la crianza D. animales. En el futuro desean tener mejor capitalizacion y negocio con nuevos productos.
texts.en:
Doña Josefina, age 32, is a married woman who did not have the opportunity to study. She has four children who are in elementary school. Josefina devotes herself to her housework and to making skirts, which is her source of financial income. She has 10 years of experience performing this type of work. Josefina got started as a result of her own initiative and desire to succeed. She has the support of her husband, who also works as a weaver and a merchant.

Josefina organized a group for the purpose of requesting a loan to increase her operating capital for buying fabrics used in making skirts. The other members of the group engage in different business activities to earn income such as making skirts, making blouses, managing a general store, selling traditional clothing, and raising animals. In the future, they hope to increase their capital and generate new products through their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics.

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga is married with two grown sons. She runs a clothing store in her home town of Melitopol. She rents a facility to sell men’s and women’s clothing inventory, in particular jean clothing items. She buys her merchandise from wholesalers in Odessa. Olga is an experienced entrepreneur who has been in the market for 15 years. Presently, she makes about 8,500 Grivnyas of net profit per month.
Olga is seeking a loan of 20,000 Grivnyas to purchase lighter summer jean clothing to meet her female customers' seasonal demand. One of her short-term business plans is to open an additional vending location in Melitopol in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal jeans wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tools and wood for his carpentry shop.

loans.name: Sandra Karina

texts.es:
Sandra, posee una tienda y venta D. helados, vive con su familia su esposo y dos hijos D. 13 y 3 años D. edad, el negocio lo implemento con la ayuda D. su esposo quien tiene experiencia en el comercio, no tiene un horario establecido y trabaja en lo propio.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar paletas y sorbetes D. diferentes sabores, con esta compra quiere surtir el negocio y mantener en el inventario un buen número D. helados a disponibilidad  D. los clientes.
Su objetivo es crecer en el comercio,  montar nuevos locales D. venta y proveer para su familia todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Sandra, owns an ice cream shop, and lives with her family which consists of her husband, 13 and 3 year old children. She began her business with her husband's help who has experience in this business. She does not have a standard schedule and works when she finds it appropriate. 
She is requesting the loan to buy popsicles and sherbets of various flavors. She can then stock up and have enough inventory to offer her clients. 
Her objective is to grow her business, open up new shops, and proviD. her family with life's necessities.

loans.use: buy popsicles and sherbets of various flavors.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is married. He lives in Kirillovka, a small town on the Azov Sea, which is a resort area. Alexander runs a small retail business selling souvenirs and imitation jewelry at the local bus station marketplace. He usually purchases merchandise wholesale in Odessa and then resells it to tourists in Kirillovka. Alexander has been in this business for 12 years. Presently, he has about 30,000 Grivnyas in inventory. His monthly income amounts to 7,000 Grivnyas.
Alexander is seeking a loan of 15,000 Grivnyas to purchase additional souvenirs, imitation jewelry and semi-precious gems for further retail sale in small coastal resort areas. Alexander is planning to increase his sales and develop his range of merchandise as a result. He is hoping to open an additional vending location as a result of business expansion. Alexander is very enterprising; he knows how to organize and run his business effectively.

loans.use: to purchase additional souvenirs, imitation jewelry and semi-precious gems for resale.

loans.name: Maira Marisa

texts.es:
Maira, tiene una pupuseria, vive con su esposo y dos hijas D. 20 y 18 años D. edad, Inicio el negocio con su hermana, quien se ofreció a enseñarle la preparación D. las pupusas, no tiene un horario fijo.
Ella quiere comprar material para hacer las pupusas, como compra D. quesillo, chicharrón, tomates, cebollas y bebidas, la inversión le permitirá fortalecer la pupuseria cumpliendo las expectativas D. los clientes, y produciendo más.
El objetivo es hacer aumentar el negocio, ser una empresaria con potencial para su negocio, también darle a su familia una vida confortable.
texts.en:
Maira owns a pupuseria.  She lives with her husband and her two daughters who are 20 and 18.  She started her business with her sister who offered to teach her how to prepare pupusas.  She does not work fixed hours.

Maira would like to buy ingredients for making her pupusas such as 'quesillo' (soft cheese), 'chicharrón' (fried pork skins), tomatoes, onions and drinks.  The investment will allow her to strengthen her pupuseria, meet her customers' expectations and produce more.

Maira's goals are to increase her business, to be a businesswoman who has potential for her business and also to proviD. her family with a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy 'quesillo' (soft cheese), 'chicharrón' (fried pork skins), tomatoes, onions and drinks

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, él aprendió la agricultura desde joven, actualmente trabaja en lo propio, sin un horario establecido y por el momento iniciara el proceso de  la siembra, para lo cual solicita un préstamo y comprar insumos agrícolas tales como, abono y fertilizantes.
Este préstamo le ayudara para tener todo lo necesario para el cultivo y continuar trabajando para el sustento familiar.
Para Víctor, tener una buena producción es lo principal, pues de ahí depende su familia.
texts.en:
Víctor is a farmer who lives with his wife and two children.  He learned how to farm when he was young.  He currently works on his own farm and does not work fixed hours.  Right now, he is about to start sowing his crops and so is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as manure and fertilizers.

This loan will help Víctor to have available everything he needs for his crops so that he can continue working in order to support his family.

For Víctor, having a good production is very important as his family depends on it.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto, vive con sus padres y hermanos, es soltero y agricultor, desde muy joven ayudo a su padre a sembrar maíz y hoy en día lo realiza a la perfección, todos los días trabaja y por el momento inicia sus labores de siembra.
Para llevar a cabo el nuevo cultivo, solicita un préstamo para comprar los insumos, abono, fertilizantes y tratamientos de plagas, con estos materiales tendrá preparado el terreno para poder sembrar.
Esta será una gran ayuda para Roberto, quien pretende obtener una buena cosecha, abúndate y sana, para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto, single, lives with his parents and siblings and works as a farmer.  From a very young age he helped his father plant corn and now he is an expert at what he does.  He works everyday and is starting a new planting season.

In order to grow a new crop he is requesting a loan to buy supplies, fertilizer and plague treatment, which he will use to prepare the land for planting.

This will be of great help to Roberto, who wants to achieve an abundant, healthy harvest to help his family.

loans.use: To buy supplies, fertilizer and plague treatment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy trousers, shirts, t-shirts, skirts and blouses.

loans.name: Jose Hilario

texts.es:
José, es casado, tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, él se dedica a la siembra y producción de hortalizas, cada año realiza la siembra de chile dulce, pepino, ejote y maíz, tiene 5 años de estar en esta actividad.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para comprar semilla de chile, pepino y ejote, además de fertilizantes, con esto se le ayudara a incrementar el área de cultivo y tener mejor posibilidades de ganar más ingresos con la producción.
Para José el propósito es tener buenas cosechas, darles un cuido adecuado, tener una buena comercialización y con esto ayudar a su familia y en especial a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José, 46, is married and lives with his wife and three children.  He grows vegetables every year such as sweet chile pepper, cucumber, green beans and corn.  He has been involved in this activity for five years.

He is requesting a loan to buy chile pepper, cucumber and green bean seeds, as well as fertilizer.  This will help him increase his cropland and have a better chance of earning more income from his production.

José's goal is to produce better harvests by giving his crops the proper care, and achieving a good sale price with which to support his family, especially his children.

loans.use: To buy chile pepper, cucumber and green bean seeds, as well as fertilizer.

loans.name: Bernabe

texts.es: Bernabe tiene 25 años, es un joven muy laborioso, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Gloria de 24 años y su único hijo, David de 01 mes de nacido, a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo que realiza Bernabe es labrar y cultivar, es entonces que se dedica a sembrar cacao, café y maíz, productos que tiene mucha demanda en la ciudad de San Francisco, pues es ahí donde obtiene mejores ganancias por su venta. Pero para que esta actividad le de un buen resultado debe invertir dinero y esfuerzo físico, es por ello que su pareja, la ayuda en esta labor, así juntos logran percibir los ingresos que necesitarán para cubrir sus propias necesidades y la de su hijo aún pequeño. Sin embargo hay momento en que necesitan contratar la mano de obra de jornaleros, para que puedan rápidamente avanzar con esta faena agrícola, pues una vez extraído los productos éstos deberán ser transportados desde la chacra hasta su comunidad, para el proceso de secado, y a veces en que sólo es muy agotado este trabajo. Lleva 07 años realizando esta actividad y lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos de la plaga de insectos que amenazan el desarrollo de sus plantas. En adelante espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar su producción. Este será su octavo crédito con MFP, por ello espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para que pueda cumplir sus objetivos. Asimismo se compromete en pagar sus cuotas para no causar problemas con los integrantes de su banco comunal, en el cual se siente muy contento. Con el crédito solicitado comprará semillas de cacao y sacos de abono, con lo cual espera mejorar su producción.
texts.en:
Bernabe, 25, is a hard-working young man who lives in his own house with his partner, Gloria, age 24, and their son, David, one month old, for whom he wants to provide the best lifestyle possible.  Bernabe is a farmer and grows cocoa, coffee and corn which are products in much demand in the city of San Francisco where he obtains the most profit on sales.  But in order to have good results he must invest money and physical effort.  His partner helps him and together they make enough income to cover household expenses and meet the needs of their small son.  However, sometimes they must hire workers in order to move along quickly in the farm activity, and once the crop is harvested it must be transported from their location to the community for drying, and this is considerable work for one person.

He has been involved in this work for 7 years and enjoys most protecting the crops against insect plagues that can harm plant development.  In the future he wants to buy more land to increase production.  This is his eighth loan through MFP and he hopes to be able to count on your support so he can meet his goals.  He is committed to paying it back on time and not cause problems for the members of the communal bank he is happy to be a part of.  He plans to use the loan to buy cocoa seeds and sacks of fertilizer in the hopes of improving production.

loans.use: To buy cocoa seeds and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fashion blouses, casual and formal wear, jeans and fabric.

loans.name: La Prosperidad 4 Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is one of the members of Prosperidad 4 (Prosperity) group. Her group is located in the areas surrounding Santiago, and comprises five entrepreneurs from one of the poorest communities of this large city, dedicated to running small businesses from their houses and by making walking sales.
Elizabeth is a single mother with three children. She is excited to be taking her first loan with Kiva partner, Esperanza. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business. She sells beauty and cosmetic products by walking and taking them into beauty salons and neighbors' houses. She will use her profits to save and reinvest in her business.
Elizabeth says that her most difficult challenge is to build her house. She enjoys watching television and using the computer. She dreams of having her own house in the near future so that she can stop paying rent. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy beauty and cosmetic products.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es: Florencia, de 31 años de edad, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, esta casada con Filomeno de 37 años, fruto de  esa relación tiene 03 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa situado en la comunidad de Bethel. El trabajo al que Florencia se dedica, es el labrado de tierra; por el cual posee su propia parcela y sobre ella están sembradas las plantas de cacao, café y frutas de la zona. Es así que todos los días, desde muy temprano por la mañana, sale a trabajar en sus fincas en compañía de su pareja, pues ambos saben que el dinero que obtenga podrá salir adelante y cubrir las necesidades de su familia. Por tanto, lo productos que recolecta son vendidos en los centros de acopio ubicados en las ciudades de San Francisco y Quimbiri, lugares donde pagan muy bien los granos y las  frutas que vende. Lleva 08 años realizando esta actividad y lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar, ya que así ve la recompensa luego de tanto tiempo y dedicación sobre sus plantas, sin embargo para ser llevados a los tendales para el proceso de secado, le resulta muy difícil y cansado. En adelante espera adquirir nuevas tierras para así aumentar su productividad. Este será su octavo crédito con MFP, por tal espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para que pueda concretar sus objetivos. En su banco comunal es muy querida por el resto de sus compañeras. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá comprar sacos de  abono natural como estiércol de animales para fertilizar sus tierras y que sea más productivas sus granos de cacao y café.
texts.en:
Florencia, 31, is originally from the city of Quimbiri. She is married to Filomeno, 37, who she has three children with. They all live together in their own house, which is located in the community of Bethel.

Florencia works the land. She owns her own parcel, which is planted with cocoa, coffee, and regional fruits. This is where she spends all of her days. Early in the morning, she goes out to work the fields alongside her husband. They both know that the money they earn will help them to get ahead and to cover their family's needs. They sell what they produce in the central markets of San Francisco and Quimbiri, places where they earn a good profit on the grains and fruits they sell.

She has been doing this work for eight years and her favorite thing about it is the harvest, since it is when all of the time dedicated to her crops pays off. Nevertheless, carrying the harvest to the area where it is dried is very difficult and tiring. In the future, she hopes to acquire more land in order to increase her production.

This will be Florencia's eighth loan with MFP. She hopes she can count on the support of each one of you to help her realize her goals.

Florencia is well loved by the other members of her communal bank. She will use the requested loan to buy sacks of natural fertilizer (animal manure) to fertilize her fields and make them produce more cocoa and coffee.

loans.use: to buy sacks of natural fertilizer

loans.name: Lucero De La Mañana Group

texts.es:
Doña Federica, es una señora casada, tiene 45 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos, 3 de los cuales estan estudiando, se dedica a la venta de ropa típica y como también a la confección de delantales, inició pensando en su superación familiar y hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia, ella cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la confección de pantalones y delantales. 

Organiza un grupo con el objetivo de solicitar un préstamo que servirá para ampliar su capital de produccion, en esta ocasión para la compra de telas típicas para seguir produciendo mas delantales y poder comercializarlos; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a diversas actividades económicas: venta de ropa, alimentos, atención a tienda en general, confección de delantales y pantalones, confección de blusas y a la cianza de aniamales. En el futuro creen que su negocio sera grande y con diferente productos.
texts.en:
Ms. Federica is a 45 year-old married woman. She did not have the opportunity to study at all. She has four children, three of whom are in school. She sells typical clothing and also sews aprons. She started off with her family's betterment in mind, and at this point she has eight years of experience. She counts on the support of her husband, who makes pants and aprons.

She has organized a group [named "Lucero de la Mañana" or "Morning Star" Group] with the goal of requesting a loan to increase her working capital. At this time, she would like to buy typical fabrics in order to continue producing more aprons to sell. The rest of the group members are engaged in various economic activities: clothing sales, food sales, a general store, sewing aprons and pants, sewing blouses, and animal husbandry.

In the future, Federica thinks that her business will be large and will include different products.

loans.use: to buy fabric for sewing aprons

loans.name: San Miguel Juntos Podemos Group

texts.es:
Este banco comunal se llama “San Miguel Juntos Podemos” conformado por 17 emprendedores que se desempeñan en los rubros de amasandería, venta de alimentos, abarrotes, ropa y celulares, principalmente sus negocios se encuentran en una feria libre. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Puente Alto, ciudad de Santiago. 
Elizabeth, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie al fondo del grupo, viste una polera color blanco a rayas y usa anteojos. Se dedica a la producción y venta de pan amasado, desde hace 1 año y 6 meses. Vende pan amasado en su misma casa y para la cocción del pan cuenta con un horno de tambor a leña.
Elizabeth trabaja todos los días en éste negocio a partir de las 2ºº de la tarde, hasta las 9ºº de la noche.
Su mercadería la compra generalmente en supermercados mayoristas.
Con el préstamo comprará materiales para fabricar un horno nuevo para la cocción de su pan. Éste lo pondrá en el patio de su casa. 
Sus metas son cambiar de rubro e instalar un ciber café junto a su marido como socio. 
Ella vive junto a su marido y sus tres hijos de 10, 7 y 2 años de edad. Sus sueños son sacar adelante a su familia y poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Su motivación de continuar con el negocio se debe a la flexibilidad en su horario que le permite estar con sus hijos la mayor cantidad de tiempo posible. 
Elizabeth está muy agradecida de Fondo Esperanza le gusta mucho participar de las reuniones, sobre todo por la buena convivencia y confianza experimentada en el grupo y además le sirve como distracción. 
Puente Alto es una comuna ubicada al norte de Santiago, capital de Chile. Fue fundada como un pequeño pueblo rural a fines del siglo XIX, pero dado su crecimiento demográfico es actualmente una de las comunas con mayor población de Chile, superando los 600 mil habitantes. Es la puerta de entrada a uno de los sectores precordilleranos de la región Metropolitana, conocido como el Cajón del Maipo, sector con espacios de caminatas, cabalgatas, rafting, entre otras actividades y servicios de alojamiento y alimentación.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "San Miguel Juntos Podemos" and comprised of 17 entrepreneurs who are involved in activities such as a bakery, food, groceries, clothing and cell phones sales.  They all belong to the Puente Alto community in the city of Santiago.  Elizabeth, who is pictured standing standing in the back, is dressed in a white, striped top and wearing glasses,   She makes and sells bread and has been in business for a year and six months.  She has a firewood oven in her house where she bakes the bread.  She works every day from 2:00 p.m. until 9:00 p.m.  She usually buys her supplies in wholesale supermarkets.  With the loan she plans to buy materials to make a new bread-baking oven.  She will set it up in the patio of her house.  Her goal is eventually to change business and set up a cybercafé with her husband as a partner.

She lives with her husband and three children, ages 10, 7 and 2.  Her dream is to see her family get ahead and lead a better lifestyle.  She is motivated by the fact that she has a flexible work schedule which allows her to spend more time with her children.  

Elizabeth is very grateful to Fondo Esperanze and she enjoys participating in the meetings, especially because of the fellowship and confidence she has in the group.  Puento Alto is a community north of Santiago, the capital of Chile.
