La señora  Lorena Lizeth  preocupada  por mejorar su vivienda  ha solicitado un financiamiento  para la compara de  materiales de construcción como es arena cemento  mano de obra, piedrín, hierro y pago de mano de obra esto será utilizado para hacer ampliación y mejoramiento de su hogar  y así  ofrecerle  un hogar digno a su familia y también unificar deudas adquiridas por otras Instituciones financieras.
texts.en:
This woman lives in the capital of Managua. She is a responsible and hard-working person with good values.
Lorena Lizeth was worried about improving her home and has requested a loan in order to purchase construction materials like sand, cement, labor, stones, iron and payment for the labor. This will be used in order to make extensions and improvements to her home. With these improvements, she can give her family a decent home and she can also consolidate debts with other financial institutions.

loans.use: improve her home, buy construction materials and pay down debts.

loans.name: Sol Marina

texts.es: Sol es una mujer de 54 años de edad que vive en la Ciudadela 20 de Julio al sur de la ciudad, ella es casada con un comerciante y tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 24 a 27 años que están empleados en empresas;  desde esta comunidad llena de muchos encanto,  trabajo y solidaridad entre sus habitantes, Sol se dedica a la comercialización de mercancía variada, como ropa, calzado y cosméticos en general. Vende  su mercancía principalmente a crédito y está enfocada en  lo que la gente le encargue,  pero también trabaja mediante guías especializadas de productos, porque tiene una clientela que ella misma se esmera en cuidarla y consentirla ,  respondiendo siempre a sus pedidos , así mismo cada día le refieren a nuevos compradores;  su credikiva es el segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con él comprará productos cosméticos de oferta del  catálogo que maneja, calzado y ropa sobre un pedido que le han hecho y esto es justamente lo que hace que su inversión sea exitosa, porque de esta manera  su mercancía rota rápidamente entre los clientes que pagan puntualmente. Cuando en el año 2000 inició su negocio, lo hizo después de un experiencia  muy importante en el mercado en el año 1986, la cual  le sirvió mucho en la temporada actual;  esta es la razón por la cual se le ha facilitado negociar con los mejores proveedores de mercancías, conseguir clientes y sostenerlos satisfechos; Con el anterior financiamiento  ha visto su progreso  en el aumento de su clientela, pues contó con un capital de trabajo adicional.  Su sueño es lograr la sostenibilidad de su negocio para dejar a su familia una herencia de prosperidad y buen ejemplo, su mayor desafío es tener un capital de trabajo disponible para responder prontamente a los nuevos clientes, que cada día son más. Mientras Sol construye su sueño, se esfuerza por mantener una rentabilidad no menor del 26% y trabaja todos los días en su incremento.
texts.en: Sol is a 54 year old woman who lives in the citadel of "20 de Julio" in the city's south end. She is married with a merchant and she has 3 children, aged 24 to 27. They are all employed by private companies. This community is charming with much work and solidarity among its inhabitants. Sol is a merchant of a variety of merchandise, such as clothing, shoes, and cosmetics in general. She sells her merchandise primarily on credit and she focuses herself on her clients' orders, although she also works through catalogues of specialized products. She strives to be attentive and doting to her existing client base and to always respond to their requests, which is the reason why she is referred new clients, daily. Her Kiva loan is the second loan which she accesses through Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo (Kiva Field Partner). With it she will purchase cosmetics products, shoes, and clothing which are on sale through the catalogue which she manages. A large order has been placed and this is exactly the reason why her investment will be a success. She is able to rotate her merchandise quickly among the clients that make their payments on time. When she started out her business in the year 2000, she profited from a very important experience she earned in the field in 1986. It has helped her greatly in her current business. She has allowed her to easily negotiate with the best merchandise providers and to earn a client base and to keep them happy. With the previous loan she observed an increase in her clientele, especially because she had additional capital funds. Her dream is to achieve sustainability for her business, to leave her family with a prosperous inheritance and a good example. Her greatest challenge is having to work with a small capital funds with which to respond quickly to new clients, who increase every day. While Sol builds her dream, she strives to maintain a profit margin of no less than %26 and she works every day to improve it.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics which are on sale, clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Munduli B Group

texts.en:
Sesilia, who is in her mid 40s, is married with two sons who go to school.  She has been selling local brew and fried fish for ten years now.  She works from 10:00 am to 6:00pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.  

This will be Sesilia's first loan from Kiva partner Tujijenge Tanzania. She hopes for a loan to buy more products for making and selling more local brew.  In the future, her dream is to one day be able to pay college fees for her children and to be able to build her own house.

Sesilia will share this loan with her loan group "Munduli B" which has a total of 18 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.  (The day was cloudy. So the photo might not be very clear)

loans.use: to buy products for making more local brew.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario, tiene la edad de 78  años, está viudo, el  vive solo. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de insumos para asistir el almacigo que tiene sembrado. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la siembra de  café y lo que pretende es sembrarlo para así poder ir creciendo con el área plantada y7 poder obtener más producción las próximas cosechas. El quiere ir creciendo con el negocio y así poder tener cada día una fuente de ingresos económicos más grande para el bienestar propio.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Mario is 78 years old, a widower, and he lives alone. He plans on purchasing materials to help him maintain his plantation. He has a plot of farm land which is adequate for a coffee plantation and he plans on sowing with the plan of increasing the plantation area and hence production for the next harvests. He wants to keep expanding his business to have a larger source of income to improve his wellbeing. This is the first loan which he receives through Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). He has not had any previous loans with state banks but Fudecosur has provided him with a loan with greater benefits and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee plantation

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Kwassi

texts.fr:
Kwassi est un homme âgé de 30 ans. Il est célibataire. 
Kwassi a travaillé comme revendeur depuis 2005. Il vend des cartes de recharge de portable de façon ambulante. Il achète les cartes à Lomé. 
Kwassi a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des cartes de recharge. Il veut satisfaire la demande croissante et assurer un avenir meilleur pour lui-même.
texts.en:
Kwassi is a 30-year old man. He is single.

Kwasi has been working as a vendor since 2005. He sells recharge cards for  mobile phones as a street vendor. He stocks up  in Lomé.

Kwasi is seeking his third loan from WAGES in order to buy more recharge cards. He would like to meet the growing demand and ensure a better future for himself.

loans.use: to buy recharge cards for mobile phones

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin, tiene la edad de 47  años, está viudo, el  vive con sus 2 hijos que son su prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de insumos para asistir la siembra del chile que está realizando.  El está realizando este nuevo proyecto porque está dejando ganancias para su bienestar y poder seguir adelante con su familia. El quiere es aumentar la cantidad de terreno sembrado y así conformar una próxima buena cosecha para crecer como productor de chile y tener un futuro con un mejor bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Edwin is 47 years old, a widower, and he lives with his two children on his own property. He plans on purchasing materials with his loan to help him maintain his planned chili plantation. He has started this new project because he wants to keep some savings fro his own well-being and to be able to support his family. He wants to expand his farm land area and to secure a good future harvest of chilies and to have better future with his family. This is the first loan which he receives from Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). He has not had other previous loans with state banks but Fudecosur has granted him a loan with greater benefits and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to start a chili plantation.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Antokia Group

texts.en:
Nickodem, who is in his mid 20s, is unmarried.  He has been running a food market and catering businesses since 2009.  He works from 5:00am to around midnight daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Nickodem's first loan from Kiva partner Tujijenge Tanzania.  He hopes for a loan to buy more food stock for his food market and catering business.

Nickodem will share this loan with his loan group "Antokia" which has a total of 16 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more food stock for a food market and catering business.

loans.name: Entente 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ENTENTE 1 est formé de huit personnes qui habitent toutes dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée  Pauline, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Pauline est mariée à un mécanicien  du nom de Machoudi. Le couple a cinq enfants, dont trois sont encore à leurs charges. Certains des enfants ne sont pas  scolarisés. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Il y a près de onze ans  que Pauline mène comme activité la vente d'"akassa" (aliment local fait à base d'amidon de maïs) à son domicile. C’est la cinquième fois que Pauline sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé. Les crédits antérieurs reçus ont été  bien remboursés. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle Pauline et l'ensemble des membres du groupe ENTENTE 1 désirent obtenir un autre financement.
texts.en:
The "Entente 1 Group" (harmony) is composed of eight persons, all living in the same neighborhood in Benin. Pauline, the representative of the group, is the woman who is raising her hand in the photo. She is married to Machoudi, a mechanic. They have five children, of whom three are still in their care. Some of the children do not attend school. The parents provide together for the family.

Pauline has been selling akassa (a local dish prepared from corn starch) from her home for nearly eleven years. This is the fifth time that Pauline applies for a loan from the microfinance institution Alidé. The previous loans have been repaid on schedule. Eager to bolster her activity and better meet her customers' demand, Pauline and her fellow group members from Entente 1 would like to get a new loan.

loans.use: to buy several sacks of corn.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: Freddy, tiene la edad de 52  años, está casado, el  vive con sus 2 hijos que son su prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia su cafetal. El cuanta con el terreno ya sembrado desde hace varios años y estaba un poco abandonada, el quiere es darle una mejora este año para poderle generar una buena cosecha este año. El quiere  seguirla asistiendo día a día y poderla  establecer en buenas condiciones de producción.  El tiene como meta generarle ganancias a su cafetal y así tener ingresos de este cultivo para su bienestar familiar.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Freddy is 52 years old, married, and he lives with his 2 children, who are his priority. He plans on purchasing materials to help him maintain his coffee plantation. He has had an already established plantation for many years and it is somewhat uncared for. He wants to maintain it this year to have a better harvest. He wants to keep working on it day after day to establish good conditions for production. This is the first loan which he receives from Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). He has not had any previous loans with state banks but Fudecosur has granted him a loan bearing greater benefits and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee plantation.

loans.name: La Solucion Group

texts.es:
L. señora Celia D. 39 años D. edad, Socia D. L. Alcancía comunal L. Solución, madre soltera su hijo menor D. edad estudia en el colegio del estado. Solicito el préstamo para compra D. un ganado vacuno para que pueda criar y así poder incrementar L. venta D. leche, ha podido incrementar el volumen D. sus ventas, L. socia  quiere mejorar su negocio sembrando mas pastales para sus ganados vacunos, su objetivo es para tener una calidad D. vida y que su hijo estudie en un mejor colegio del estado. L. socia está ubicada en L. primera fiL. con compra D. color naranja. 
El préstamo es D. s/.1000.00 Nuevos Soles.
texts.en:
Celia is 39 years old and a member of the communal bank "L. Solucion", meaning "The Solution". She is a single mother and her youngest child attends a state-run high school. She requests a loan to purchase a dairy calf to raise and to increase her milk production. She has been able to increase her sales volume. She wants to improve her business by planting mO. hay for her cattle. Her objective is to have a quality life and to have her son attend a better high school in the state. On the photograph she is in the first row, wearing orange.

The loan is in the amount of S/. 1000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: María Francisca

texts.es:
Este cliente reside en esta ciudad capital   de Managua, la señora María Francisca se ha caracterizado por ser una dama honrada  trabajadora con buenos valores morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido  ganarse el aprecio de sus  compañeros de labores. 
Hace unos días se presento ante las oficinas para solicitar un crédito para ser invertido para  solucionara y unificar deudas con otras instituciones que tiene pendiente así  quedar trabajando con esta Institución
texts.en: This loan client resides in this capital city of Managua.  Ms. Mary Frances has been characterized as an honest working lady with good moral values and she has earned the esteem of her fellow workers.  A few days ago, she came to the office to apply for a loan, to be invested in the consolidation of loans that she has pending with other institutions, so that she can work with just this one institute.

loans.use: Personal expenses [consolidate loans]

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Maria, es socia del Banco Comunal los Claveles, tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 20 y 18 años de edad. María tiene un restaurante, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, etc., para la preparación de alimentos y la otra parte en la compra de servicios como: platos, tazas, cucharas, etc.
Maria Magdalena antes trabajaba como cocinera en un restaurante junto su capital y decidió abrir su propio negocio. Le gusta FINCA Perú, porque le ayudan con los préstamos y se puede ahorrar, aprende en la capacitaciones los valores, sobre la familia, los hijos y sobre todo a ser puntual.
texts.en:
Maria, is a member of the Carnation Community Bank. She is 42 years old, married and has 2 children ages 20 and 18. Mary has a restaurant. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of groceries like; rice, sugar, noodles, oil, etc., for the preparation of food.  The other other part of the loan she will buy service items such as; plates, cups, spoons, etc. 
 Maria Magdalena previously worked as a cook in a restaurant near the capital and decided to open her own business. She likes FINCA Peru because of their help with loans and allows her to save. She learns training skills for her family, children and on top of that, to be punctual [with loan repayments].

loans.use: to by rice, sugar and noodles

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy shoes parts: heel, soles, nails, cement, etc.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha es socia del Banco Comunal los Claveles, tiene 29 años, es conviviente y tiene una hijo de 9 años.
Martha es dueña de un restaurante, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mesas y sillas para su negocio. Martha antes trabajaba en sociedad, pero tenían muchos problemas con su socio y terminaron la  sociedad, desidiendo abrir su negocio solo con su esposo y le va bien. Desde que ésta en FINCA Perú ha mejorado su casa y le gusta por la facilidad de los préstamos se trabaja a base de confianza y sus ahorros gana intereses, con las capacitaciones mejoró su relación con su pareja y familia. Su sueño es poder comprarse un carro propio.
texts.en: Martha is a member of the Carnation Community Bank. She is 29 years old, married and has a 9 year old son.  Martha owns a restaurant, the loan she is requesting she will be invested in the purchase of tables and chairs for her business. Martha used to work in a partnership, but had many problems with her partner and the partnership ended.  She wanted to open her own business with just her husband and it is doing well. Since joining FINCA Peru she has improved her home and likes the easy loan process that works on trust and allows their savings to earn interest. With the training provided it has improved her relationship with both her partner and her family. Her dream is to buy her own car.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: improve his home.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra es socia del Banco Comunal Los Claveles, tiene 28 años, es casada con 2 hijos de 8 y 6 años.
Se dedica a la fabricación de Retablos Ayacuchanos, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de: yeso, clavos, goma, pintura, harina. Sandra y su esposo se dedica a la fabricación de Retablos Ayacuchanos, ambos provienen de padres artesanos se conocieron se casaron y desarrollan ese arte, atienden pedidos su esposo viaja a las ferias a exponer sus trabajos. Le gusta FINCA Perú porque les enseñan los valores, a ahorrar y en las capacitaciones le hablan del matrimonio, familia, negocios y es bueno porque aprenden más. Si tuvo algunas dificultades a veces cuando le hacen pedidos no le llegan a pagar en su totalidad. Su sueño es construir su casa y poder exportar sus trabajos.
texts.en:
Sandra is a member of the communal bank Los Claveles. She is a 28-year-old married mother of two. Her children are 8 and 6 years old. She earns her living making Ayacuchan retablos (wooden boxes decorated with images and customs of the area). She plans to use the loan to purchase: plaster, nails, glue, paint and flour. 

Sandra and her husband make Ayacuchan retablos. Their parents are all artisans too. They met, got married and developed their art and now they process orders together. Her husband travels to fairs to show their work. Sandra likes FINCA Peru because it teaches people values like saving money. Also, during trainings they talk about marriage, family and business, which is good because they learn more this way. Sometimes she has had trouble when people order retablos but then can't pay in full. Sandra's dream is to build her own house and export her work.

loans.use: to purchase: plaster, nails, glue, paint and flour.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Javier, tiene la edad de 42  años, está casado, el  vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado y en producción lo que pretende es generar este año una mejor cosecha. El quiere generar una  mejor plantación para este año y así obtenerle el máximo de ganancias para seguir adelante con sus metas y el bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Javier is 42 years old, married, and he lives with his 3 children and his wife. They are his greatest priority. He plans on purchasing products to help him maintain his coffee plantation. He has an already established and productive coffee plantation and he plans on improving the yield of his harvest this year. He wants to improve his plantation this year to increase his profits, to meet his goals, and to improve the wellbeing of the family. This is the first loan which he receives from Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). He has not had previous loans through state banks but Fudecosur has granted him a loan with greater benefits and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Lisbeth Yurico

texts.es:
Lisbeth es socia del Banco Comunal los Claveles, tiene 23 años, es conviviente, con un hijo de 3 años.
Lisbeth tiene una fabrica de ladrillos. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de terreno para la elaboración de ladrillos. Aprendió de éste negocio desde niña pues sus padres se dedican a esto, cuando se junto con su esposo decidieron independizarse. Le iba todo bien hasta que en éste año con las constantes lluvias se malograron sus ladrillos y tuvo perdidas, pero se está recuperando. Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco comunal en FINCA Perú, por la ayuda en los créditos se trabaja a base de confianza, aprende mucho de las capacitaciones que recibe de su promotora, les enseñan a trabajar su dinero, a no rendirse frente a los obstáculos que se les puedan presentar. Su meta es construir su casa propia y que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Lisbeth is a member of the communal bank "Los Claveles". She is 23 years old, married common-law, and she has a 3-year old child.

Lisbeth has a brick production business. The loan which she requests will be invested in the purchase of land where to make bricks. She learned this business when she was a girl from her parents, who had this occupation. When she married they decided to become independent. Everything was going well until this year when the bricks were all malformed from the constant rain and they experienced losses. But they are recovering. She appreciates the communal bank meetings at Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the loans which are granted on trustworthiness. She learns a great deal from the training sessions that they receive from their representative. They learn how to work with their money and how to not give up when faced with adversities. Her goal is to build a house of her own and to keep her business growing.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of farm land.

loans.name: Kondokpo-Ac1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe KONDOKPO-AC1 est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et qui habitent la même zone. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Sikirath est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Sikirath est née en  1972 dans une ville du Bénin. Sikirath est mariée à un Couturier du nom de Mouzakirou. Le couple a trois enfants encore à leurs charges. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents et sont tous scolarisés. Sikirath n’a jamais été à l’école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille, Sikirath mène comme activité la vente de chaussures. De façon secondaire Sikirath vend divers produits depuis trois ans. Sikirath s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Sikirath sollicite, ensemble avec les deux autres membres du groupe KONDOKPO-AC1, un cinquième crédit. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group KONDOKPO-AC1 is comprised of three persons who are friends and who live in the same area. The group’s representative, by the name of Sikirath, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Sikirath was born in 1972, in a city in Bénin. She is married to a clothier by the name of Mouzakirou. The couple has three children, who are still in their care. The children live together with their parents and are all in school. To support herself and her family, Sikirath has a business selling shoes. Secondarily, she has been selling a variety of products for three years. She gets her supplies in Benin.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her turnover and her revenues, Sikirath, along with the two other members of her group KONDOKPO-AC1, is requesting a fifth loan. The previously received loans have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Jesús Irving

texts.es:
Este cliente reside en esta ciudad capital   de Managua, el señor Jesús Irvin  se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre honrado  trabajador con buenos valores y principios  morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido  ganarse el aprecio de sus  compañeros de labores. 
Se presento ante esta oficina  de  Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para ser invertido en la compra de materiales de construcción, como es lamina   de zic perlìnes y  pago de  mano obra, este crédito será utilizado para cambiar techo en mal estado de su vivienda.
texts.en: He lives in the capital city of Managua. Jesus Irvin is known to be an honest, hardworking man with good personal values and morals. He has won the appreciation of his work colleagues. He came to the offices of Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) to request a loan to invest in the purchase of construction materials, such as zinc sheets, and structural steel, and to pay for the labor costs. This loan will be used to change the roofing of his house which is currently in poor condition.

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
Teodora es socia del Banco Comunal los Claveles, tiene 35 años es madre soltera con un hijo de 15 años. Tiene una tienda de abarrotes, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, etc., para surtir su mercadería.
Decidió abrir sus tienda para ayudarse con los gastos de su hijo. Le gusta FINCA Perú, por los préstamos que recibe de su Banco Comunal en FINCA, aprendió a ser independiente, los valores, a seguir adelante,  ahorrar, como invertir su dinero pasa momentos de distracción con las socias de su banco. Su sueño es que su hijo sea un gran profesional.
texts.en:
Teodora is a member of the communal bank "Los Claveles". She is 35 years old and the single mother of a 15-year old son. She has a grocery store and the loan which she requests will be invested in the purchase of grocery products such as: rice, sugar, pastas, milk, etc, to supply her inventory.

She decided to open her store to cover her son's expenses. She appreciates Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the loans that she receives through her Finca communal bank. She learned to become independent, to adopt values, to move forward, to save money, and how to invest her money. She is entertained by the time she spends with the other members of the bank. Her dream is for her son to have a successful career.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, pasta, and milk

loans.name: Martin

texts.es: Martin, tiene la edad de 43  años, está casado, el  vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno apto y la experiencia para el buen manejo y buena producción de su cafetal, por lo cual quiere invertir en su plantación para mejorarla y asi obtener mejores resultados de ella. El quiere generarle las mejores ganancias a su cafetal parea poder seguir adelante con sus proyectos y también para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida con mayores facilidades.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Martin is 43 years old, married, and he lives with his 2 children and his wife. They are his greatest priority. With his loan he plans on purchasing products to maintain his coffee plantation. He has an adequate plot of land and he has the experience to manage his coffee plantation and to make it productive. He wants to invest in his plantation to improve it in order to obtain better results. He wants to generate better profits through his coffee plantation to be able to keep his projets moving forward and to provide his family with a better and more comfortable quality of life. This is his first loan through Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). He has not had other loans with state banks, but Fudecosur has provided him with a loan with greater benefits and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to maintain his plantation

loans.name: María Lidia

texts.es:
Este cliente reside en esta ciudad capital   de Managua, la señora María Lidia  se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer honrada  trabajadora con buenos valores y principios  morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido  ganarse el aprecio de todos sus  compañeros de trabajo. 
Se presento ante esta oficina  de  Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para ser invertido en la compra de materiales de construcción, como es lamina   de zic perlìnes y  pago de  mano obra, este crédito será utilizado para cambiar techo en mal estado de su vivienda y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María Lidia lives in the capital city of Managua.  She has stood out fas a person for being an honest, hard working woman with good values and moral principles since she has always known how to win over the esteem of her coworkers.

She came by this Ceprodel office to request a loan to buy building materials and supplies, like zinc metal sheets and purlines, and to pay labor costs.  She will use the loan to replace the roof on her house and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to carry out some home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Djromahuton-Avotrou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DJROMAHUTON-AVOTROU est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et qui habitent le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Bernadette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Bernadette est née le 23 janvier 1981 dans une ville du Bénin. Bernadette est mariée à un carreleur du nom de Crépin. Le couple a quatre enfants tous à leur charges. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents et sont tous scolarisés. Bernadette a fréquentée l’école jusqu’au primaire puis Bernadette a appris le métier de coiffure ; Un métier qu'elle exerce passionnément depuis quatre ans. De façon secondaire, Bernadette vend des mèches et divers produits pour les cheveux. Bernadette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Bernadette sollicite, ensemble avec les membres du groupe DJROMAHUTON-AVOTROU, un quatrième crédit. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group DJROMAHUTON-AVOTROU is comprised of three people who are friends living in the same district in Benin. The group’s representative, by the name of Bernadette, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Bernadette was born on January 23, 1981 in a city in Bénin. She is married to a tile-layer by the name of Crépin. The couple has four children, who are all in their care. The children live together with their parents and are all in school.

Bernadette attended primary school and then learned the trade of hair dressing, which she has work at passionately for four years. Secondarily, she sells hair extensions and a variety of hair care products. She gets her supplies at a market in Benin.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her turnover and her revenues, Bernadette, along with the others in members of the group DJROMAHUTON-AVOTROU, is requesting a fourth loan. The previously received loans have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and cosmetics

loans.name: José Domingo

texts.es:
Este cliente reside en esta ciudad capital   de Managua, el  señor  José Domingo se ha caracterizado por ser una persona  honrada  trabajadora con buenos valores y principios  morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido  ganarse el aprecio de todos sus  compañeros de trabajo. 
Se presento ante esta oficina  de  Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para ser invertido en  la ampliación de su negocio  tales como compra de materiales de construcción, como  arena cemento, bloques  estribos piedrín y  pago de  mano obra, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia con el crecimiento de su negocio.
texts.en:
This client lives in this capital city of Managua.  José Domingo has stood out as a hard working, honest person with good personal values and moral principles since he’s succeeded in winning the esteem of his coworkers.

He came by this Ceprodel office to request a loan to invest in the enlargement of his business.  He will buy building materials and supplies like sand, cement, concrete blocks, struts, gravel and will pay for labor costs to provide his family with a better quality of life with his business’ expansion.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy pigs and cattle.

loans.name: Antonio Beltrán

texts.es:
Este cliente  tiene su domicilio  en  ciudad de Managua capital, el  señor Antonio Beltran  se ha caracterizado por ser una `persona honrada  trabajadora con buenos valores y principios  morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido  ganarse el aprecio de todos sus  compañeros de trabajo. 
Se presento ante esta oficina  de  Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para ser invertido en mejoramiento  su vivienda como  enladrillar su casa ya que actualmente es de suelo invertirá en la compra de materiales de construcción,  cerámica,  cemento boom para porcelana  y  pago de  mano obra, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
This client has his address in the capital city of Managua.  Antonio Beltran has stood out as an honest, hard working person with good personal values and moral principles having won over the esteem of his coworkers.

He came by this Ceprodel office to request a loan that will be used for home improvements like installing tile flooring since the floor is currently dirt.  He will buy building materials and supplies:  tile, porcelain adhesive, and will pay labor costs to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Mariawame Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MARIAWAME est composé de trois personnes, qui vivent toutes dans le même quartier et se font mutuellement confiance. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Mariette Ismène est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Mariette Ismène est née le 04 juillet 1987 au Bénin et est mariée à un enseignant du nom de Mohamed. Le couple a deux enfants à charge. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés et vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Mariette Ismène vient en aide à son mari en assurant avec lui les charges de la maison, grâce au revenu issu de son activité. Mariette Ismène  n’a fréquenté l’école que jusqu’au secondaire.  Depuis sept ans environs, Mariette Ismène  vend de la friperie, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants.  Mariette Ismène  achète ses produits dans l’un des marchés du  Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Mariette Ismène  sollicite un second crédit,  ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MARIAWAME.
texts.en:
The group MARIAWAME is comprised of three persons who live in the same neighborhood and who mutually trust one another. This is the second time that the group has requested financial aid from ALIDé, so as to boost their level of business. The group’s representative, by the name of Mariette Ismène, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. She was born on July 4, 1987 in Benin. And she is married to a teacher by the name of Mohamed. The couple has two children to support. Both children are in school and live together with their parents. Mariette Ismène helps her husband out by ensuring, along with him, that household expenses are met, thanks to the income from her business.

Mariette Ismène attended secondary school only. For about seven years, she has sold second-hand clothing, which enables her to support herself and her children. She purchases her goods at a market in Benin. Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her revenues, she, along with the other members of the group MARIAWAME, is requesting a second loan.

loans.use: to buy used clothing

loans.name: Juana Rosa

texts.es:
Este cliente  tiene su domicilio  en  ciudad de Managua capital, la  señora Juana Rosa se ha caracterizado por ser una persona honrada  trabajadora con buenos principios  morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido  ganarse el aprecio de todos sus  compañeros de trabajo. 
Se presento ante esta oficina  de  Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para ser invertido en mejoramiento  su vivienda como es la compra de materiales de construcción,  bloques piedra cantera, cemento  arena piedrín hierro  y  pago de  mano obra, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, que es por la quien trabaja y se esfuerza diariamente.
texts.en:
This client has her address in the capital city of Managua.  Juana Rosa has stood out as an honest, hard working person with good personal values and moral principles having won over the esteem of her customers.

She came by this Ceprodel office to request a loan that will be used for home improvements.  She will buy building materials and supplies like concrete blocks, paving stones, cement, sand, gravel, iron rods and will pay labor costs to provide a better quality of life for her family which is who she works and strives for daily.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Yorleny

texts.es: Yorleny, tiene la edad de 33  años, está soltera, el  vive con sus 2 hijos   que son su mayor prioridad. ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de herramientas para realizar la reparación de celulares.  Ella cuenta con  el local  en una área comercial y ya tiene varios clientes. Ella lo que pretende es  poder dar un servicio  a sus clientes en mejores condiciones  par así crecer con la clientela y tener cada día mejores ganancias para su bienestar  y la de sus hijos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Yorleny, 33, is single living with her two children who are her greatest priority in life.  She intends to use the loan to buy tools to repair cell phones.  She has a locale in a commercial area and has several customers already.  What she would like to do is provide customer service in better conditions so that her customer base will grow and she’ll have increased daily profits for her and her children’s wellbeing.

This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR.  She’s had no previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with the best terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy tools to repair cell phones.

loans.name: Chocuz 1 Group

texts.es:
Doña Antonia es una señora casada, tiene 46 años D. edad, no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, tiene 4 hijos los cuales estudian,, se dedica al comercio a la venta D. artículos D. consumo diario en una tienda, antes D. tener la tienda ella vendia solo golosinas pero ahora cuenta con una tienda con mas productos, y lleva 10 años D. experiencia con este negocio, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica a la cofección D. tejidos. 

Orgasniza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra D. mercaderias: aguas gaseosa, jugos, comida enlatada, golosinas, jabones, azucar, etc. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a la crianza D. animales, a la vena D. frutas, y a la atenciona a tienda en general. En el futuro espera tener varios locales en la comunidad donD. vive.
texts.en:
Antonia is a married woman.  She’s 46 years old and never had the opportunity to go to school.  She has four children who are studying.  She sells basic need items in a store.  Before having the store she used to sell only snacks but she now has a store stocked with more products.  She has 10 years experience in this business.  She enjoys her husband’s support; he is a textile weaver.

She organized a group to request a loan that will be used to buy merchandise: water, soft drinks, juices, canned food, snacks, soap, sugar, etc.  The other group members raise animals, sell fruit and run a general store.  In the future she expects to have several stores in the community where she lives.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es: Ronald, tiene la edad de 43  años, esta casado, el  vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar compra de fertilizantes para su café. El pretende realizar una buena asistencia de su cultivo para poder mejorar la cosecha. El quiere generarle ganancias y mejorar la producción y así poderle ofrecer a su familia un mejor bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Ronald is 43 years old, married living with his three children and his wife who are his greatest priority in life.  He intends to use the loan to buy fertilizer for his coffee crops.  He intends to provide good care to his crops in order to improve his harvest.  He wants to generate profits and improve production to provide his family with better family wellbeing.

This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He has had no previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR has provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Aidote-N'venanminde Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AIDOTE-N'VENANMINDE est composé de trois  personnes qui  sont de la même famille. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier  de ALIDé  afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Souliatou Layé est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Souliatou Layé est née le douze janvier 1979 au Bénin et est mariée à un certain Marius.  Le couple à un  enfant qui est scolarisé et est à leur charge. Souliatou Layé vit ensemble avec son mari et son enfant. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par le couple. Pour y parvenir, Souliatou Layé mène comme activité depuis deux  ans la vente de pagne. A côté de cette activité qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux  de ses enfants, Souliatou Layé vend des beignets. Souliatou Layé s’approvisionne dans le plus grand marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu Souliatou Layé sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AIDOTE-N'VENANMINDE, un second crédit. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: The Aidote-N'Venanminde group is composed of three persons from the same family. This is the second time that this group is requesting ALIDé's financial support in order to increase their level of activity. The group's representative, named Souliatou Layé, is the woman raising her hand on the picture. Souliatou Layé was born in Benin on January 12, 1979. She is married a man named Marius. The couple has one dependent child, who goes to school. Souliatou Layé lives together with her husband and her child. The couple provides for their various household expenses. To this end, Souliatou Layé has had a pagne-selling business for two years (pagnes are a traditional West-African cloth). In addition to this activity, which allows her to support herself and her child, Souliatou Layé sells fritters. Souliatou Layé gets her supplies from Benin's largest market. In the pursuit of customer satisfaction and to increase her sales and revenues, Souliatou Layé is requesting a second loan together with the other members of her group, Aidote-N'Venanminde. The first loan was correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy pieces of fabric.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: El sr. Fernando oriundo de la localidad de el Torno, su actividad es la explotación de áridos en el rio Pirai desde hace mucho tiempo, trabaja con su padre, a quien ayuda y de ahí aprendió el oficio, es un joven con ganas de superación el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de una moto para poder transportarse hasta su fuente de trabajo, el Sr. Fernando esta agradecido con nuestra entidad por haber confiado en ellos y brindarles un apoyo para poder obtener una moto y tener otra fuente de ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fernando is from El Torno.  He has worked extracting river rock from the Pirai River for a long time.  He works helping his father and that’s how he learned the occupation.  He is a young man with a strong drive to get ahead.  He will use the loan to buy a motorcycle to use to get to work with.

Fernando is grateful to our firm for having trusted them and provided support to get a motorcycle to have another source of income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Ajonjoli Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama “AJONJOLÍ” y se encuentra ubicado en el estado de Morelos en México. La mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la elaboración de dulces típicos utilizando amaranto, cacahuate, semilla, tamarindo, entre otros, cabe mencionar la elaboración de obleas, la oblea es un postre típico de México, hecho con dos galletas dentro de las cuales hay dulce de leche, a menudo acompañada de leche condensada, chispas de chocolate, coco rallado, dulce de mora, queso o mermelada. Las galletas están hechas normalmente de harina de trigo, midiendo aproximadamente 20 centímetros de diámetro y 1 milímetro  de espesor, la cual es originaria de Huazulco puesto que fue la primera población que inició esta actividad, este producto es exportado a otros lugares. Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora LILIA la cual tiene un negocio de venta y producción de oblea, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora quien desea invertir en su negocio para la mejora de su negocio y calidad de vida de su familia. Quiere este prestamo para comprar más materia prima para la elaboración de sus obleas como dulce, leche, galletas etc. una de sus metas más importantes es el lograr brindarles una carrera a sus hijos y lograr un posicionamiento a nivel nacional. En la foto se muestra las colchas que vende otra de las integrantes del grupo.
texts.en:
This group, called Ajonjoli, is located in the Mexican state of Morelos. Most of the people who live there earn their living making sweets that are typical of the region. To make them, they use amaranth, peanuts, seeds and tamarind, among other ingredients.

There are also sweets called obleas. Obleas are typical Mexican sweets consisting of two wafers with a dulce de leche filling. They often include condensed milk, pieces of chocolate, grated coconut, blackberry filling, cheese or jam. The wafers are usually made from wheat flour and measure approximately 20 centimeters across and 1 millimeter in thickness. Obleas originated in Huazulco since the inhabitants there were the first people to make these sweets. Obleas are exported to other places.

Lilia is one of the members of this group. She has a store where she makes and sells obleas. She is a very responsible, hardworking person. Lilia would like to invest in her store in order to improve it as well as her family's quality of life. She plans to use this loan to to purchase more ingredients such as jam, milk and wafers etc. to make obleas. One of her most important goals is to help her children find careers which will allow them to achieve recognition on a national level. In the photo, you can see the other members of the group holding up the bedspreads that they sell.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients such as jam, milk and wafers to make obleas (Mexican sweets).

loans.name: Edwin Ismanel

texts.es: El señor Edwin, es un cliente antiguo  de la institución, que demostró tener buen comportamiento de pago y un trato amable y Cortez en la evaluación que se le hizo, el cliente se dedica al transporte publico (taxi), en la ciudad de el alto de La Paz Bolivia, razón por la cual  se levanta a tempranas horas de la madrugada para poder cumplir con la ganancia diaria que se puso como meta, que es la de bolivianos 200, el dinero que solícita es para el mantenimiento de su movilidad ya que le esta presentando algunas fallas y quiere hacerlo revisar y así poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, la esposa se dedica a la venta de regalos en la zona de villa Fátima de la ciudad de la Paz, los días viernes y sábados en los locales de fiesta que existen  en esta zona, trabaja hasta altas horas de la noche (11:30 pm), la familia lucha para llegar a tener un patrimonio estable y poder brindar a sus hijo una vida mejor el Sr. Edwin es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Edwin has been working with this lending institution for a long time now. He has done an excellent job of making loan payments and has proven himself to be kind and courteous. Edwin earns his living driving a taxi in the city of El Alto in La Paz, Bolivia. He has to get up early in the morning to go to work and meet his goal for daily earnings, 200 bolivianos. 

Edwin has requested this loan in order to make some car repairs as his car has a few problems and he'd like to get them checked out. That way, he will be able to provide better client service. His wife works selling gifts in the villa Fátima neighborhood of La Paz on Fridays and Saturdays in the parts of the neighborhood where people party. She works late into the night (11:30 pm). Edwin's family works hard to earn a stable living and give their children a better future. Edwin is a very hardworking person and is grateful to the lending institution for its support.

loans.use: to make car repairs.

loans.name: Sonia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Sonia es una pequeña comerciante, que junto a su esposo trabajan en su casa de habitación, el negocio es una pulpería que inicio hace seis años y que  ha venido creciendo al incrementar su inventario con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado en varios ciclos, también vende tortilla pues la demanda es mucha, logrando así la captación de sus clientes.
Pues como madre está contenta ya que puede trabajar y cuidar de sus hijos al mismo tiempo.
Con este nuevo préstamo será para la inversión de compra de quintales de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz, productos de uso personal, como jabón de baño, cremas, cosméticos, shampoo, productos de limpieza. Productos que se venden mucho por ser necesario en nuestra higiene. Su objetivo es tener mejores resultados de ingresos ya que los tiene que pagar sus compromisos de pago de agua, luz, medicina, y seguir teniendo un buen comportamiento de pago en la institución.
texts.en:
Sonia is a small business owner. She works out of her house together with her husband. They own a small grocery store which they opened six years ago. They have been able to grow their business thanks to various cycles of AFODENIC funding which they used to increase their inventory. They also sell tortillas. There is a high demand for tortillas and this has allowed them to increase their number of customers. As a mother, Sonia is happy because she is able to work and take care of her children at the same time. 

She plans to use this new loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, corn, and personal products like soap, lotion, cosmetics, shampoo and cleaning products. These products sell quickly because we need them for hygienic reasons. Sonia's goal is to increase her income as she has to pay the water bill and the electricity bill as well as pay for medicine and continue meeting her loan payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase food and personal hygiene products in order to increase sales at her small grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase jewelry.

loans.name: Estrella De Luz Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Estrella de luz" está ubicado en el estado de México. Está conformado por nueve integrantes, entre ellas esta la señora María nos platica que inicio la venta de dulces aproximadamente desde hace un año ya que los ingresos de su esposo no eran suficientes para cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Ella tiene dos hijas la mayor esta cursando la educación superior y la otra cursa la primaria, nos platica que su puesto era muy pequeño y con el tiempo ha crecido, principio solo vendía dulces y ahora vende botanas y refrescos, el puesto lo tiene frente a su casa. Quiere este prestamo para invertir en mercancia como botanas, dulces y refrescos para tener más ganancias y así poder ahorrar ya que ambiciona tener una tienda de abarrotes con local propio pues quiere que sus hijas no tengan tantas carencias, una vida mejor y poder brindarles una carrera profesional para un mejor futuro. Observaciones, la señora que no se ve bien en la foto se llama Marisol.
texts.en:
This group is called “Estrella de Luz” (Star of Light) and is located in the State of México.  It has nine members.  Among them is María who told us that she started selling sweets about a year ago since her husband’s income was insufficient to cover household expenses.

She has two daughters.  The oldest is in higher education and the other one is in elementary school.  She relates that her stand was very small but, in time, it’s grown.  At the beginning she only sold candy but now she sells snacks and soft drinks.  The stand is located in her front yard.

She wants the loan to buy merchandise like snacks, sweets and soft drinks in order to have more profits so that she can save up because she wants to have a grocery store in a locale of her own because she’d like it if her daughters didn’t have so many unmet needs, a better life and to be able to provide them with professional careers for a better future.

Observation: the woman’s name who isn’t clearly visible in the photo is Marisol.

loans.use: to invest in merchandise like snacks, sweets and soft drinks.

loans.name: Hijas De Sion 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Maria is the group coordinator of her group, Hijas D. Sion 1 & 2. This group has 10 members. The group is based in Los Alcarrizos, a dusty industrial town.

Maria runs a small business selling empanadas (filled dough of meat, eggs or vegetables). She dedicates herself to selling this meal from her house and producing income for her family. She has three children and they are live together with her husband and her children's father. 

Maria is really excited to develop her business, which she started four years ago with some of her savings. She is committed to do a business and help her husband with extras income. This is her first Esperanza loan. She wants to use her business profits to save.

Her dreams are to have her own house, and thanks to her business, her savings and the Lord, she will get it. Her favorite thing to do is to play sports, especially softball.

loans.use: to buy a gas tank for cooking

loans.name: Marco Tulio

texts.es: Marco Tulio, tiene la edad de 60  años, está casado, el  vive con su hija y su esposa  que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el dinero realizar la compra de los abonos y  hacer la renovación de su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado en producción y lo  que le quiere es generarle las próximas cosechas una buena producción. el quiere establecer un cafetal bueno y así obtenerle ingresos económicos para el bienestar de su familia y de el también Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marco Tulio is 60 years old, married and lives with his daughter and wife who are his greatest priorities in life.  He intends to use the money to buy manure to renew his coffee plantation.  He has the field already planted and in production and what he wants to do is generate better production in the next harvest.  He wants to establish a good coffee plantation so that it will produce good income for his family’s and his own wellbeing.

This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He has had no previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy manure and to care for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Apolonia

texts.es: Apolonia, tiene la edad de 72  años, está viuda, ella  vive con su hijo que es su mayor prioridad. Ella lo que quiere es comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. Ella cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación del cultivo y lo que quiere es asistir esa siembra que hizo para empezar a producir cosecha. Ella lo que quiere es generar las ganancias  para su bienestar y la de su hijo y a la vez poder salir con el crédito adelante y establecerse un pequeño cafetal. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Apolonia is 72 years old.  She’s a widow living with her son who is her main priority in life.  What she wants is to buy farming supplies for coffee crop maintenance.  She has a field that is apt for this crop and she wants to support the planting she did so that it will start to produce a harvest.  She wants to generate profits for her own and for her son’s wellbeing as well as to use the loan to get ahead and establish a small coffee plantation for herself.

This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR.  She has had no previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR has provided her the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: David

texts.es: David, tiene la edad de 32  años, está soltero y vive solo. El  lo que pretende con su crédito es realizar la compra de abono para abonar su plantación de café. El cuenta con el terreno apto y ya sembrado con producciones anteriores y lo que pretende es mejorar la producción este año. El quiere poder seguir adelante con su proyecto de café y establecerse como un caficultor de la zona y a su vez generar las ganancias necesarias para su bienestar familiar y su futuro.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
David is 32 years old, single and lives alone.  He plans to use his loan to buy fertilizers to fertilize his coffee plantation.  He has a suitable plot of land which is already sown with existing plants.  This year he plans to improve his production.  He would like to move ahead with his coffee project and establish himself as a coffee grower in his area.  At the same time, he would like to make enough profits to look after his family's well-being and provide for their future.

This is the first loan that David has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Margaritas Uno Group

texts.es:
Gloria Modesta es una señora casada, tiene 37 años D. edad, no tuvo la oportunidad D. asistir a la escuela, se dedica a vender artículos D. consumo diario en una tienda, inició con poco capital y una tienda pequeña y al momento lleva 5 años D. experiencia en este oficio. 

Organiza un grupo con el fin D. solicitar un préstamo, que lo invertirá en la tienda que tiene, va a comprar mas mercadería tales como: aguas gaseosas, jugos, comida enlatada, golosinas, dulces, gomas D. mascar, etc; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a diversas actividades: crianza D. animales, atención a tienda D. consumo diario y a la venta D. frutas. En el futuro espera ver su negocio siendo una gran abarrotería.
texts.en:
Gloria Modesta is a 37 year-old married lady who did not have the opportunity to attend school.  Her business is selling basic household products in a store.  She started her business with just a little capital and a small store.  Now she has five years experience in this traD..

Gloria Modesta has formed a group to request a loan which she will invest in her store.  She will buy more merchandise such as soda, juice, canned food, candies, sweet treats, chewing gum, etc.  The other members of the group work in different business activities such as: raising animals, working in a general store and selling fruit.  In the future, Gloria Modesta hopes to see her business become a big grocery store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es: Vicente, tiene la edad de 54 años, está casado y vive con su esposa y sus 5 hijos, que son su mayor prioridad. el pretende con el dinero realizar la compra de almacigo para sembrarlo. El cuenta con el terreno y tiene una parte que se encuentra en condiciones regulares por lo cual sembrara mas cantidad de matas para poblar esa área y mejor la calidad del cafetal. El lo que pretende es generar ingresos para el bienestar de su familia y así poder seguir adelante con sus proyectos y mejorar su cafetal. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Vicente is 54 years old and married.  He lives with his wife and five children who are his main priority in life.  He plans to use his money to buy seedlings to sow.  He has a plot of land and part of it is in decent condition so he will sow a larger quantity of plants to cover this area and improve the quality of his coffee plantation.  What he plans to do is generate income for the well-being of his family.  He plans to make progress in his projects and improve his coffee plantation.

This is the first loan that Vicente has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy seedlings

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen  vive en Soledad con su esposo y sus hijos en las edades de 19 a 22 años, allí se dedica al comercio como actividad principal, a la cual se aferró para apoyar la gestión de su esposo en el hogar, pues hasta antes de emprender Carmen su negocio de mercancías a crédito, él tenía toda la carga de su hogar. Hace 10 años  la  hermana de Carmen  le ha enviado  calzado, suéteres bermudas, blusas y jeans  para la venta y con ello ha logrado una estructura de clientes fijos que permanentemente le encargan productos y le recomiendan nuevos compradores.  Este es el quinto financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización a la que ha estado vinculada hace 13 años y que ha apoyado su formación empresarial y orientado la inversión, con la cual ha tenido un visible mejoramiento y un adicional capital de trabajo, que la ha ayudado a generar mayores utilidades, eso sí imprimiéndole su trabajo y  aplicando sus valores morales para responder a estas obligaciones mientras beneficia a su hogar, con el que sueña lograr el bienestar de su familia especialmente en el tema de educación profesional  para sus hijos. Su meta más adelante es tener un local comercial, aunque su mayor desafío es crear alternativas diarias para sostenerse competitiva en  el mercado. Con su credikiva comprará mercancías variadas, como suéteres, camisetas, bermudas blusas y pantalones, inversión a la cual aspira rotar rápidamente porque está encargada por clientes que le pagan muy bien.
texts.en:
Carmen lives in Soledad together with her husband and her children who are 19 and 22.  Her main business activity is buying and selling.  She started her business in order to support her husband since, up until she started her business selling merchandise on credit, he was solely responsible for supporting the household.

Ten years ago, Carmen's sister sent her some footwear, sweaters, shorts, blouses and jeans to sell and, with these products, she managed to gain a set of regular customers who permanently order products from her and recommend her to new buyers.

This is Carmen's fifth loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo: an organization she has been working with for 13 years.  It has supported her with business training and helped direct her investment.  As a result, she has experienced a visible improvement in her business and had additional working capital available to her.  This has helped her to make more profits.  She has given her all to her work and used her moral values to respond to her obligations whilst at the same time benefiting her household.  She dreams of creating well-being for her family, especially as regards helping her children pursue a higher education.  Her goal in the future is to own business premises.  However, her main challenge is dealing with daily ups and downs so that she can remain competitive in the market.

Carmen will use her Kiva loan to buy various merchandise such as sweaters, t-shirts, shorts, blouses and pants.  She hopes to see a quick turn over of her investment because she has orders from customers who pay her very well.

loans.use: to buy various merchandise such as sweaters, t-shirts, shorts, blouses and pants

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in beauty products and to improve her business premises

loans.name: Yorleni

texts.es: Yorleni, tiene la edad de 32 años, está casada y vive con su esposo y su hijo, que son su mayor prioridad. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los abonos y la cal para la asistencia de su cafetal para las próximas cosechas. Ella cuanta con la finca ya sembrada y en producción por lo cual lo que quiere es asistirla para realizarle mejorar para las que las próximas cosechas sean mejores y generen buena producción de café. Ella quiere llegar a ser una caficultora estable de la zona y así poder generar las ganancias para el bienestar de su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Yorleni is 32 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and son who are her main priorities in life.  She plans to use her loan to buy fertilizers and lime to care for her coffee plantation during her upcoming harvests. She has land which is already sown and in production.  What she would like is to be able to care for it and improve it so that her next harvests are better and generate a good production of coffee.  She would like to become a stable coffee grower in his area and thereby be able to make enough profits to provide for her family's well-being.

This is the first loan that Yorleni has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered her this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and lime

loans.name: Reynaldo Bismarck

texts.es:
Don Reynaldo ya tiene su propio negocio, una ferretería con  más de tres años en las ventas, al iniciar comenzo con poco, lo que ha venido aumentando con las ganancias y con los financiamientos que Afodenic ha dado en tres ciclos. Logrando la compra de más productos variados.
Tiene como otras entradas trabajos de electricidad domiciliar, siendo su oficio anterior, lo que logra pagar gastos básicos.
Con este nuevo financiamiento será para la compra de cuatro puertas, veinte tubos potable, royos de alambre, tubos pvc condwit, cajas de clavos, siendo productos que se venden mucho.
texts.en:
Reynaldo owns his own hardware store.  He has been in this business for more than three years.  He started out with little but has gradually  increased his business through his profits and loans that Afodenic have given him over three loan cycles.  This has enabled him to buy a greater variety of products.

Reynaldo also does some work as a domestic electrician as this was his previous trade.  This enables him to cover his basic expenses.

With this new loan, Reynaldo will buy four doors, twenty water pipes, rolls of wire, PVC conduit pipes and boxes of nails as these are products that he sells a lot of.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (rolls of wire, water pipes, boxes of nails, etc.)

loans.name: Margaritas Dos Group

texts.es:
La señora Isabel esta casada, tiene 53 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 7 hijos 3 de los cuales estan estudiando, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, inició este oficio criando gallinas y ahora ya cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en la crianza de animales, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio. 

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de cerdos para criarlos y luego venderlos cuando hayan crecido, las otra dos integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales y a la confección de prendas, esperan ver en el futuro su negocio convertido en una granja de animales varios.
texts.en:
Isabel is 53 years old and married.  She did not have the opportunity to attend school.  She has seven children, three of whom are in school.  Isabel's business is raising pigs.  She started out raising hens and now she has ten years experience raising animals.  She has the support of her husband who is a salesman.

Isabel formed a group so that she could request a loan with which to buy pigs to raise and then sell when they have grown.  The other two members of her group raise animals and make clothes.  In the future, Isabel hopes to see her business become a farm for different kinds of animals.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: La Sra. Paulina es una cliente antigua que retorna después de años, vive en la zona de bella vista y tiene su puesto de venta en el mercado de la zona, ella vende todos los días sin  días de descanso,  ella vende desde haca mas de diez años, sus hijos ya son mayores actualmente independientes, prácticamente vive ya sola ya que el mayor tiempo pasa en su puesto de venta. En este momento ella necesita incrementar su capital (compra  de verduras por mayor), es un apersona responsable y trabajadora, agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Paulina is a long-standing client who is returning to us after years away.  She lives in Bella Vista district and has a stall in the local market.  Paulina sells her products every day, without a day's rest.  She has been selling her products for more than ten years.  Her children are already grown up and live independently.  She practically lives alone already since she spends most of her time on her stall.  Right now, she needs to increase her capital (buying vegetables wholesale).  Paulina is a responsible and hard-working person who is grateful to the institution for the support she has been offered.

loans.use: to buy vegetables (to increase her capital)

loans.name: Sarabis Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "SARABIS" Se encuentra la señora Leticia una integrante del grupo, ella tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 3 son estudiantes en diferentes niveles escolares, nos platica que inicio la venta de tuppers, ella decidió iniciar con un negocio y tiene una comadre que tambien vende tuppers, quien le enseño los productos y la manera de ofrecer el producto, y poco a poco incremento sus ventas, sus clientes se sienten satisfechos con el producto, ella comenta que le llena de mucho orgullo y sobretodo es un apoyo para los estudios de sus hijos, ya que quiere lo mejor para ellos. Con las ganancias que obtenga las seguira invirtiendo en su negocio y lo demás para ahorrar para emergencias y la escuela de sus hijos. Quiere este prestamo para comprar más tuppers de diferentes tamaños y colores para las necesidades de sus clientes. Observaciones, la señoras que estan al fondo y no se ven bien en la foto se llaman Irma y Juana.
texts.en: The name of this group is SARABIS.  Sra. Leticia is a member of the group.  She has 4 children, 3 of whom are in different grades at school.  She told us about her business selling Tupperware, a business she learned from a friend who also sells Tupperware.  Her friend taught her eveything she needed to know about the products and how to sell them.  Her sales have increased bit by bit and her customers are happy with her products.  She says that she is proud of what she's accomplished, above all because she wants the very best for her children and the business allows her to contribute to their education.  She will use part of her earnings from the business to buy more Tupperware and the rest to save for emergencies and her children's studies.  She will use this loan to buy Tupperware of various sizes and colors that she will resell to her customers.  Note that the two women in the back, out of plain sight, are Irma and Juana.

loans.use: to buy more Tupperware for her retail business.

loans.name: Liceth Paola

texts.es: Liceth vive en el barrio Simón Bolívar,  un lugar que tradicionalmente escenario de los desfiles más populares y carnavaleros de la ciudad de Barranquilla y también donde estuvo ubicado el primer aeropuerto de esta ciudad. Liceth es una mujer casada que tiene un hijo de dos años de edad, familia con la que sueña construir un futuro de prosperidad y por la cual trabaja día a día. La experiencia de negocio la tomó Liceth de su madre,  quien le enseñó y le dejó este negocio para que ella se dedicara a la venta de prendas de plata con la que empezó y a la cual le ha agregado otras mercancías como bolsos, calzado y artículos a través de catalogas, en los que escoge preferiblemente las mejores ofertas, con tal de ofrecerle a sus clientes lo mejor;  en su negocio también ofrece el servicio de alquiler de sillas el cual se hace mas frecuente los fines de semana y por las noches . Este es su prime financiamiento que hace a  la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará mercancía variada como electrodomésticos menores, cubrelechos y cosméticos que tiene encargados y ella hará de esta inversión un éxito, pues ya tiene seleccionados a sus mejores clientes para responderles con los pedidos que estos han realizado. Su principal meta es lograr la ampliación y sostenibilidad  de su negocio que repercuta en su propia estabilidad económica  y en el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Liceth lives in the Simón Bolívar neighborhood, a place where the most popular carnaval parades of Baranquilla traditionally take  place.  It is also where the city's first airport is located. Liceth is a married woman who has a two year old son. She dreams of building a prosperous future and that is why she works every day. Liceth learned about business from her mother, who taught her and left her the business so that she could sell silver jewelry. She started with this and added more merchandise such as purses, shoes and catalog items. She chooses the best deals in order to offer her customers the best. She also rents chairs, mostly on weekends and evenings. This is her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will buy varied merchandise, such as small appliances, bedspreads and cosmetics she has on order. She will make this investment a success. She already has her best customers picked out to fill the the orders they have made.  Her main goal is to grow and sustain her business which will positively affect her financial stability and her family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy varied merchandise, such as small appliances, bedspreads and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: El señor Jorge dedicado al servicio musical ya hace mas de una década el cuenta con sus instrumentos para brindar este servicio que por cierto lo realiza muy bien ya que es un músico muy reconocido en su rubro, debido a los problemas económicos solo el y su hijo se encuentran en el país ya que su esposa se fue a trabajar al exterior. De todos modos el Sr. Jorge tiene muchas mas fuerza ya que es mucha responsabilidad de criar a su hijo solo. El crédito que solicita el cliente es para poder comprar instrumentos de ocasión para equiparse mucho mejor. Y brindar un mejor servicio musical, es una persona responsable y trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Sr. Jorge makes music for a living, work that he's done for more than ten years.  He's a successful performer and he's became well known locally for his music.  Recent economic problems led his wife to leave the country to find work and he and their son live alone together.  Sr. Jorge has had to become still stronger because he now has sole responsibility for raising their child.  He's applying for a loan to buy new musical instruments so that he has the equipment he needs for his performances.  He's a responsible and hard-working man, grateful to the bank for supporting his music performance business.

loans.use: to buy musical instruments for performance business.

loans.name: Blanco Y Negro Group

texts.es: el grupo se llama "Blanco y Negro" está ubicado en el estado de México, dentro del grupo se encuentra la señora Sandra quien es originaria de la comunidad. Ella tiene tres hijos, nos comenta que desde hace 5 años vende productos de belleza que inicio de manera indirecta ayudándole a una señora, poco a poco se dio cuenta que era un buen negocio y opto por iniciar su propio negocio.
