Sus ventas han incrementado, ella toma cursos para ofrece este producto para poder fortalecerlo e incrementar sus ventas y así con el tiempo lograr tener incremento en sus ventas con lo cual ha podido mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Con el prestamo comprará más productos de belleza ya que tiene muchos pedidos. Con las ganancias que obtenga ahorrara para la educación de sus hijos y para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio. Ella tiene el sueño de ser una mujer exitosa y algun día poder ver a sus hijos como profesionistas.
texts.en:
This group is called "Blanco y Negro" (Black and White) and is located in the State of Mexico.  Sandra is a member of the group and is originally from this community.  She has three children and tells us that she has been selling beauty products for five years.  She started her business indirectly, helping another lady.  Gradually, she realized that it was a good business and chose to start her own business.  She is taking courses on selling this type of product so that she can strengthen her business and increase her sales.  Over time, she has managed to increase her sales and, through her business, has managed to improve her own quality of life and that of her family.

Sandra will use her loan to buy more beauty products since she has a lot of orders.  She will save some of her profits to pay for her children's education and to continue investing in her business.  Her dream is to be a successful woman and, some day, to be able to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy beauty products for her business

loans.name: Alex Vladimir

texts.es:
El joven Alex Vladimir  tiene 29 años y es soltero, Alex vive en la ciudad de Cochabamba en la zona Oeste. Alex es Técnico Medio en Veterinaria. Alex es Gerente Técnico en la empresa avícola AVIACRUZ desde hace más de 5 años. También se dedica a la cría y posterior venta de pollos en sus terrenos ubicados en una zona de Cochabamba conocida como El Paso.
Alex necesita este capital de inversión para poder abastecerse de pollitos y poder vender, ya que la demanda de los mismos se incremento considerablemente los últimos meses. Alex es conocido por ser una persona muy trabajadora, estudiosa y con interés de superarse. A pesar que en Cochabamba la inestabilidad social (bloqueos de caminos, paros de transporte, manifestaciones y diferencias políticas) es un problema grande y es el mayor riesgo que corre su negocio puesto que al existir estos problemas el precio de su producto sufre cambios tanto positivos como negativos repentinamente. El mayor sueño de Alex es poder tener una granja lo suficientemente grande para algún día ser el mayor distribuidor de pollo de la región.
texts.en:
Alex Vladimir is 29 years old and single.  He lives in the western area of the city of Cochabamba.  Alex is a veterinarian.  He has been the technical manager of the poultry company AVIACRUZ for more than five years.  He also raises and then sells chickens on land which he owns which is located in an area of Cochabamba known as El Paso.  Alex needs this investment capital to stock up with chicks that he can sell since demand has increased considerably in recent months.

Alex is known as a very hard-working, studious person who is interested in improving himself.  Social unrest in Cochabamba is a big problem (road blocks, transport strikes, demos and political differences) and this is the biggest risk for his business since these problems mean that the price for his product suffers sudden changes, both positive and negative.  However, Alex's biggest dream is to be able to own a farm which is big enough that one day he will become the biggest chicken distributor in his region.

loans.use: to invest in his business raising and selling chickens

loans.name: Rolia

texts.es:
Rolia es una joven de 27 años vive con su conviviente el señor Sergio y juntos tienen un hijo pequeño de 1 año y  medio, ella vive en la comunidad Pucarita chica en la casa de la madre, ella y su marido con mucho esfuerzo han logrado comprar un terreno y construir una pequeña casa la cual aún está en obras y falta la terminación de la obra fina para que de esta manera puedan mudarse, ya que en la casa de la madre están muy incomodos  en una sola habitación. Rolia ha logrado estudiar una carrera técnica Prótesis  dental, pero no ejerce dicha profesión al no contar con la maquinaria necesaria, su principal actividad es la producción de la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 12 cabezas de ganado lechero en producción y el producto entrega a una empresa que se dedica a la elaboración de productos lácteos y el esposo es agricultor cuenta con chaco en el trópico del Chapare en al cual produce fruta.
El crédito está destinado para la compra de forraje para el ganado, ya que en esta temporada de invierno los productores de leche recolectan mucho forraje para la temporada de sequía.
Entre sus principales sueños y metas esta de trabajar de su carrera para la cual estudio , y lo  más importante terminar de construir su casa para poder mudarse y de esa manera vivir más cómodamente ella y su familia.
texts.en: Rolia is 27 years old and lives with her husband, Sergio, and their 1-and-half-year-old son. She lives in the community of Pucarita in her mother's home. With a lot of hard work Rolia and her husband were able to purchase some land and begin building a small home, which is still under construction and needs the finishing touches before they can move in, since her mother's house is uncomfortable with only one room. Rolia has a degree as a dental technician but doesn't practice that profession because she doesn't have the necessary equipment, so she makes a living milking cows. She currently has 12 milk cows and delivers the product to a company that produces dairy products. Her husband is a farmer and produces fruit in the topics of Chapere. Rolia plans to use the loan to purchase forage for her livestock, since in the winter milk producers gather a lot of forage for the dry season. Among her biggest hopes and dreams is to practice the career she studied for, and the most important is to finish construction on her home so she and her family can move in and live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase forage for her milk cows.

loans.name: Osvaldo

texts.es: Osvaldo vive en el tradicional barrio las nieves ubicado al sur de barranquilla  con su esposa y sus dos hijos en las edades de 23 a 25 años; él se dedica desde hace más de 11 años a la elaboración, de muebles de oficina, y también ofrece el servicio de tapicería de muebles de oficina que compra de segunda y de instalación de divisiones empresariales. Su negocio partió de su sueño  de ser independiente,  ya que había trabajado en una empresa por 20 años en el mismo oficio de donde extrajo gran parte de su experiencia en él.  Osvaldo en su casa tiene un taller donde fabrica y repara muebles de madera,  sus ventas las realiza a crédito en un corto plazo de 30 días, aunque principalmente vende de contado;  su clientela está ubicada en el centro y en el mercado de la ciudad de Barranquilla y son microempresas que venden artículos de primera o reparados por Osvaldo; su sueño es venderle a empresas, colegios universidades que es el mercado al cual gradualmente planea captar mediante la oferta personal de sus productos. Con su credikiva que es su primer financiamiento comprará maderas, puntillas, clavos divisiones metálicas en volumen pues su principal cliente requiere que Osvaldo haga divisiones a su oficina. Su sueño mas adelante es tener un gran taller para irse abriendo al mercado empresarial.
texts.en: Osvaldo lives in the traditional Barrio Las Nieves to the south of Barranquilla, along with his wife and their two children, ages 23 and 25. He has made a living for the past 11 years making office furniture, and he also offers upholstery services for second-hand furniture as well as setting up cubicles for businesses. His business started from his dream of being independent, since he had worked for 20 years for a company doing the same trade and picking up a large part of his experience. Osvaldo has a workshop in his home where he makes and repairs wood furniture, and he makes his sales on 30-day credit, although he mainly sells in cash. His customers are located in the central and commercial areas of Barranquilla and are small businesses that sell Osvaldo's new or repaired items. His dream is to sell to larger businesses, schools and universities, which is the market he gradually plans to attract by personally offering his products. With the Kiva loan, his first, he plans to purchase wood, nails and metal dividers in volume because his main customer wants him to set up cubicles in their office. His dream for the future is to have a bigger workshop to open up the larger business market to him.

loans.use: to purchase wood, nails and metal dividers in volume.

loans.name: Union Popular Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Unión Popular", porque así se llama el lugar donde viven. Las clientas consideran que este nombre es de buena suerte. El grupo se encuentra conformado por 10 integrantes entre las cuales esta la señora Eliza quien es originaria de la comunidad. El grupo esta ubicado en Hidalgo, México. La señora Eliza es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 7, 8, y 11 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de helados naturales. Sus clientes la consideran como una gran persona, dedicada al trabajo y al bienestar de su familia. Comenta que comenzó su negocio hace 4 años, debido a que las necesidades de su familia incrementaban y el ingreso de su esposo no era suficiente para cubrir los gastos. Decidió iniciar su propio negocio. Conforme han transcurrido los años el negocio se ha consolidado debido a la atención y dedicación que muestra. Ella quiere el prestamo para invertir en materia prima como agua, azucar, frutas, hielos etc. debido a que se encuentra en una temporada alta, y requiere de mayor inversión. Con las ganancias que obtenga seguira invirtiendo en su negocio y para la educación de sus hijos ya que desea que tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This group is called "Unión Popular" because that's what the members call the place where they live. The members consider the name to be good luck. The group consists of 10 members, and among them is Eliza, who is a native of the community in Hidalgo, Mexico. Eliza is married and has three children, ages 7, 8 and 11. She makes a living selling natural ice creams. Her customers consider her to be a great person who is dedicate to her job and to her family's well-being. She says she started working four years ago out of necessity because her family was growing and her husband's income wasn't enough to cover expenses. She decided to start her own business. As the years have past her business has become established due to the attention and dedicate she shows. Eliza is requesting the loan to purchase raw materials such as water, sugar, fruits, ice, etc., since this it's a busy season that requires greater investment. With the money she makes she will continue investing in the business and in the education of her children, from whom she wants to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as water, sugar, fruits and ice for an ice cream business.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: El Señor Alfredo, es una persona de 30 años de edad de estado civil soltero, pero vive en concubinato alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive en su casa propia, tiene 4 dependientes económicos a cargo, la actividad principal a la que se dedica el cliente y su familia es la agricultura, producen papa, haba y arveja en sus propias parcelas que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de Kañacota del municipio de Tíraque distante aproximadamente a unos 75 Km. de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Asimismo el cliente y su esposa manifiestan tener el deseo de poder incrementar su producción de papa y para tal efecto se vieron en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la adquisición de semilla y abono de gallinaza, principal fertilizante orgánico que se utiliza en esta zona para mejorar el rendimiento del tubérculo y de esta forma mejorar sus condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Alfredo is a 30-year-old, single person.  However, he does live with someone.  He managed to finish elementary school and lives in his own house.  He has four economic dependents.  He and his family’s main occupation is farming.  They produce potato, broad beans and peas on their own fields located in the community of Kañacota in the community of Tíraque about 75 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba.  

He and his wife state that they would like to increase potato production and to do so they needed to request a loan to have funds to invest in the purchase of seeds and fowl guano, the main organic fertilizer used in this zone to improve tuber production and thus to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seed and manure.

loans.name: Policarpo

texts.es: Policarpo   es un hombre de 68 años vive en Soledad,  municipio área metropolitana de la ciudad de Barranquilla;  allí tiene un negocio donde fabrica traperos y los vende a crédito y de contado; él compra retazos de tela de franela y arma trapeadores para la limpieza de las viviendas, los cuales son de mucha aceptación entre amas de casa, pero Policarpo no las vende directamente, lo hace por kilos a empresas que completan  el producto.   Su sueño más adelante es tener una bodega con suficiente materia prima,  para que cuando llegue la escasez él esté provisionado y pueda responder oportunamente a la demanda. Su mayor desafío es cuando los retazos de tela, que son su materia prima es insuficientes en el mercado,  lo cual disminuye la producción en temporadas de mucha demanda.  Este es el propósito de adquirir su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, porque con esta financiación, tendrá un capital de trabajo para comprar  materias primas e insumos, producir y así gradualmente tener un stop de ellos disponibles para épocas de escasez.
texts.en:
Policarpo is a 68 year old man living in Soledad, a municipality in the metropolitan area of the city of Barranquilla.  He has a business there making mops that he sells for cash and on credit.  He buys flannel remnants and assembles mops for household use which are highly popular with housewives.  However, Policarpo doesn’t sell them directly; he sells them by the kilo to firms that finish making them.  His dream for later on is to have a warehouse with sufficient raw materials so that when scarcity comes he will be stocked and able to respond to demand in an opportune way.  His greatest challenge is when the remnants, which are his main raw material, are scarce in the market which leads to diminished production when demand is high.

This is the reason behind his Kiva loan, the first financing he’s done with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which will provide working capital to buy raw materials and supplies, to produce and gradually have stock on hand for those times of scarcity.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies like fabric remnants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Elisabet

texts.es: Elisabet tiene 24 años vive en la ciudad de Huancayo donde esta radicando desde hace 10 años, vive al lado de su esposo y su pequeño hijo. Desde hace 1 año decidió que la mejor opción para generarse un ingreso es a través de su propio negocio de ferretería en un local arrendado donde también vive y junto a su esposo atienden a su público consumidor. Su esposo consigue el abastecimiento de nueva mercadería a fin de que haya rotación constante de su capital de trabajo, actualmente los precios de los diversos productos que vende son estables. En este corto tiempo su negocio ha estado incrementando sus ventas por lo que ha decidido incursionar en la venta de agregados, es decir arena y piedras de río que es indispensable para la construcción de casas. Por medio de una invitación personal decido solicitar un crédito y solucionar sus problemas de liquidez ya que su negocio requiere constantemente de una cantidad de dinero  que le permita renovar la mercadería que tiene para mejorarla. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP y se siente más tranquila de haber encontrado lo que ella considera, una fuente de financiamiento confiable y un aliado para lograr sus objetivos financieros, Por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para que se concrete sus planes. En esta ocasión podrá comprar al por mayor baldes de pintura y mas arena al por mayor.
texts.en:
Elisabet, 24, has lived in Huancayo for the past 10 years with her husband and little son.  A year ago she decided that her best option for earning an income was to have her own hardware business in a rented stall where she also lives, and together with her husband, they deal with the customers.  Her husband gets supplies of new merchandise since there is always a rotation of working capital.  Now prices of many of the products that they sell are stable.  In the short time that they have had their business sales have been increasing with the new products that they have decided to sell, like sand, and river stones that are necessary for house contstruction.  A personal invitation was extended to them to request financing and help with their cash problems since their business always requires an amount of money to replenish their merchandise and improve it.  This is the first loan with MFP and she feels more relaxed to have found a source of trustworthy financing and assistance to succeed with her financial goals.  That is why Elisabet is hoping that each one of you will help her with her plans.  
 She will use this money to buy more buckets of paint and sand wholesale.

loans.use: To buy sand and buckets of paint

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his home

loans.name: Maria Angelica

texts.es:
María Angélica es una madre de familia de 35 años, vive en casa de su madre junto a su hijo, la cual cuenta con  todos los servicios básicos, se encuentra ubicada en la zona rural de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona tiene como principal actividad el comercio, la agricultura y el turismo.  

María Angélica se dedica  a la venta de frutas y periódicos,  en el mercado de Atusparias que pertenece a su zona, con una experiencia de 3 años, se a hecho conocida por el buen servicio que brinda a sus clientes, tiene su propia clientela, los ingresos que recaude en el día espara solventar sus obligaciones familiares. 

El préstamo que solicitó a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla fue de 500 nuevos soles, el cual lo va utilizar  para mejorar su casa especialmente el cuarto donde vive con su hija, con las ventas que realize en su puesto en el mercadoserá para cubrir su crédito otorgado y para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  María Angélica  es una persona con muchos aspiraciones y uno de ellos es que con su trabajo y esfuerzo pueda tener más grande su  puesto en el mercado y poderle dar otras oportunidades de estudio a su hijo.
texts.en:
María Angélica is a 35-year-old mother living with her child in her mother’s house which has all basic utilities and is located in the rural part of Chiclayo Province.  This area’s main activity is commerce farming and tourism.

María Angélica sells fruit and newspapers in the Atusparias Market located in her zone.  She has three years experience and has become well known because of the good service she provides her customers.  She has her own regular customers and she hopes that the income she earns will suffice to cover her family obligations.

The loan she requested from Edpyme Alternativa through the Seed Capital program was for 500 new soles that she will use to make some home improvements especially in the room she shares with her child.  

She will use sales from her stand in the market to repay the loan and to obtain a better quality of life.  María Angélica is a person with many hopes one of which is that through her work and effort she’ll be able to enlarge her stand in the market and provide other opportunities for schooling for her child.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Verónica

texts.es:
La Sra. Verónica es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, es madre soltera de una hija la que ha criado sola y tratado de dar una buena educación, se desempeña como profesora de primaria en un colegio de la localidad donde ha brindado sus servicios por más de veinte años para el aprendizaje de los niños.
Cuenta con su propia vivienda, una de las necesidades que tiene en estos momentos es adquirir un préstamo para compra medicamentos y pago de consultas médicas para mejorar su salud, ya que últimamente ha presentado problemas en su recuperación, por tal razón decidió solicitar su cuarto crédito en Ceprodel con el objetivo de cumplir con su necesidad y recuperarse para seguir laborando y brindarle un buen nivel de vida a su hija.
texts.en:
Verónica is from El Sauce.  She is a single mother of a daughter.  She has raised her alone and tried to give her a good education.  She works as an Elementary School Teacher in a local school where she’s been working for over 20 years teaching children.

She owns her house.  One of the needs she currently is having is to get a loan to buy medicine and to pay for doctor’s visits to improve her health because she’s recently had some problems with her recovery.  Because of this, she decided to ask for her fourth loan from Ceprodel to meet this need and to recover so that she can continue to work and provide her daughter with a good standard of living.

loans.use: to pay medical costs.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
Ines es madre D. familia D. 67 años D. edad, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio solo D. luz, ubicada en el distrito TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía. 

DesD. hace 6 años Ines a colocado en su casa  una bodega donD. venD. todo tipo D. productos para el consumo y uso diario, al tener su negocio instalado en su domicilio le permite atender a cualquier hora a sus clientes, ésto le permite diferenciarse D. otras tiendas y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos D. su hogar.

El crédito solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es D. 2000 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinará para comprar mayor cantidad D. mercadería y poder ampliar su negocio con más variedad productos, una vez que sus ventas aumenten podrá cubrir su préstamo y tener mejoras económicas para llevar a su casa.  Ines es una mujer que con esfuerzo y trabajo quiere que sus hijos tengan un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Ines is a 42 year old housewife who lives with her husband and her three children in their own home. The house has electricity and is located in the TambogranD. district in the department of Piura. This region focuses on agriculture, animal husbandry and crafts.

For the past six years Ines has installed a general store in her home where she sells all kinds of food and daily use products. The fact that the store is located in her home allows her to attend to her customers at any hour. This differentiates her from other stores and enables her to make a better income, which allows her to pay for household expenses.

She will use the loan for 2000 nuevos soles requested from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a larger quantity of merchandise, expanding her business with a bigger variety of products. Once her sales increase she will be able to cover her loan and obtain a better economic situation for her household. Ines is a woman who through effort and work wants her children to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to expand her business.

loans.name: Félix Pedro

texts.es:
Es de la ciudad de Managua, señor Félix Pedro,   se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy honrada  trabajadora con buenos valores y principios  morales. 
Se presento ante esta oficina  de  Ceprodel para solicitar  crédito para ser invertido en mejoramiento  en su vivienda en realizar un anexo de un cuarto, en compra materiales de construcción como  bloque, cemento, hierro, arena y mano obra, para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Felix Pedro is from the city of Managua and is characterized for being an honorable person with good values and moral principles.
He showed up at the Ceprodel offices to solicit a loan that would be invested toward home improvements for his home, specifically the addition of a bedroom, and will need to purchase construction materials such as: blocks, cement, iron, sand, and labor costs.  This will improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to make home improvements

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase shoes through catalogs.

loans.name: Rosa Ysabel

texts.es:
La señora Rosa es socia del banco comunal Juan Zaplana Belliza del Distrito D. Yarinacocha, Departamento D. Ucayali, está casada y tiene 6 hijos mayores D. edad e independientes.
Lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos desD. hace 10 años, tiempo que lleva su negocio, ella tiene una pequeña bodega en el cual trabaja junto a su esposo.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará:  1 caja D. leche, 1 caja D. aceite, 1 bolsa D. fideo, 2 tiras D. nescafe, 1 caja D. té, 1 bolsa D. sal, 1 saco D. azúcar, 1 saco D. arroz, 2 racimos D. plátano, 1 ciento D. limones.
Su esposo es jubilado y para acompañar a su esposa la ayuda en su negocio.  Agradece a Manuela Ramos  por todos estos años que viene otorgando los préstamos para poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa is a member of the Juan Zaplana Belliza Communal Bank in the District of Yarinacocha, Department of Ucayali. She is married and has six adult children who live independently.

Rosa has been working with Manuela Ramos for 10 years. Throughout the time she has been in business, she has managed a small store with her husband.

With her new loan of 2000 PEN, Rosa will buy one case of milk, one case of oil, one bag of noodles, two packs of Nescafe coffee, one case of tea, one bag of salt, one sack of sugar, one sack of rice, two bunches of bananas, and one hundred lemons.

Her husband is retired and helps her with managing the business. Thanks to the loans Manuela Ramos has provided over the years, Rosa has been able to continue working.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Agueda

texts.es:
La señora Águeda es socia del banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos.
Lleva 15 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la confección de sabanas, negocio que aprendió en los cursos que Manuela Ramos organiza durante el año, y también confecciona ropas de dormir  para niños.
Con su  nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles compara; 15 metro de tela para sabana, 1 cono de elástico, 30 metro de blondas, 1 kilo de fibra para almohada.
Aprender a coser las sabanas le ha venido muy bien, porque le está sacando provecho a su inversión y agradece a Manuela Ramos por realizar estos cursos que son muy buenos para las mujeres que quieran generarse un ingreso.
texts.en:
Sra. Águeda is a member of the Communal Bank “El Arenal” which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayli. She is 46 years old, married, and has four children.

Águeda has worked with the loans from Manuela Ramos for 15 years. She produces bed sheets and learned this business from the courses that Manuela Ramos offers throughout the year. Águeda also makes children’s sleepwear.

With her new loan of 1500 PEN, Águeda will buy 15 meters of fabric for bed sheets, one cone of elastic, 30 meters of lace, and one kilo of pillow fibers.

Learning to sew bed sheets turned out to be a very good decision and she has taken advantage of this investment. Águeda is grateful to Manuela Ramos for offering these courses because they are very good for women who want to generate an income.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for making bed sheets, elastic, lace, and pillow fibers.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es: Adela de 26 años de edad convive junto a su esposo Demetrio de 30 años,  fruto de esta relación  tienen 03 hijos quienes viven en casa propia en la ciudad de Quimbiri. Adela es una persona de ardua labor, quien viene realizando las actividades de compra y venta de productos de la zona; tales como: cacao, café, achiote y palillo, esta actividad lo realiza  junto a su  amado esposo, quien se encarga de cargar y pesar los volúmenes de cada producto. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es contar con la plena confianza de los agricultores, quienes al ver el buen trato y precio que se les brinda no dudan en entregarle la mayor cantidad de sus frutos. Adela viene realizando esta actividad hace 07 años, con mucho entusiasmo y laboriosidad, ya que vio en ello una gran oportunidad de generar su propio ingreso para el  bienestar de su familia y educación a sus hijos. Sin embargo no cuenta con capital suficiente para poder acopiar dichos productos, es por ello que recurre  a los créditos que facilita  la institución MFP. Los planes que tiene en mente es la de seguir creciendo y trabajar con el mismo ahínco  que la caracteriza. Este es su sexto crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para mejorar su negocio. Asimismo se compromete a aportar sus pagos en la fecha indicada, pues  desea acceder a otros prestamos posteriormente, en su banco comunal es una socia que aporta ideas para el progreso de su banco comunal. El crédito solicitado le servirá como capital para poder comprar los granos que producen los campesinos.
texts.en:
Adela is 26 years of age and in a common-law marriage with her husband Demetrio, age 30. Their relationship has resulted in three children who live with them in their own home in the city of Quimbiri. Adela is a person who works hard at her business of buying and selling local products such as cacao, coffee, annatto, and kindling. She operates her business with her beloved husband, who is in charge of loading the merchandise despite the large amounts of each product that they sell. What she enjoys most about her job is having the full confidence of the farmers with whom she works. Since Adela treats them well and offers them a good price, they in return do not hesitate to supply her with large quantities of their crops. She has been in this business for seven years and has worked with great enthusiasm and dedication. Adela saw this as a great opportunity to generate her own income so that she could provide for the welfare of her family and her children’s education. However, she does not have sufficient capital to acquire more products. For this reason, she has returned to ask for additional loans provided by MFP. Her current plans are to continue growing and to work with the same zeal that she is known to possess.

This will be her sixth loan with MFP. Adela commits to submitting her payments by the deadlines indicated because she wants to access additional loans in the future. In her Communal Bank, she is a member who supports ideas that will help move her group forward. The loan she is requesting will be used as capital for buying the crops that are produced by the farmers.

loans.use: to purchase cacao and coffee beans in bulk from local producers.

loans.name: Zoriano

texts.es:
Zoriano es un padre de familia de 38 años,  vive en su casa  propia con su esposa e hijos, ubicada en el distrtito de Túcume, que pertenece al departamento de la Lambayeque.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura,   ganadería y turismo.

Desde hace algunos años Zoriano se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz, es un alimento sano y rico que se consume diariamente por los pobladores que una vez que cosecha lo comercializa en los diferentes mercados de la zona, vendiendolo al por mayor y menor, con la finalidad de aumentar sus ingresos y poder solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo  de 3000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para comprar fertilizantes y pesticidas para mejorar las tierras de cultivo como el producto y seguir ofreciendolos a su clientes.   Zoriano es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que quiere es su familia se supere.
texts.en:
Zoriano is a 38 year old father.  He lives in his own house with his wife and children.  They live in the Túcume district, which is in the Lambayeque department.  This area is devoted to agriculture, livestock, and tourism.

Zoriano has devoted himself to agriculture for some years.  He has his own land where he grows corn.  It is a healthy and delicious food that is consumed daily by the inhabitants.  Once the corn is harvested, he sells it at the different markets in the area.  He sells it wholesale and retail.  He does this to increase his income and to be able to pay for the family expenses.

He has requested a loan for 3,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy fertilizer and pesticide.  He will do this to improve his farmland and his product in order to continue selling to his customers.  

Zoriano is a responsible and hard-working person.  The only thing he wants is for his family to improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide in order to improve his land and his products.

loans.name: Elizabeth Koska

texts.es:
La señora Elizabeth es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos.
Como toda mujer, en estos tiempos tiene que trabajar para contribuir a los gastos del hogar.
Actualmente está dedicada a la  costura, realiza arreglos de prendas y también confecciona blusas, faldas y vestidos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 5 cortes de tela,  ½ docena de cierre, 2 doc. De botones, ½ de hilos de diferentes colores, aceite de máquina, tiza sastre.
Su esposo trabaja en educación y aprecia mucho el doble  esfuerzo que tiene que hacer su esposa para sacar a flote su familia y que no falte nada en casa.
texts.en:
Sra. Elizabeth is a member of the Communal Bank “El Arenal” which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 45 years old, married, and has three children.

Like all women today, Elizabeth must work in order to contribute toward the household expenses. She currently works as a seamstress, making repairs to clothing. Elizabeth also produces blouses, skirts, and dresses.

With her new loan of 1000 PEN, Elizabeth will buy five pieces of fabric, a half-dozen zippers, two dozen buttons, thread in different colors, sewing machine oil, and tailor’s chalk.

Elizabeth’s husband works in education and greatly appreciates the amount of work she does to keep their family afloat and provide everything for their home.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, zippers, buttons, thread, sewing machine oil, and tailor's chalk.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Pedro Antonio es originario del municipio de El Sauce, es padre de dos niños, se desempeña como obrero en una Institución del Estado donde tiene muchos años de laborar.
Cuenta con su propia vivienda, una de las necesidades que tiene en estos momentos es adquirir un crédito para la compra de un electrodoméstico con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de vida en su vivienda y darles una mejor nivel de vida a sus hijos, por tal razón decidió solicitar su tercer crédito en Ceprodel con el objetivo de cumplir con su necesidad.
texts.en:
Sr. Pedro Antonio is originally from the town of El Sauce. He is the father of two children. Pedro is an employee of a state institution and has worked there for many years.

He has his own home, but one of his existing needs is to acquire a loan so that he can purchase an appliance. This will help improve the living conditions at home and provide a better standard of living for his children. For this reason, he has decided to request his third loan from CEPRODEL so that he can fulfill this need.

loans.use: to purchase an appliance for his home.

loans.name: Carmen Yuly

texts.es:
La señora Carmen es socia del banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.
Cuenta con un negocio de venta de ropa, en una de las galerías del centro de la ciudad, lleva años trabajando con este rubro y le ha ido muy bien, porque cada vez va aumentando su mercadería.
Con sunuevo prestamo de S/. 2,400.00 nuevos soles comprará: 6 vestidos, 12 polos, 6 faldas, 24 blusas.
Su esposo se dedica a la comercialización de madera y sus dos hijos son ya mayores uno con profesión y su hija está por terminar la carrera.  Carmen está satisfecha por haber logrado dar estudios a sus hijos, trabajando con los préstamos que Manuela desde hace quince años.
Su agradecimiento a Manuela Ramos es mucho y lo retribuye pagando con puntualidad sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Sra. Carmen is a member of the Communal Bank “El Arenal” which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 48 years old, married, and has two children.

Carmen has a clothing business located in one of the shopping centers in the central part of the city. She has been in this business for years and has done very well because she has been able to increase her line of merchandise.

With this new loan of 2400 PEN, Carmen will buy six dresses, twelve polo shirts, six skirts, and twenty-four blouses. Her husband sells wood and both of their children are grown. One is already a professional and the other one is finishing her degree. Carmen is satisfied that she was able to provide for her children’s education. She has worked with the loans from Manuela Ramos for 15 years.

Carmen is deeply grateful to Manuela Ramos and commits to submitting her monthly payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase various articles of clothing.

loans.name: Eva Olinda

texts.es:
Eva de 34 años de edad, es soltera,  vive en casa de sus pades, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Reque que se encuentra a unos minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Se caracteriza por que sus pobladores desarrollan la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Eva se dedica hace algunos años a la compra, crianza y venta de aves de corral como gallinas,pavos,patos y gallos al por menor.   Los cría en su corral que se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa para mayor seguridad de sus animales, los alimenta con comida balanceada  y granos natural posible, una vez que han completado su desarrollo los vende a los distintos mercados de la zona y los ofrece a sus clientes, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá seguira ayudando a sus padres.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para seguir comprando aves de corral y seguir incrmentando sus ventas e ingresos para su casa, cubriendo sus necesidades personales.  Eva es una mujer responsble, trabajadora y empeñosa conocida por los pobladores del lugar donde vive, por querer mejorar  económicamente y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Eva is 34 years old and single  She lives in her parents' home which is located in a rural area  of the Reque district, within minutes of the province of Chiclayo.  The area is characterized by its people working in agricultural and livestock activities.

For the last few years, Eva has worked purchasing, raising and selling at retail poultry such as chickens, turkeys, ducks and cockerels.  She raises them in the pen that is behind her house for better safety of the birds.  They are fed a balanced feed and natural grains when possible.  Once they have completed their growth, they are sold to different markets in the area and she also offers them directly to customers.  With the income she earns, she is able to continue helping her parents.

She has requested a loan of 1,000 New Soles through Edpyme Alternativa, to continue buying poultry and to get incremental growth in her sales and income for her home, covering her personal needs.  Eva is a responsible woman, hardworking and earnest, who is well-known by the locals where she lives.  She want to improve economically and have a better quality of life

loans.use: to buy more poultry.

loans.name: Nara

texts.es:
La señora Nara es socia del  banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y tuvo 10 hijos en total.
Lleva 6 años trabajando con Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta de comida en el patio de su casa por las tardes, en estos días está con descanso medico.
Con su nuevo préstamo de s/.1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 nueva parrilla porque la que tiene esta muy deteriorada y necesita un cambio.
Su esposo es un pequeño agricultor que trabaja pero lo que gana es muy poco, es por eso que Nara le ayuda vendiendo comida.  Gracias a Manuela Ramos tiene el capital necesario para seguir trabajando y poder ayudar a su esposo.
texts.en:
Sra. Nara is a member of the Communal Bank “El Arenal” which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 60 years old, married, and has a total of 10 children.

Nara has been working with Manuela Ramos for six years. She sells food in the afternoons from the patio of her house. In recent days, she has had to take medical leave.

With this new loan of 1500 PEN, Nara will buy a new grill because the one she currently owns has deteriorated and needs to be replaced.

Her husband is a small working farmer, but he earns very little. It is for this reason that Nara helps out by selling food. Thanks to Manuela Ramos, she has the necessary capital to continue working and assisting her husband.

loans.use: to purchase a grill.

loans.name: Luz 2 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama "Luz II" debido a que consideran que la luz siempre está presente en sus corazones. Está ubicado en Hidalgo, México. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes y es la cuarta vez que solicitan un prestamo. 

La señora Alfonsa es integrante del grupo. Ella tiene 57 años, estudió la primaria y es cocinera. Tiene una cocina económica desde hace tres años, por su experiencia de cocinera ahora es las mejores que guisa. Sus clientes nos comentan que Doña Alfonsa es una excelente cocinera pues sus guisos son tradicionales y con gran sazón. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta. Quiere este prestamo para comprar insumos y materia prima como lo son verduras, especies, carnes, gas, etc. También espera que aumenten sus ventas y así poder comprar más mesas y así hacer más grande su negocio. Con las ganancias qeu obtenga seguira invirtiendo en insumos, ampliar su negocio y apoyar a su familia en los gastos economicos.
texts.en:
This group is called “Luz II” (Light II) because the members believe that light is always in their hearts.  They meet in Hidalgo, Mexico.  There are nine members and this is the fourth time they have applied for a loan.  

Sra. Alfonsa is a member of the group.  She is 57 years old, has an elementary school education, and works as a cook.  Alfonsa has managed a diner for three years and her experience in the kitchen has now brought out the best in her cooking.  Her customers say that Doña Alfonsa is an excellent cook because her recipes are traditional and have great flavor.  She was very pleased at the time she requested her loan.  Alfonsa wants to use the funds to buy supplies and ingredients such as vegetables, spices, meats, gas, and other items.  She also hopes to increase her sales so that she can buy more tables to expand her business.  With the profits she earns, Alfonsa will be able to continue investing in supplies, expand her business, and support her family with the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, spices, meats, gas, and other items.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.es:
La señora Antonieta es socia del banco comunal Juan Zaplana Belliza del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 53 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 4 hijos.
Desde hace 7 años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de granos. En esta temporada los granos no ha tenido una buena temporada por las inundaciones que hubo por esta parte del país.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 2 sacos de frejol de la región, 2 paneles de fariña, 2 sacos ojo negro.
Es  poco lo que puede comprar con este capital, pero tiene que continuar y no dejar morir el capital que tiene y así poder cumplir con el compromiso que tiene mensualmente con Manuela Ramos.
texts.en:
Sra. Antonieta is a member of the Juan Zaplana Belliza Communal Bank which is in the District of Yarinacocha, Department of Ucayali. She is 53 years old, widowed, and has four children.

She has been working with the loans from Manuela Ramos for seven years. Antonieta sells dry goods. This has not been a good season since this part of the country was impacted by floods.

Her new loan of 2000 PEN will be used to buy two sacks of beans from the region, two crates of flour, and two sacks of black-eyed peas. Antonieta can buy very little with this capital, but she has to continue forward and make the most of what she has. As a result, she will be able to continue meeting her monthly commitment with Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: to purchase beans, flour, and black-eyed peas.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela es madre de familia de 65 años, tiene casa propia donde vive con su esposo e hijos, el cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Chulucanas que pertenece  al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se dedica ha la agricultura, ganadería, artesanía y turismo.

Adela desde hace  unos años a colocado en su domicilio una tienda con productos de primera necesidad (aceite, leche, arroz, azúcar, etc.), la cual cuenta en su zona con su propia clientela y  también otra forma de obtener más ingresos económicos es comercializando más ganado ovino, que lo vende una vez que hayan llegado a su desarrollo ideal para ofrecerlo a sus clientes.

Por eso a pedido un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos para implementar su tienda y para realizarles una revisión a sus animales, para que tengan un buen desarrollo ya que se incrementaría sus ventas y sus clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga le permitiría cubrir su crédito y brindarles a su familia un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Adela is a 65 year-old mother who owns her own home where she lives with her husband and children.  The only service her house receives is electricity.  It is located in Chulucanas district, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock, make handicrafts and work in tourism.

Some years ago, Adela set up a store in her home where she sells essential household products (oil, milk, rice, sugar, etc.)  She has her own customers in her area.  She also has another way of making additional income, selling sheep.  When they reach an ideal level of development, she sells them to her customers.

Adela has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more products with which to stock her store and to pay for a checkup for her animals so that they develop properly.  This will increase her sales and her customers.  With the income that she makes, she will be able to make her loan repayments and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more products to stock her store and to pay for a checkup for her animals

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramón es un padre de familia de 34 años  de edad, vive junto con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo el servicio de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza porque los pobladores desarrollan la actividad agricola, ganadería y artesanía.

Ramón se dedica  a la agricultura hace varios años, tiene sus propias tierras de cultivo donde  siembra limón que cosecha semanalmente y luegolo comercializa en los diferentes mercados de la zona, producto que se consume mucho en los alimentos diarios de todos los pobladores, con los ingresos que obtenga en la venta de su limón podrá mejorar la calidad de vida  de toda su familia.

Ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de fertilizantes para abonar sus tierras de cultivo y asegurarse de tener una muy buena producción de limón para poder pagar el préstamo brindado como incrmentar sus ingresos y darles lo que necesita su esposa e hijos.  Ramón se le conoce por ser un hombre responsable y trabajador en el lugar donde vive, todo el esfuerzo que demanda su trabajo es con la meta de sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Ramón is a 34-year-old father who lives with his wife and children in their own home. The only service he receives is electricity. He resides in the District of Tambogrande, which is part of the Department of Piura. This area is known for its people who engage in businesses involving farming, livestock breeding, and making handicrafts.

Ramón has been a farmer for several years. He has his own farmland on which he grows lemons. The fruit is harvested weekly and then sold to different markets in the area. This product is widely consumed since it is part of the daily diet of all the local residents. With the income he generates from the sale of his lemons, Ramón has been able to improve the quality of life for his entire family.

He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN in order to buy fertilizers to apply on his farmland so that he can obtain a good crop of lemons. This will allow him to repay the loan, increase his earnings, and provide for the needs of his wife and children.

Ramón is known locally as a responsible and hardworking man. He strives to meet the demands of his job so that he can move his family forward.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more animals and the appropriate feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her clothing business.

loans.name: Mujeres De Exito 1 Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "MUJERES DE ÉXITO 1" y se ubica en el Estado de México. Este estado se distingue por su gente trabajadora, por sus lindas cascadas, los ojos de agua y por su ganadería. El grupo esta conformado por 10 integrantes y esta es la primera vez que solicita un prestamo. Dora es la presidenta del grupo. Inició su negocio hace 3 años de paletas de hielo y fresas con crema, día con día ella y su esposo salen a vender a distintos lugares de la comunidad, requiere este prestamo para comprar más materia prima como agua, fruta, palitos de paleta, fresas, crema etc. para elaborar sus productos. Ella tiene 28 años, estudió el bachillerato, es una persona emprendedora con muchas ganas de superarse, siempre con el deseo de brindarle lo mejor a su familia, es casada, tiene un hijo de 5 años y un hija de 2 años. Con las ganancias que obtenga las utilizará para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y para la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
This group is called "MUJERES DE ÉXITO 1" and is located in the State of México.  This state stands out because of its hard-working people, beautiful waterfalls, cloudbursts and livetock.  The group is comprised of 10 members who are requesting a loan for the first time.  

Dora is the president of the group.  Three years ago she began her business selling fruit popsiscles and strawberries with cream.  Everyday she and her husband go to different places in the community to sell their products.  She is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as water, fruit, popsicle sticks, strawberries and cream, etc. to make her products.

She is 28 and has a high-school education.  She is an enterprising person with a strong will to get ahead.  Her greatest desire is to give her family the best she can.  She is married and has a 5-year-old son and a 2-year-old daughter.  The income earned from her work will be invested in her business and used for her childrens' education.

loans.use: To buy raw materials such as water, fruit, popsicle sticks, strawberries and cream.

loans.name: Lucy Magali

texts.es:
Lucy es una madre de familia de 32 años de edad, ella tiene 2 hijos y actualmente vive con su familia.  Vive en una comunidad en la misma ciudad de Chepén en el departamento de La   Libertad..

 Lucy se dedica a la venta por mayor y menor de  frutas en el mercado de abastos de la ciudad de Chepen, ella cuenta con un pequeño puesto, en dicho mercado.  Ella cuenta con 11 años de experiencia  en el rubro tiempo que le ha permitido conseguir clientela  fijos para su negocio.

Lucy está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 para que pueda invertir en su negocio, y de esta manera ampliarlo y ver crecer sus ingresos, para que poco a poco alcance una mejor calidad de vida.

Lucy es una mujer bastante trabajadora y entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria.
texts.en:
Lucy is a 32-year-old mother who has two children. She currently lives with her family in a community in the city of Chepén in the Department of La Libertad.

Lucy sells fruit in bulk and in small amounts at the supply market in the city of Chepén. She has her own stand at the market. Lucy has 11 years of experience in this type of work and it has allowed her to attract regular customers to her business.

She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN so that she can invest in her business. This will allow her to expand and increase her earnings so that she can gradually improve her quality of life.

Lucy is a hardworking woman who is devoted to her family. Her greatest wish is to continue growing as an entrepreneur.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos tiene  66  años de edad, él es casado tiene 2  hijos.  Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope en donde   cuenta con servicios de agua, pero no de energía eléctrica el lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 200  familias.

Carlos se dedica a la comercialización de animales en especial de ganado  porcino y caprino los cuales cría en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres hace varios años es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro, durante este tiempo, el realiza sus ventas en los caseríos de Mórrope y también realiza entregas desde su domicilio. En todos estos años Carlos ha adquirido clientela fija para su negocio.  Además con ingresos adicionales producto de la agricultura

Carlos  está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000  para hacer un mejoramiento en el interior y exterior de su casa, pues necesita realizar unos acabados para que pueda contar con seguridad y comodidad en su hogar.

Carlos desea mejorar su calidad  de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas eferencias, las personas que lo conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Carlos is 66 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in his own home in the rural section of the District of Mórrope. This area receives running water, but no electricity since it is a small community of approximately 200 families.

Carlos sells animals, especially pigs and goats. The animals are raised in pens located behind his house. Carlos learned this trade from his parents and has been in business for several years. He is known for being a perfectionist in his job. Throughout this time, he has conducted sales in the villages of Mórrope and has also sold animals from his home. Over the years, Carlos has acquired an established customer base for his business. He also earns income from farming.

Carlos is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN so that he can make improvements to the interior and exterior of his house. He needs to complete some of the finishing touches so that his home will be secure and comfortable.

Carlos wants to improve his quality of life through effort and work. He has good references. The people who know him describe him as a peaceful and responsible person.

loans.use: to complete the interior and exterior finishes of his house.

loans.name: Benita

texts.es: La Sra. Benita es una cliente antigua y anteriormente trabajo con kiva, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de sombreros, y también acomoda mantas de vicuña, ella vive con sus hijos de los cuales tres son personas independientes, la última hija se encuentra en colegio aún, con el esposo hace dos años que se separó, este fue un golpe duro para ella pero salió adelante por el bienestar de sus hijos, siendo ella la que sostiene y dirige el hogar, La Sra.  Benita solicita los créditos para comprar sombreros y acomodar por la zona  para la fiesta del gran poder en esta ocasión, ya que ella tiene pedidos en todas las fiestas de la zona, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Benita is a long-standing customer who has worked with Kiva before.  She buys and sells hats for a living and also sells alpaca wool blankets.  She lives with her children, three of whom are independent.  The youngest daughter is still in school.  She separated from her husband two years ago, which was a hard time for her, but was able to get ahead for the sake of her children, since she is the one who supports and manages the household.

Mrs. Benita is requesting a loan to buy hats and blankets for the local religious festivities.  She already has orders for all the festivities.  She is a responsible, hard-working woman who is grateful to the institution for the support received.

loans.use: To buy hats.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El Sr. Juan tiene 45 años de edad, casado hace 15 años tiene 3 hijos en edad escolar, dueño de casa hace 3 años, se dedica al transporte  por más de 7  años, teniendo su micro de una línea  que el mismo lo trabaja. Su esposa es costurera y con esa actividad le ayuda con los gastos familiares. Al Sr. Juan el destino del crédito es para el mantenimiento de su micro (arreglo de la caja y compra de tambores). El sr. esta muy agradecido con la institución por la rapidez y facilidad que se le otorga el crédito.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan, 45, has been married for 15 years and has three school-aged children.  He bought his house three years ago and has been working in the transportation business for over seven years.  He has a microbus line.  His wife is a seamstress and helps with family expenses.

Juan plans to use the loan for mini-bus maintenance (to fix the gearbox and buy new drums).  He is very grateful to the institution for the prompt and easy loan terms.

loans.use: To provide maintenance for his microbus.

loans.name: Nemesio

texts.es: El señor Nemesio se dedica a prestar servicios de limpieza y conserjería en edificios es propietario de una empresa de limpieza que ya trabaja en nuestra ciudad  hace 4 años, presta servicios a oficinas y domicilios solicita el crédito para incrementar para la compra de un lote, el señor tiene 3 hijos menores uno está en la escuela, su esposa se dedica a la venta de comida en una acera del centro de la ciudad.  El señor es emprendedor por que pretende expandir su microempresa a la ciudad de La Paz debido a que presta excelentes servicios y sus clientes le recomendaron, su deseo es el de poder crecer en su negocio, es una persona responsable y trabajadora, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mr. Nemesio is in the cleaning and janitorial services business.  He owns a cleaning company that has been active in our city for four years, providing services to offices and private homes.  He is requesting a loan to buy bulk supplies.

He has three minor, school-aged children and his wife is a sidewalk food vendor in the city center.  Nemesio is an entrepreneur who wants to expand his small business in the city of La Paz.  He gives excellent service and is recommended by his customers.  He is very responsible and hard-working, and very grateful to the institution for the support he has received.

loans.use: To buy bulk supplies.

loans.name: Israel Rene

texts.es: El cliente de nombre Israel es un cliente joven emprendedor tiene el vehículo registrado a su nombre ya que sus Padres están separados y el  vive actualmente con la Mama y sus dos hermanas el prácticamente es el Hombre de la casa por que el mantiene a toda su familia el cliente es soltero y muy responsable y vive en la zona de alto Pampahasi en la casa de sus abuelos y también la hermana le ayuda con los gastos de la familia por que ella vende productos de belleza por catalogo. Invertirá el dinero en el mantenimiento general del  minibús y así poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado. El joven Israel en la fotografia se encuentra junto a su hermana.
texts.en:
Israel is a young entrepreneur who has a vehicle registered in his name.  His parents are separated and currently he lives with his mother and two sisters.  He is the man of the house, so to speak, because he maintains the entire family.  Single and very responsible, he lives in the area of the upper Pampahasi in his grandparents' home.  His sister sells beauty products by catalogue and also helps with the household expenses.

Israel plans to use the loan to provide general maintenance for his minibus in order to give his customers the best possible service.  He is a hard worker and grateful to the institution of its support.  He is pictured in the photograph with his sister.

loans.use: To provide general maintenance for his vehicle.

loans.name: Bakhtiyar

texts.ru:
Bakhtiyar 47 let. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey kotoriye uchatsya v shkole. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione v poselke Makhmudlu vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi.
Uje 5 let kak Bakhtiyar zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korov dlya uvelicheniya molochnogo produkta kotorogo on prodayet v magazini. On izgotavlivayet yogurt i kefir dlya prodaji.
texts.en:
Bakhtiyar is 47 years old. He is married and has two children, both in school. He is an Internally displaced person from the town of Fuzuli, now living in the Fuzuli Region in the village of Makhmudlu, together with his wife and children.

For the last five years, Bakhtiyar has been working in animal farming. He raises cattle. At present he needs 2000 AZN in order to buy more cows to increase the production of milk, which he sells to stores. He also makes yogurt and kefir for sale.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Benitos

texts.es:
Benitos tiene  45 años de edad, el es casado y tiene un hijo menor de edad, el vive con sus esposa y su hijo en una comunidad donde la mayoría de pobladores son independientes  la actividad que en su mayoría desarrollan es la agricultura,  está comunicada es un anexo llamado  Cruz del Medano en el distrito de  Mórrope, el cual cuenta con 40 años de creación aproximadamente cuenta con 20 viviendas es una zona rural.

Benitos se dedica a la  comercialización de animales menores, en variedad además al engorde de cerdos, los cuales cría en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, este negocio lo desarrolla ene. Mercado central o en  los distintos caseríos de Mórrope.  Esta actividad la realiza desde hace mas de 6 años, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.

Benitos está solicitando un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para el engorde de su ganado vacuno y porcino, con el préstamo comprara alimento para dicho ganado, medicina y adecuará corrales para tal fin.

Benitos es una  persona emprendedora y responsable, el desea poder crecer como empresario y poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Benitos is 45 years old, married, and has a young child. He lives with his wife and son in a community where most of the residents are independent farmers. This community is located in an annex called Cruz del Medano in the District of Mórrope, which has been in existence for approximately 40 years. There are 20 homes in this rural area.

Benitos sells a variety of small animals. He also fattens pigs that he raises in pens located behind his home. This business is developed….at the Central Market or in different villages in the District of Mórrope. Benitos has been in business for more than six years. Throughout this time, he has gained experience in this type of work and acquired an established customer base for his business.

Benitos is requesting a loan of 2000 PEN so that he can fatten his cattle and pigs. He plans to use the loan to buy feed and medicines for his animals, as well as build adequate corrals to house them.

Benitos is an enterprising and responsible person who desires to grow as an entrepreneur so that he can provide his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase feed and medicines for his animals.

loans.name: Nidjat

texts.ru:
Etomu molodomu cheloveku 30 let. Nidjat jenat no ne imeyet detey. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom i pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione, posolok Makhmudlu vmeste so svoyey jenoy. Etomu molodomu cheloveku 30 let. 
Nidjat zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov uje 3 qoda. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego otca kotoriy toje zanimalsya skotovodstvom. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korov dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa.
texts.en: This man is 30 years of age. Nidat is married, without children. He is an Internally displaced person from the town of Fuzuli, now living in the Fuzuli Region in the village of Makhmudlu, together with his wife. He has been raising cattle for three years already. He learned this line of work from his father, who also used to raise cattle. At present he needs 2000 AZN in order to buy cows and develop his business further.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Faxraddin

texts.ru:
Faxraddin jenat i imeyet 3 detey. On jivet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoyey lubimoy jenoy i drujnimi detmi. Faxraddin rodilsya v 1961 qodu. 
4 oda nazad Faxraddin otkril sebe malenkoye kafe v kotorom samje rabotal povoram, no 2 qoda kak on izmenil eto malenkoye kafe uvelichiv yego i poetomu seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit stoli is tulya dlya kafe. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego druqa kotoriy i posovetoval yemu otkrit svayo kafe.
texts.en:
Faxraddin is married and has three children. He lives in the Absheron Region together with his beloved wife and children. Faxraddin was born in 1961.

Four years ago, Faxraddin opened a small café, in which he works himself as a chef. Two years ago he improved and expanded his café, and now he needs 2000 AZN in order to buy tables and chairs. He learned this business from a friend of his, who had encouraged Faxraddin to open his own café.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for his cafe

loans.name: Geys

texts.ru:
On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Geys jenat i imeyet odnogo rebonka. Yemu 41 let. Geys 9 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom ranshe on razvodil ovec no seychas on razvodit korov. Geys skotovodstvu nauchilsya u svoyego dyadi kotoriy razvodit ovec. 
Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korov dlya uvelicheniya kolichesta skota dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa.
texts.en: Geys is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region together with his family.  Geys is 41 years old, married and has one child.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for nine years.  He previously bred sheep and now breeds cattle.  Geys learned animal husbandry from his uncle, who breeds sheep.  Geys currently needs 2000 AZN in order to buy cattle and expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Natig

texts.ru: Natig 39 let. Jenat imeyet 2 detey kotoriye uchatsya v shkole. Natig yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione ,posolok Khoradiz vmeste so svoyey semyoy. On 5 let kak zanimayetsya perevozkoy stroitelnix materialov. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupir zapchasti dlya pochinki svoyego qruzovika , tak kak on ne mojet rabotat ne pochiniv yego.
texts.en: Natig is 39 years old.  He is married and has two children, both of whom attend school.  Natig is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Khoradiz village of the Fuzuli region together with his family.  He has been involved in transportation of construction materials for five years.  Currently, he need 2000 AZN in order to buy spare parts to repair his truck because he cannot work unless it is fixed.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair his truck

loans.name: Omar

texts.ru: Etot molodoy chelovek rodilsya v 1977 qodu. On jenat i imeyet odnogo sina kotoriy uchitsya v shkole. Omar yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i sinom. Omar seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uvelicheniya molochnogo produkta. On uje 5 let kak zanimayetsya skototvodstvom i razvodit korov. Yego jena i on delayut sir i yogurt iz moloka i prodayut yego u sbeya doma. K ixney produkcii imeyetsya bolshaya potrebnost vot pochemu oni i xotat uvelichit kolichestvo molochnogo produkta.
texts.en: This young man was born in 1977.  He is married and has one son, who attends school.  Omar is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region together with his wife and son.  Omar currently needs 2000 AZN in order to buy cattle and increase milk production.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for five years and breeds cattle.  His wife and he make cheese and yogurt from the milk and sell it at their home.  Because their products are in high demand, they want to increase the production of milk.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Famil

texts.ru: Famil jenat i imeyet 2 detey. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda seychas projivayet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Famil 52 qoda. On nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit shveynuyu mashini. Famil uje 9 let kak rabotayet portnim. Etomu biznessu ona nauchilsya u svoyego dedushki kotoriy shitalsya ochen  xoroshim portnim v svoyey derevne. Famil toje yavlyayetsya xoroshim portnim i imeyet mnogo kliyentov.
texts.en: Famil is married and has two children.  He is an IDP (Internally Displace Person) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Absheron region together with his family.  Famil is 52 years old.  He needs 2000 AZN in order to buy a sewing machine.  Famil has been working a tailor for nine years.  He learned this business from his grandfather, who was considered a very good tailor in his village.  Famil is also a good tailor and has many customers.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Shamkhal

texts.ru: Shamkhal rodilsya v 1974 qodu. On jenat imeyet odnogo rebonka. Shamkhal yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione v posolke Ashagi Seyidakhmedli vmeste so svoyey lubimoy semyoy. Uje 3 qoda kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korov dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa i uvelicheniya molochnogo produkta.
texts.en: Shamkal was born in 1974.  He is married and has one child.  Shamkal is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Ashagi Seyidakhmedli village of the Fuzuli region together with his beloved family.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for 3 years and breeds cattle.  Currently, he needs 2000 AZN in order to buy cattle, develop his business and increase milk production.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Charlotte Esi

texts.en: In this picture is Charlotte. She is divorced and has four children. She attended a vocational school. She cooks wakye and sells it at Abura. (Wakye is a combination of rice and beans). It is normally served with hot black pepper sauce, macaroni, salad and eggs. Charlotte wishes to expand her business and needs a loan to buy additional beans, rice, eggs, vegetables and others to cook wakye. The profit she hopes to get as a result of the loan will be used to educate her children. She is standing close to the bag of beans she uses for the wakye.

loans.use: to buy additional beans, rice, eggs, vegetables and other items to cook wakye to sell

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en: For the past eight years, Georgina has been processing palm oil to sell at Abrafo in Abura. She is married and has two children. Her husband is a mason. She has been through senior high school. She also knows how to sew. Georgina uses her income to assist her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Georgina will use the loan to purchase more palm fruits to produce more oil to sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Georgina plans to save towards the secondary education of her children. She is showing the palm fruits she put in the pot, ready to be boiled.

loans.use: to purchase more palm fruits

loans.name: Felicia

texts.en:
Felicia is a palm-oil extractor. She also prepares millet porridge and serves them with doughnuts and bread in Abura. She has received a senior-high education.  She is divorced and takes care of six dependents. She has been in this trade for 24 years. She feeds, clothes and educates her children with the income she makes from her sales. 

Her loan will be used to buy millet, flour, sugar, pepper and other ingredients to prepare the porridge for resale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: to buy millet, flour, sugar, pepper and other ingredients to prepare the porridge for resale.

loans.name: Yaa

texts.en: Yaa makes soap locally called "Don’t Touch Me" for sale at Abura. Yaa has received education up to the junior high level.  She is a widow and has seven dependents. Yaa has been making soap for sale for 5 years. She is responsible for the payment of school fees and other household expenses. Her loan will be used to buy ingredients to prepare soap for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare soap for sale.

loans.name: Yaa

texts.en: Yaa is married and has four children. She extracts palm oil from palm fruits for sale at Abura. Her husband is a farmer. She has been selling palm oil for 3 years. She responsibly supports her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy palm fruits to produce oil for sale. She anticipates reinvesting her increased income back into her business.

loans.use: Her loan will be used to buy palm fruits to produce oil for sale.

loans.name: Maame

texts.en: For the past 6 years, Maame has been involved in production and sale of plam oil, which is often used in preparing okra soup, red-red, apaparansa and other Ghanaian dishes. She is married and currently taking care of six dependents. Her husband is a hunter. As part of her responsibility she feeds, clothes and educates her children. For some time, Maame has been longing to produce on a larger scale and a loan from kiva will help her make oil in larger quantities for resale. When an additional profit is realized, it will be reinvested back into her business for further growth.

loans.use: to make oil in larger quantities for resale.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: As a way of making a living, Adjoa sells fried fish at Abrafo, a village near Abura in Cape Coast. She is married and has four children. Her husband is a farmer. Adjoa has been in this trade for four years. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy more fresh fish to fry fish for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save towards educating her children. At the time of our visit, Adjoa had not started frying the fish and so, in the photo she is demonstrating how she fries the fish.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fish to fry for resale.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is married and has six dependents. She has received senior high education. Ama sells palm oil, shea butter, powder, soaps and other items by moving from one area to another at Abura, which she has done for 5 years. Her husband is a teacher. Ama uses her income to assist her husband in providing for the basic needs of her family. Ama will use the loan to purchase shea butter, powder, and soaps to expand her business.  With the new profits from her expanded business, Ama plans to reinvest back into her business.

loans.use: to purchase shea butter, powder, and soaps to expand her business.

loans.name: Memunatu

texts.en: Memunatu sells food items such as salted fish, oil, soaps, rice, steel-wool and other items at Abura. Demand for her goods has started increasing and so she needs a loan of 1000 to buy more food items for resale. She is married and has three children. Her husband sells provisions. Memunatu has been trading for 4 years. She helps her husband in the general upkeep of the home. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more food items for resale.

loans.name: Efia

texts.en: Efia is a palm oil extractor at Abura. She has received a junior high school education.  She is married and has three children. Her husband is a driver. She helps her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy more palm fruits to produce more oil for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save towards the university education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more palm fruits to produce more oil for sale.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa is a producer of both palm oil and kernel oil at Abrafo, a village near Abura.  She has been through senior high school. She is married and has five dependents. Her husband is a farmer. She responsibly assists her husband in taking care of the family. Her loan will be used to buy additional palm fruits to expand her business. She hopes to reinvest her new profits. In this picture she is pouring the palm kernels into the nut cracking machine.

loans.use: to buy additional palm fruits to expand her business.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua sells palm oil at Abura. She has been making palm oil for sale for ten years. She is going to add the money she will be receiving to her capital to be able to buy sacks of palm fruits to produce oil for sale. She is married to a driver and together they take care of their dependents. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy land.

loans.use: to buy sacks of palm fruits to produce oil for sale.

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi is married and has six dependents. She prepares banku (fermented maize dumplings) for sale at Abura, which she has done for nine years. Her husband is a farmer. Esi uses her income to assist her husband in the payment of utility bills. Esi will use the loan to purchase bags of maize, firewood and other things to help make more banku for sale. With the new profits from her expanded business, Esi plans to provide a meaningful education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize, firewood and other things to help make more banku for sale.

loans.name: Rahima

texts.en: Rahima is married and has six dependents. She sells palm oil at Abura, which she has done for ten years. Her husband is a farmer.
