Rahima uses her income to assist her husband in the payment of utility bills and other household expenses. She will use the loan to purchase palm fruits to produce oil for sale. She plans to plow her new profits back into her expanded business. The pot on the fire has extracts from the palm fruits being boiled to make the oil.

loans.use: to purchase palm fruits to produce oil for sale.

loans.name: Segundo Francisco

texts.es:
Segundo tiene  57 años de edad, el es casado.  Vive en casa propia, la cual  está ubicada en la parte rural del caserío del distrito de Mochumi en un caserío llamado  Huaca de Toro , el cual no cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. 

Segundo se dedica a desarrollar labores de agricultura desde hace varios años, el suele sembrar arroz, cultivo  con el que cuenta, parea solventar los gastos de sus hogar, el producto final que obtiene Segundo lo comercializa en los molinos de la ciudad de  Lambayeque.

Segundo desea adquirir fertilizantes y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de arroz, con esta acción el espera obtener una buena cosecha. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de   2000 nuevos soles, 

Segundo es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es poder crecer como empresario y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Segundo is 57 years old and married. He lives in his own home in the rural village of Huaca de Toro in the District of Mochumi. He does not receive all of the basic services.

Segundo has worked as a farmer for several years. He grows rice in order pay for the household expenses. The rice that he produces is sold to the mills in the city of Lambayeque.

Segundo wants to acquire fertilizers and pesticides so that he can maintain his rice crop. With these supplies, he hopes to achieve a good harvest. For this reason, he has approached Edpyme Alternativa to request a loan in the amount of 2000 PEN.

Segundo is a peaceful and responsible person. His greatest wish is to continue growing as an entrepreneur so that he can get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es:
Isabel es una madre D. familia que tiene  42 años D. edad, elL. es casada y tiene un hijo menor D. edad, elL. vive con sus familia en una comunidad pequeña llamada Tembladera, perteneciente al departamento D. Cajamarca, provincia D. Contumazá, distrito D. Yonan.

Isabel se dedica aL. venta D. Mariscos (lifes ). Cuenta con 5 años D. experiencia en dicha actividad.  Su producto lo comercializa en L. comunidad D. Tembladera.

Isabel está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000  nuevos soles para que pueda adquirir una mayor cantidad D. Mariscos, y D. esta manera incrementar sus ventas y por consiguiente aumentar su ganancia , para poder tener una mejor calidad D. vida.

Isabel es una persona  muy responsable y tranquiL., cuenta con buenas referencias por parte D. las personas que L. conocen.
texts.en:
Isabel is a mother who is 42 years of age. She is married and has a young son. Isabel lives with her family in the small community of Tembladera, which is part of the District of Yonan in Contumazá Province, Department of Cajamarca.

Isabel sells seafood and has five years of experience in this business. She sells her products in the community of Tembladera.

Isabel is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN so that she can acquire a larger quantity of seafood. This will enable her to increase her sales and continue generating more income. As a result, she can have a better quality of life.

Isabel is a responsible and peaceful individual. She received good references from the people who know her.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of seafood.

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.es:
Lázaro es un padre de familia de 58 años de edad,  el es casado y tiene 3 hijos, vive en casa propia la cual está ubicada en el caserío Manco Inca en el distrito de Tambogrande, este  caserío es mediano con deseos de superación.

 Lázaro se dedica a la agricultura, el cuenta con 4 hectáreas de limón y 2 hectáreas de mango, el limón lo cosecha semanalmente, con lo cual asume sus obligaciones familiares.  Además se dedica ala comercialización de  ganado ovino los cuales cría y engorda en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio su domicilio y después los vende en el mercado local. 

 Lázaro está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para que pueda realizar labores de limpieza y comprar fertilizantes para cultivo de limón. Además desea comprar alimento balanceado para sus ovinos  y así poderlos vender a un mejor precio y seguir creciendo en su actividad. 

Lázaro es una persona con buenas referencias muy responsable, las personas que lo conocen como una persona tranquila y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Lázaro is a 58-year-old father who is married and has three children. He lives in his own home in the village of Manco Inca in the District of Tambogrande. This medium-sized village has intentions to grow.

Lázaro is a farmer who has four hectares of lemon trees and two hectares of mango trees. The lemons are harvested weekly so that he can meet his family obligations. In addition, he sells sheep that he raises and fattens in pens located behind his home. The animals are sold at the local market.

Lázaro is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN so that he can clear his land and buy fertilizers for his lemon crop. In addition, he wants to buy balanced feed for his sheep so that he can sell them at a better price and grow his business.

Lázaro is a responsible person with good references. The people who know him say that he is a peaceful and hardworking individual.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for his lemon crop and balanced feed for his sheep.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis tiene 37 años de edad, vive con sus esposa y sus dos menores hijos.  Cuenta con casa propia la cual está ubicada en una  zona urbana marginal  del distrito de la Victoria, a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo. La vivienda cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua  el lugar donde vive esta poblándose.	

Luis se dedica al servicio de transporte público, en su unidad móvil, un taxi que es de su propiedad, el trabaja todo el día, con estos ingresos Luis cubre los gastos de sus hogar. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 5 años, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro

Luis está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles, para que con este dinero, el pueda comprar una computadora para ayudar a que el desarrollo académico de sus hijos sea mas optimo. Luis desea que con este equipo sus hijos puedan desarrollar sus tareas con mayor facilidad.

 Luis cuenta con buenas referencias personales y crediticias, el a demostrado a Edpyme Alternativa, sus puntualidad y responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Luis is 37 years old and lives with his wife and two young children. He has his own home in a marginal urban area within the District of La Victoria, which is 20 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo. His home receives electricity and water since he lives in a populated area.

Luis provides public transportation services using the taxi that he owns. He works every day and the income that he earns goes toward the household expenses. Luis has been in business for five years and has acquired experience in this line of work.

He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN so that he can purchase a computer for his children. He hopes that this piece of equipment will help them academically by allowing them to have an easier time completing their schoolwork.

Luis has good personal and credit references. He has demonstrated to Edpyme Alternativa that he is punctual and responsible.

loans.use: to purchase a computer for his children.

loans.name: Zafra Beatriz

texts.es:
Beatriz es una madre de familia que  tiene  de 41 años de edad, ella vive con su menor hijo  en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el  distrito de Zaña, ciudad 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Beatriz se dedica a la elaboración y comercialización de cajas de cartón, ella se dedica a este negocio hace más de 10 años en los que ha adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija para sus negocio. Beatriz se encarga de comercializar sus productos en un puesto en el mercado de su localidad. 

Beatriz está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para que pueda obtener más materia prima para la elaboración de sus productos, para que de esta manera ella pueda percibir mayor ingresos, para los gastos de su hogar. 

Beatriz desea mejorar su calidad  de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias, las personas que la conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a 41 year-old mother who lives with her [dependent] son in her own home which is located in Zaña district, 45 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Beatriz makes and sells cardboard boxes.  She has been in this business for more than ten years.  She has acquired experience in the field and also regular customers for her business.  Beatriz sells her products from a stall in her town market.

Beatriz is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can obtain more raw materials for making her products and  make more income to cover her household expenses.

Beatriz would like to improve her quality of life through effort and hard work.  She has good references.  The people who know her describe her as a calm and responsible person.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for her business

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es:
Angelina tien 57 años de edad , tiene dos hijos independientes y vive en casa propia  en  una zona urbano marginal, del distrito de salas a una hora y media  

Angelina se dedica ala venta de comida, el cual es el sustento de su hogar. Ella cuenta con 25 años de experiencia en el negocio, tiempo que le ha permitido adquirir experiencia  y clientela fija para su negocio.

 Angelina está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para que pueda invertir en gaseosa y cerveza para implementar su negocio, ella piensa que esta ampliación será favorable y su negocio será mas rentable.

Angelina es una mujer bastante trabajadora y que se esfuerza a diario por salir adelante y tener una mejor calidad de vida. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudar a los demás.
texts.en:
Angelina, age 57, has two independent children.  She lives in her own house in a marginalized urban area, which is an hour and a half from the Salas district.

Angelina sells food, and this is what supports her household.  She has 25 years of experience in the business.  This time has allowed her to acquire experience and a customer base for her business. 
 
Angelina is requesting a loan for 500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in soft drinks and beer for her business.  She thinks that this expansion will be favorable to her business and that her business will be more profitable.

Angelina is a very hard-working woman.  She puts forth effort every day in order to get ahead and to have a better quality of life.  

The people that know her consider her to be a kind woman who is always ready to help others.

loans.use: to buy beer and soft drinks in order to expand her business.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
Moises es un padre de familia de 29 años de edad, vive en casa de sus suegros con su esposa e hijo, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se dedica a la actividad comercial,turismo y en las zonas aledañas a la agricultura.

Desde hace 2 años labora en un hotel como recepcionista, trabajo que le ayuda para solventar sus obligaciones familiares, ha creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles que lo utilizará en la compra de una moto lineal para que le facilite transportarlo al trabajo y también para adquirir una puerta para el cuarto de su hijo. Con el salario que le pagan en su trabajo podrá cubrir su crédito y poder tener una  mejor calidad de vida para su familia.

Moises es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que quiere es que su familia tenga algunas comodidades y mejoras en su hogar.
texts.en:
Moises is a 29 year-old father who lives in his in-laws' house with his wife and son.  The house receives all basic services and is located in Chiclayo province.  The people in this area work in commerce and tourism and the people in neighboring areas work in farming.

Moises has been working as a receptionist in a hotel for two years.  This job helps him to meet his family obligations.  He is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a motorbike which will make it easier for him to get to work.  He will also buy a door for his son's bedroom.  Moises will repay his loan with the money that he earns in his job.  The loan will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

Moises is a responsible and hard-working person and the only thing that he wants is for his family to enjoy some comforts and improvements to their home.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike and to cover some household expenses

loans.name: Jorge Luis Celso

texts.es:
Jorge es padre de familia de 30 años de edad, vive con su menor hijo en casa de unos familiares; cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, la cual se encuentra en el distrito de Eten que pertenece y está cerca de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la pesca y a la crianza de animales de corral.

Desde hace algunos años Jorge tiene su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) la cual maneja llevando pasajeros a los diferentes destinos de la zona donde vive, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo y de él.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 2000 nuevos soles y su destino será para brindarle mantenimiento e implementación de su mototaxi que esta presentando algunos desperfectos y necesita tenerla en buen estado para que siga trabajando, ya que es el único medio con el que mantiene su casa.  Jorge es una
persona que con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a podido conseguir más clientes con el servicio que presta y asi pueda darle un mejor futuro a su hijo.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 30 year-old father who lives with his [dependent] son in a house belonging to some family members.  The house has water and electricity and is located in Eten district which belongs to and is near Chiclayo province.  The residents of this district mainly work in fishing and raising farmyard animals.

For some years, Jorge has owned a motorcycle taxi (a mode of transport that is used for travelling short distances and which holds a maximum of three people).  He drives passengers to different destinations in his area.  With the income that he makes, he is able to improve his own quality of life and that of his son.

Jorge has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa and he will use the money to have his motorcycle taxi serviced and repaired because it is experiencing some problems and he needs to keep it in a good state of repair so that he can continue working as this is his only way he has of supporting his household.

Jorge is a person who, through a lot of effort and hard work, has been able to gain more customers for his services and is thereby able to provide his son with a better future.

loans.use: to have his motorcycle taxi serviced and repaired

loans.name: Geivi

texts.es:
Geivi de 28 años de edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, contando con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece a la provincia de Piura.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

La actividad que desarrolla Geivi es ha la venta de abarrotes y bebidas en su domicilio desde hace algunos años, al encontrarse su negocio en su casa puede atender a cualquier hora, lo que le permite diferenciarse de otras tiendas y así pueda obtener más ingresos para su casa.

El crédito solicitado por a Edpyme Alternativa es de 500 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinará para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y poder ampliar su negocio con otros productos una vez que sus ventas aumenten.  El deseo de Geivi es tener más adelante una tienda más grande que le genere mayores ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y lo logrará con su trabajo y dedicación.
texts.en:
Geivi is 28 years old and lives with her husband in her own home.  The only service her house receives is electricity.  It is located in Tambogrande district, in Piura province.  The people in this area work in farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Geivi's business activity is selling groceries and drinks from her home.  She has been in this business for some years.  As her business is located in her home, she is able to serve her customers at any time.  This allows her to differentiate her store from the others and enables her to make more income for her household.

Geivi is requesting a loan for 500 Peruvian soles which she will use to buy a larger quantity of merchandise.  When her sales increase, she will be able to expand her business.  Geivi's wish for the future is to have a larger store which makes her more income so that she can improve her quality of life.  She will achieve this through her work and commitment.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of merchandise and expand her business

loans.name: Walter Feliciano

texts.es:
Walter de 41 años, vive con su esposa e hija en casa de sus padres, cuenta con todos los servicios, ubicado en el distrito de Chepén, la misma que pertence al departamento de la Libertad.  La actividad que se desarrolla es la agricultura y ganadería.

Desde hace varios años labora como operador de maquinaria en un molino de arroz de la misma zona donde vive,elsalario que recibe es para cubrir las necesidades diarias de su hogar.  Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para realizar unos arreglos en su casa como para cubrir algunos gastos personales.  Con los ingresos que obtenga en el trabajo podrá pagar su crédito y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

Walter es un hombre trabajador y con mucha empeño desea que su familia se supere cada vez más y que no le falte nada.
texts.en:
41 year-old Walter lives with his wife and daughter in his parents' home which receives all basic services.  It is located in Chepén district, in La Libertad department.  People in this area work in farming and livestock raising.

Walter has been working as a machinery operator in a rice mill in his area for several years now.  He uses his salary to cover the daily needs of his household.  He has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use part of this money to make some repairs to his home and will use the rest to cover some personal expenses.  Walter will use the income from his job to repay the loan and provide his family with a better quality of life.

Walter is a hard-working and tenacious man.  He wants his family to do well and wants to ensure that they don't want for anything.

loans.use: to make some repairs to his house and to cover some personal expenses

loans.name: Lourdes Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Lourdes, tiene su propio negocio, una pulpería con más de quince años en las ventas, también sigue ejerciendo su oficio de profesión de enfermera auxiliar, a domicilio ya que por su enfermedad no lo ejerce en la institución.
Lourdes es madre de tres hijos, solo el menor está estudiando ya que los otros son independiente, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio, en todos estos años, ha venido teniendo un balance con su negocio, al introducir una variedad de productos, gracias   a los financiamiento que Afodenic ha otorgado en varios ciclos.
 Con este nuevo préstamo será para la compra de granos básicos, en la compra de quintales de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, productos lácteos, gaseosas, golosinas y así como productos de aseo personal. Sus planes es seguir trabajando para el bien comun de la familia.
texts.en:
Lourdes has had her business, a grocery store, with more than 15 years in sales. She has also continued to practice her professional career as an emergency nurse from her home. Her illness does not permit her to practice at an institution. 

Lourdes is the mother of three children. Only the youngest is in school, while the others are independent. She has her husband's support. He is a merchant. Through all these years she has balanced her business by introducing a variety of products thanks to the loans from Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner) granted over several cycles.

With this new loan she will purchase basic grains and she will purchase quintals of rice, beans, sugar, dairy products, sweets, and personal hygiene products. Her plans are to keep working for the family's common welfare.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, dairy products, soft drinks, and personal hygiene products with the goal of increasing her sales.

loans.name: Tres Esquinas Group

texts.es:
La Señora Mara, tiene 34 años D. edad, es casada tiene una hija pequeña D. 02 años D. edad, socia D. la Alcancía Comunal  Tres Esquinas, la socia se dedica a la decoración D. locales en  eventos con  telas, su trabajo es muy reconocido en la zona D. Huancayo, ya que todas las mañanas organiza con su esposo para decorar los locales D. eventos, ella tiene una habilidad  un arte para decorar  para cualquier eventos como matrimonios, bautizos, agasajos, cúmplenos y otros, su esposo se queda admirado del  gran talento que realiza, el negocio va creciendo, Ellos se proyectan para  la compra D. su casa propia. El préstamo solicitado es para la compra D. telas. La socia está ubicada en la primera D. la segunda fila lado izquierdo con chompa color celeste casaca D. cuero color negro. El joven Elvis Jhon quien falto por motivo D. trabajo está en parte superior D. la fotografía.   
El Préstamo es Socia Mara quien Solicito s/. 700.00 Nuevos Soles
texts.en:
Mara is 34 years old, married, and she has a little girl who is 2 years old. She is a member of the communal bank "Tres Esquinas", meaning "Three Corners". She decorates venues for special events with fabrics. Her work is highly recognized in the region of Huancayo. Every morning she organizes herself with her husband to decorate venues for special events. She has an artistic ability to decorate for any special occasion, such as weddings, baptisms, parties, birthdays, and others. Her husband is astonished at her great talent and the business continues to grow. She is the first person on the second row to the left, wearing a blue sweater and a black leather jacket. Elvis Jhon was absent for work reasons and he can be seen in the top portion of the photograph. 

The loan is in the amount of S/. 700 nuevos soles.

loans.use: decoration of venues for special events with the use of fabrics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Carlos Adán

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Adán  es de Managua del barrio Carlos Núñez es padre de familia de 3 niños que están estudiando su esposa es ama de casa trabaja de higienista, es una persona responsable honrada y luchadora por buen bienestar de su familia.El señor acude a nuestras oficina para solicitar crédito  ya que dice que lo quiere para hacer un anexo a su vivienda  y mejoras las condiciones para sus hijo. 
Don Carlos agradece a ceprodel por brindarle la oportunidad de poder hacer las mejoras a su vivienda
texts.en:
Carlos Adan is from Managua, of the Carlos Nunez neighborhood. He is the father of a family of 3 children, all of whom are in school. His wife is a housewife and she works as a hygienist. He is a responsible and honest person who strives to provide his family with wellbeing. He has approached our office to request a loan. He says he wants to expand his house and to improve the living conditions for his children. 

Carlos is thankful to Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) for providing him with an opportunity to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Benjamín Antonio

texts.es:
Benjamín Antonio es de ciudad Managua  Municipio de Managua trabaja como mecánico, es una persona  responsable, honesta con buenos principios para su familia. 
Benjamín se presento a nuestra oficina para solicitar un crédito ya que necesita construir un cuarto de habitación.
El señor dice que se siente bien agradecido con ceprodel por que gracias a los financiamiento  se a comprado electrodomésticos y a mejoras parte de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Benjamin Antonio is from the city of Managua (the municipality of Managua). He works as a mechanic and he is a responsible and honest person with good family principles.

Benjamin came to our office to request a loan to build a bedroom. 

He says that he is very thankful to Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) because thanks to his loan he has been able to purchase household appliances and to make home improvements.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Marvin Santiago

texts.es:
Marvin Santiago  vive en la Cuidad de Managua, se conoce como una persona honesta, excelente y eficiente en la empresa que labora.
Don Marvin acudió a las oficinas de ceprodel a Solicitar un préstamo para hacer mejoras de su vivienda. Para compra de materiales de construcción   como cemento, piedra, arena, piedrín y para el pago de mano de obra.
El señor Marvin  nos manifiesta que gracias a los créditos con ceprodel  a mejorado su casa de habitación para poder darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida
texts.en:
Marvin Santiago lives in the city of Managua. He is known to be an honest, excellent, and efficient person in the company where he works.

Marvin approached the offices of Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) to request a loan to carry out home improvements. He will purchase construction materials such as cement, construction rocks, sand, gravel, and to cover the labor expenses.

Marvin tells us that it is thanks to loans from Ceprodel that he has been able to improve his home and to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Justo  Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Justo antonio,vive en departamento de Managua,es una persona social, amable de buenos valores morales, trabahjadora, para darle una mejor acondicion y estabilida a su familia.

El señor justo  visito nuestras instalaciones para solicitar un crédito por que quiere ocupar una parte del dinero que ceprodel le va prestar lo va a invertir en las mejoras de su vivienda, en levantar una pared en su sala, compra materiales tales como cemento, arena , bloque y otra parte del dinero lo va a invertí  en compra de una refrigeradora por que quiere poner un pequeño negocio.
El señor se siente agradecido con ceprodel por darle la oportunidad de hacer realidad sus sueño por que gracias a los prestamos obtenidos en ceprodel ha podido mejoras su condiciones en su vivienda
texts.en:
Justo Antonio lives in the department of Managua. He is a social and kind person with good moral values. He works hard to provide his family with better living conditions and greater stability. 

Justo can to your offices to request a loan. A part of the funds that Ceprodel will loan him will be invested in making home improvements, to build a wall in his living room. He will purchase materials such as cement, sand, construction blocks and other materials. Another part of the loan will be invested in the purchase of a freezer to start up a business. He feels thankful to Ceprodel (Kiva Field Partner) for giving him an opportunity to make his dreams a reality. It is thanks to loans obtained from Ceprodel he has been ale to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Sociedad 12 De Abril (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Sociedad 12 de Abril está formado por 1 hombre y 9 mujres que son amigas, vecinas y trabajan en un mercado de la ciudad, esto  les ha  permitido aportar  a  la economía de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad esta bañada por 4 ríos dándole el nombre de Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, su centro histórico fue nombrado como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad en 1999, su gente mantiene su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora Blanca vive por el sector de Totoracocha en la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene 39 años, es madre soltera de 5 hijos de 20, 16, 11, 9 y 3 años de edad, su primer hijo trabaja y es quien le ayuda económicamente, su segundo hijo estudia en el colegio, su tercer y cuarto hijo estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Doña Blanca es comerciante de frutas y verduras en un mercado de la ciudad hace 20 años, trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde en su puesto propio. Cuando hay partidos de fútbol  vende confitería en el estadio.

En el banco comunal esta hace 2 años y su nuevo crédito lo va ha invertir en la compra de frutas y verduras para su negocio.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia. 

En esta ocasión nos acompaña en la foto la Señora Karina, es la promotora de crédito de Banco Comunal, está sentada entre las socias con una blusa blanca.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Sociedad 12 de Abril", is made up of 1 man and 9 women, all of whom are friends and neighbors who work in the city's market. This has helped them to earn an income for their home and to provide for their families. They live in different locations in the city of Cuenca. This city is irrigated by 4 rivers which is the origin of the name Santa Ana de los 4 Rios, meaning Santa Ana of the 4 Rivers. Its historical centre was named as a national cultural heritage site in 1999. The people retain their culture and traditions.

Blanca lives in the sector of Totoracocha in the city of Cuenca. She is 39 years old and she is the single mother of 5 children, aged 20, 16, 11, 9 and 3. Her eldest child works and it is he who helps her financially. Her second child is in high school, and her third and fourth child is in primary school in the city. She does not own a house of her own, which is why she rents.

Blanca has been a fruit and vegetables merchant in the city's market for 20 years. She works from Sunday to Sunday from 7 in the morning until 6 in the evening from her own stand. When there are soccer games she sells confections in the stadium. 

She has been with her communal bank for 2 years and her new loan will be invested in the purchase of fruits and vegetables for her business.

Her dream is to have a house of her own.

At this time Karina is pictured with our group. She is the communal bank credit agent. She is seated among the members, wearing a white blouse.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Por Un Futuro Mejor (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Por un Futuro Mejor está conformado por 9  mujeres luchadoras, trabajadoras y emprendedoras. La mayoría laboran en el mercado en diferentes actividades, así  ayudan  a mejorar la economía de sus hogares. Viven por los alrededores del Cantón Paute que se encuentra a 35 km. al noreste de Cuenca. Su clima es más seco y caliente que Cuenca, siendo propicio para la floricultura, su gente se dedica al comercio, a la cría de animales y agricultura, son personas muy amables y gentiles. 

La Señora. Rosa vive en el Cantón de Guachapala, tiene 45 años, es madre soltera de 5 hijas de 28, 27, 24, 21, 20 años de edad, sus tres primeras hijas son casadas e  independientes, su cuarta hija le ayuda en los quehaceres de su casa y su ultima hija estudia en la universidad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Rosa labora en la agricultura, para realizar este trabajo arrienda tierras para sembrar hortalizas y verduras, sus productos vende en el mercado de Paute.

Fué invitada por una amiga a formar parte del Banco Comunal, este es su tercer crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de semillas de papas para la siembra.
 
Su sueño es comprarse un terreno para continuar con su trabajo. 

La foto pequeña que está adjunta a la foto del grupo es de una de las socias que no podía dejar su puesto de trabajo.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Por un Futuro Mejor", meaning "For a Better Future" is made up of 9 achieving, hardworking, and enterprising women. The majority of them work in the market in different activities to improve their household's economy. They live in the surroundings of the Paute canton, located 35 km northeast from Cuenca. The climate is drier and warmer than in Cuenca, making it suitable for growing flowers. The people are dedicated to commerce, raising livestock, and agriculture. They are kind and courteous. 

Rosa lives in the canton of Guachapala. She is 45 years old and the single mother of 5 daughters, aged 28, 27, 24, 21 and 20. Her three eldest daughters are married and independent. Her fourth daughter helps her with the household obligations and her youngest daughter is in university. She doesn't have a house of her own, which is why she rents.

Roda works in agriculture. To work she rents farm land to cultivate produce and vegetables. Her products are sold in the Paute market.

She was invited by a friend to join the communal bank. It is her third loan and she will invest it in the purchase of seed potatoes to cultivate.

Her dream is to buy a plot of land to keep on with her work.

The smaller photo added to the group photo is of one of the members who could not leave her work.

loans.use: to purchase seed potatoes to cultivate.

loans.name: Celmit

texts.es:
La Sra. Celmith pertenece al Banco Comunal “María Paz II” del Distrito D. Tarapoto, Provincia  y Departamento D. San Martín. Es Soltera, tiene 42 años y tiene  04 hijos;  tres ya cuentan con familia propia solo el menor D. 14 años está en el nivel secundario.

Ante la necesidad D. generar sus propios ingresos iniciò su negocio D. venta D. jugos,  actividad  que no le generaba muchas ganancias  y  contando tan solo con  un capital D. S/.300.00 deciD. vender mercería, pasamanería, (productos D. uso personal) haciéndose muy rápidamente D. muy buena clientela por su carisma y buena atención.
 
Con este préstamo D. S/.  1500.00, comprará: espejos, peines,  linternas, gel para cabello, jaboneras, hebillas, todo ellos en docenas para así surtir su mercadería y dar una buena atención a sus clientes.

Celmit  es una mujer emprendedora,  su sueño es contar con una tienda mayorista y está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a realizar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Celmith belongs to the communal bank "Maria Paz II" of the district of Tarapoto, in the province and department of San Martin. She is single, 42 years old, and she has 4 children. Three of them have a family of their own and the youngest is 14 years old and he is in high school.

When she saw the need to generate her own income she started up a business selling juices. This business activity did not generate much income and while she had a capital fund of only S/.300 she decided to open a sewing notions store and personal accessories (personal use products). She quickly earned a very good clientele for her charisma and her good client service.

This loan is in the amount of S/. 1500 and she will purchase: mirrors, combs, flash lights, hair gel, soap dispensers, and belt buckles. She will acquire everything by the dozens to supply herself of merchandise and to proviD. her clients with good service.

Celmith is an enterprising woman. Her dream is to become a wholesaler. She is very thankful to the Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) movement for helping women like herself to realize their dreams.

loans.use: to purchase mirrors, combs, flash lights, hair gel, soap dispensers, and belt buckles, by the dozens.

loans.name: Liceth

texts.es:
La Sra. Liceth pertenece al Banco Comunal “María Paz” del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Es soltera y tiene 25 años.

Se iniciò como comerciante vendiendo mercaderia tales como zapatos, sabanas, sandalias al crédito, pero al ver que algunos clientes no le pagaban puntualmente y  ante la  necesidad de generar sus propios ingresos  y contando con un capital de S/. 300.00 decidió dedicarse  a la elaboración de chupetes (helados de hielo) de frutas regionales, esta actividad la realiza en su propia casa, que por cierto son muy agradables  y del deleite de sus consumidores. 

Con este préstamo de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles  comprará  frutas de la región en sacos y esencias naturales para la elaboración de chupetes y así continuar dando una mejor atención a sus clientes. 

La Sra. Liceth  es una mujer trabajadora y tiene como sueño contar con una heladería y jugueria, está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Liceth belongs to the communal bank "Maria Pas" of the district of Tarapoto, in the province and department of San Martin. She is single and she is 25 years old.

She started out as a merchant, selling merchandise such as shoes, bed sheets, and sandals on credit. But when some clients had not paid on time and when she faced the need to generate her own income and having a capital fund of S/.300 nuevos soles, she decided to start making sorbets (iced treats) with locally grown fruit. She carries out her activity in her own home and for certain her products are very good to the delight of her consumers.

With this loan of S/.800 nuevos soles she will purchase sacks regionally grown fruit and natural flavorings to make her sorbets to continue to provide her clients with a good service.

Liceth is a hardworking woman and her dream is to open an ice cream and juice parlor. She is very thankful to the Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) movement for helping women like herself to have opportunities to develop themselves in their field of work.

loans.use: to purchase regionally grown fruits and natural flavorings.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La Sra. Rosa  pertenece al Banco Comunal “Mujeres de la Colina II” del Distrito de La Banda de Shilcayo, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Es soltera, tiene 43  años  y tiene tres  hijos, dos de ellos ya cuentan con su propia familia, solo el menor está en el nivel secundario.

Inicia su negocio  con  la venta de frutas en el mercado de la zona, lo dejò debido a que no generaba muchas ganancias y  decidiò  comprar un motocarro con un capital  de S/. 500.00 que  le sirvió de cuota inicial, este vehículo es utilizado para transporte de pasajeros dentro de la ciudad, por lo que está muy contenta ya que las ganancias le sirven para ir pagando poco a poco el crèdito. 


Con este préstamo de S/. 1800.00, financiará la compra de un motocarro màs que le servirá para mejorar sus ingresos  a través del alquiler diario de este vehículo.
 
Rosa es una  mujer trabajadora, su sueño es tener algún día una tienda grande de alquiler de motocarros.   Está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de poder mejorar sus ingresos  y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias.
texts.en:
Rosa belongs to the communal bank "Mujeres de la Colina II" of the district of La Banda de Shilcayo, in the Province and Department of San Martin. She is single, 43 years old, and she has three children. Two of them have families of their own and the youngest is in high school.

She started out with a business selling fruits in the regional market but she abandoned it because it was not generating much profit. She decided to purchase a motorcycle transport vehicle with the help of a capital fund of S/.500 which helped her with the initial expense. This is an urban passenger transport vehicle. She is very happy because her profits help her to repay her loan.

With this loan of S/.1800 she will finance the purchase of another motorcycle transport which will help her to improve her income from its daily rental.

Rosa is a hardworking woman and her dream is to one day have a large business renting motorcycle transports. She is very thankful to the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for helping women like herself to have opportunities to improve their income and to improve the quality of life for their families.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle transport vehicle.

loans.name: Carolay

texts.es:
La señora Carolay es socia del banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 30 años, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.
Ella se dedica a la venta de madera, tiene un local cerca de su casa donde trabaja junto a su esposo,  son 3  años que lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela  Ramos y está creciendo  bastante, porque tiene varias personas trabajando en su negocio.
Con  su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 comprarà: 3 sierras circulares de diferentes medidas.
Tiene mucha tranquilidad porque está creciendo en su negocio y su familia goza de una buena economía, trabajar con su esposo, le da  tranquilidad porque sabe que va a cuidar sus intereses y el de su familia.
"Gracias a Manuela Ramos por brindarme la oportunidad de hacer crecer mi negocio y levantar mi autoestima, por hacerme saber que tambièn las mujeres pueden hacer grandes cosas".
texts.en:
Carolay is a member of the communal bank "El Arenal" of the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 30 years old, married, and she has 2 children. 

She sells timber. She has a store near her house where she works together with her husband. She have been accessing loans from Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for three years and their business is growing significantly, with many people employed by their business.

With her new loan of S/. 1000 she will purchase: 3 circular saws of different diameters. She feels a great sense of tranquility because she is growing with her business and her family enjoys a good economy. Working with her husband also brings her peace because she knows that he will look out for her best interests and those of her family.

"My thanks to Manuela Ramos for giving me the opportunity to make my business grow and to help me improve my self-esteem, as well as for letting me realize that women can achieve great things."

loans.use: to purchase circular saws.

loans.name: Mitsi

texts.es:
La Sra. Mitsi pertenece al Banco Comunal “Mujeres de la Colina II” del Distrito de La Banda de Shilcayo, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Es soltera, tiene  32  años y una bebe de dos añitos

Desde muy pequeña le gustaba confeccionar vestidos, es por ese motivo que estudió corte y confección, dedicándose desde entonces a la  confección de  ropas interiores, ropas de dormir  y ropas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños.

Con este crédito de S/. 2,000.00 comprarà telas de diferentes colores y diseños, hilos agujas, cintas,  elásticos para seguir confeccionando y atendiendo los pedidos  que tiene a diario. 
El sueño de Mitsi es contar con una empresa  de  alta costura bien implementado. Está agradecida con el  Movimiento Manuela Ramos por la ayuda que le brinda al  contribuir en el desarrollo de su negocio y su familia.
texts.en:
Mitsi belongs to the communal bank "Mujeres de Colina II" of the district of La Banda de Shilcayo, in the province and department of San Martin. She is single, 32 years old, and she has a 2-year old baby. 

Since she was very young she enjoyed making clothes. For this reason she studied fashion design and sewing, and since then she has dedicated herself to making undergarments, pajamas, and dress clothe for ladies, gentlemen, and children.

With this loan of S/. 2000 she will purchase fabrics of different colors and designs, threads, needles, tapes, and elastics to be able to keep producing and attending to orders which are received daily. Mitsi's dream is to have a well-established production company of haute couture. She is thankful to the Manuela Ramos Movement (Kiva Field Partner) for their help in the development of her business and of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics of different colors and designs, threads, needles, tapes, and elastics.

loans.name: María Antonieta

texts.es:
La Sra. María Antonieta pertenece al Banco Comunal “María Paz II” del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Es soltera y tiene 63 años.

Marìa Antonieta tiene un pequeño salón de belleza, el cual ha implementado con la venta de cosméticos con un capital de S / 350.00 nuevos soles, actividad que en la actualidad le da la oportunidad de generar sus propios ingresos y aportar así a la economía del hogar, y como mujer sentirse realizada.  

  Con este préstamo de S/. 800.00 comprará productos de belleza para su stock como, perfumes para damas y caballeros, cremas, polvos compactos, talcos,  tanto para adultos como para bebes, lápices labiales, esmaltes de uñas, para así brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes y satisfacer sus necesidades. 

María Antonieta es una mujer  soñadora, se siente muy contenta y quiere continuar trabajando para la realización de sus objetivos y está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Maria Antonieta belongs to the communal bank "Maria Paz II" of the district of Tarapoto, in the province and department of San Martin. She is single and she is 63 years old.

Maria Antonieta has a small beauty salon in which she has incorporated cosmetics sales. She has a capital fund of S/.350 nuevos soles. This business activity gives her the opportunity to generate her own income and to provide for the household economy, and to feel accomplished as a woman.

With this loan of S/.800 nuevos soles she will purchase beauty products for her inventory, such as perfumes for ladies and gentlemen, compacts, talcs for adults and for babies, lipsticks, and nail polish, to provide her clients with a better service and to satisfy their needs.

Maria Antonieta is a dreamer and she feels very happy and she wants to keep working to meet her objectives. She is very thankful with the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for helping women like herself to have opportunities to develop themselves in their field of work.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products including perfumes, skin lotions, compacts, talcs, etc.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana es socia del banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 42 años de edad y dos hijos 
Recién son 3 ciclos que esta perteneciendo al banco comunal, su negocio es el alquiler de cuartos (habitaciones), tiene una casa de 3 pisos la cual ha habilitado para prestar este servicio. 
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprarà 10 baldes de pintura, 2 rodillos, pintara la parte de debajo de su casa para dar mejor vista a los cuartos.
Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, todo el negocio está a su cargo y lo maneja adecuadamente, el dinero de los alquileres lo invierte en la construcción de otros ambientes para el alquiler.
Espera que Manuela Ramos le otorgue un monto más alto para poder invertir màs y asì hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the communal bank "El Arenal" in the district of Calleria, of the department of Ucayali. She is 42 years old and she has two children. She has been with her communal bank for 3 loan cycles and her business is renting rooms (bedrooms). She has a 3-story house which she has remodeled to provide this service. With her new loan of S/. 1000 nuevos soles she will purchase 10 buckets of paint and 2 paint rollers to paint the lower section of her house, to give the rooms a better appearance. 

Her husband is an agriculturist. Her business is entirely in her charge and she manages it adequately. The funds earned from the rentals are invested in the construction of other shelter for rent. She hopes that Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) will grant her a greater loan amount to be able to invest more and to make her business grow.

loans.use: to purchase paint.

loans.name: Yarita Piedad

texts.es:
La señora Yarita es socia del banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito De Calleria, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 25 años de edad, està casada y tiene un solo hijo.
Se dedica a la venta de pescado, negocio que tiene desde muy pequeña porque creció en medio de pescadores, su mamá y toda su familia se dedica a la pesca, su esposo se desempeña como soldador.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprarà: 2 sacos de pescado seco salado que lo compra por el rio para luego venderlo en los almacenes de la ciudad, no lo vende al menudeo.
Con este negocio ha podido comprar algunas cosas como: un televisor y DVD para que su hijo pueda ver sus dibujos animados que le encantan, de esa manera ayuda con los gastos de la casa.  Està muy contenta porque puede trabajar  con el dinero que Manuela Ramos le otorga en crèdito y de esa manera ha podido hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Yarita is a member of the communal bank "El Arenal" of the district of Calleria, of the department of Ucayali. She is 25 years old, married, and she has only one child. She sells fish, a business she has had since she was very young because she grew up among fishermen. Her mother and her entire family are dedicated to fishing. Her husband is a welder. With her new loan of S/.1700 nuevos soles she will purchase 2 sacks of dried and salted fish along the river for later resale to the grocery stores in the city. She does not sell retail. Through this business she has been able to purchase a few things such as, a television set and a DVD player for her son to watch the cartoons he likes so much. This is how she is able to help with the household expenses. She is very happy because she is able to work with the funds from Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) given to her through a loan and she has been able to make her business grow.

loans.use: to purchase fish in wholesale.

loans.name: Lily Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Lily es socia del banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito Yarinacocha, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 37 años de edad, està casada y tiene cinco hijas.
Ya son varios años que está integrando al banco comunal de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta de ropa, mercadería que la trae de la ciudad de Lima, viaja periódicamente para hacer sus comprar y ver a su hija que está preparándose para ingresar a la universidad de San Marcos de Lima.
Su hija es la que le ayuda con sus compras cuando no puede viajar, se da un tiempo para enviar los pedidos que su mamá le hace.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,400.00 nuevos soles comprarà: 12 blusas tipo top, 12 pantalonetas, 6 pantalones, 12 blusas, 6 vestidos para casa, 6 pares de zapato, 6 carteras.
La mercadería que trae es la mayor parte pedidos que le hacen sus colegas de trabajo y les da facilidades para pagar (crèdito).  Està feliz porque gracias a los prèstamos de Manuela Ramos puede trabajar y generar sus propios ingresos.  

En la foto la vemos junto a una de sus hijas.
texts.en:
Lily is a member of the communal bank "El Arenal" of the district of Yarinacocha, of the department of Ucayali. She is 37 years old, married, and she has five daughters.

She has been a member of her communal bank with Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for many years and she is a clothing merchant. She brings her merchandise from Lima, traveling periodically to make her purchases and to visit her daughter who is getting ready to attend the University de San Marcos, in Lima. her daughter is who helps her with her purchase when she cannot travel. She takes the time to ship the orders requested by her mother.

With her new loan of S/.2400 nuevos soles she will purchase: 12 tops, 12 shorts, 6 pants, 12 blouses, 6 house-dresses, 6 pairs of shoes, and 6 hand bags. The merchandise which she acquires is in large part to fill orders placed by her work colleagues. She gives them payment options (credit). She is happy because thanks to the loans from Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) she is able to work and to generate her own income.

In the photo we can see her with one of her daughters.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale.

loans.name: Lucy Ines

texts.es:
La señora Lucy es socia del banco comunal El Arenal del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos.
Los 15 años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos le ha servido para poder contar con el capitalnecesario para atender algunos pedidos de costura, la señora Lucy confecciona blusas, sabanas, manteles, toallas... todo lo que sea costura, es un oficio que le encanta y lo hace con mucho gusto.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprarà: 10 metros de tela, hilos para bordado, agujas punta roma, 5 metros de tela cañamazo para el bordado en punto cruz.
Le encanta su trabajo, de esa manera también se distrae, por las tardes tiene la compañía de su nieto con el cual pasa buenos momentos.
Seguirá trabajando con Manuela Ramos porque es como su otra familia, amistades encontradas que están durando muchos años juntas
texts.en:
Lucy is a member of the "El Arenal" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 57 years old, married, and has three children.

Lucy has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for 15 years and they have provided her with the capital she has needed to fill some of her sewing orders.  Lucy makes blouses, sheets, tablecloths and towels... everything sewing related.  It is a job that she loves and she does it very happily.

Lucy will use this new loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles to buy 10 meters of fabric, embroidery threads, needles and 5 meters of embroidery canvas for doing cross stitch work.

Lucy loves her work and she enjoys doing it.  In the afternoons, she has the company of her grandson and they spend some good moments together.

Lucy will continue working with Manuela Ramos because it is like her other family.  She has made friendships which have lasted many years.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Bertha Aurora

texts.es:
La Sra. Bertha pertenece al Banco Comunal “Mujeres de la Colina II” del Distrito de La Banda de Shilcayo, Provincia de San Martin, Departamento de San Martín. Es soltera, tiene 36  años y tiene tres hijos que estudian  y están en el  nivel secundario.  

Por iniciativa propia se inició con  un capital de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles en la venta de ropas de primera y segunda mano, para damas caballeros, niños, negocio implementado en su propia casa, llegando a tener  rápidamente  una muy  buena clientela. Este negocio le da muy buenas ganancias y le brinda muchas satisfacciones.

Con este préstamo de S/ 2200.00, comprará  vestidos, blusas, pantalones, polos, faldas de diferentes tallas y modelos  para brindar una  buena atención a sus clientes. 

La Sra. Bertha Aurora  es una mujer trabajadora y entusiasta,  su sueño es tener una boutique. Está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Bertha is a member of the “Mujeres de la Colina II” community bank which is located in La Banda de Shilcayo district, in San Martín province, in San Martín department.  She is 36 years old, single, and has three children who are in high school.

Through her own initiative, Bertha started out with 300 Peruvian soles in capital and started a business selling new and used clothes for men, women and children.  She set up her business in her home and soon had a very good customer base.  The business makes her very good profits and brings her a lot of satisfaction.

Bertha will use this loan for 2,200 Peruvian soles to buy dresses, blouses, pants, tops and skirts in different sizes and styles so that she can provide a good service to her customers.

Bertha Aurora is a hard-working and enthusiastic woman.  Her dream is to own a boutique.  She is very grateful to Movimiento Manuela Ramos for helping women such as herself to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy dresses, blouses, pants, tops and skirts

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Mariam is a 53-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan, who owns a dairy products retail store. Mariam is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to purchase the equipment necessary to fulfill her dream of expanding her business and increasing her sales.

loans.use: to purchase equipment necessary to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to perform maintenance on his shop and expand his project.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: El señor Marco es cliente nuevo de emprender, es su  primera secuencia de crédito individual,  El cliente   es transportista propietario y trabaja con su movilidad de manera particular por el alto y zona central de la ciudad de La Paz, con el dinero del crédito realizara Cambio de caja de automático  a  mecánico para su movilidad, El cliente vive  en  anticrético por la zona Munaytapa  es casado con Sra. María y tiene dos hijos que están estudiando en primaria el Sr.  Marco trabaja mucho y de esta manera salir adelante económicamente estar mejor por el bienestar de sus hijos y de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de toda su familia esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Marco has been undertaken as a new member and subsequently this is his first individual loan.  This member is a self-employed transportation provider and works with his mobility in particular fashion navigating the altitudes and central area of La Paz.  With the money from the loan he will replace the automatic gear box to a manual for mobility.  The member lives on a contract-to-rent in the Munaytapa area, he is married to Maria and they have two children who are in elementary.  Marco works hard, this way he can get ahead economically and look after the well being of his two kids and improve the quality of life for his whole family.  He is thankful to the institution for the help presented to him.

loans.use: to change gear box from automatic to manual for mobility

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es: El sr. Ramiro esta casado tiene dos hijos pequeños, vive en su casa propia se encuentra en la zona de Pucarita, una zona muy alejada del centro de la ciudad ellos se encuentran muy felices a pesar de la distancia que se encuentra su casa,  el préstamo lo invertirán en la reparación de su casa  la fachada, piso y otras arreglos que le falta a su casa, ya que el sr. Desea brindar comodidad a su familia, u deseo del Sr. Ramiro es el ver su casita terminada y ver en un futuro ver a sus hijos profesionales, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Ramiro is married and has two young children.  He lives in his own home which is located in Pucarita.  This area is a very long way from the city center.  He and his family are very happy in spite of how far away their house is.  Ramiro will invest his loan in making some repairs to his home, its exterior and the floor.  He will also carry out some other work that needs to be done so that he can make his family comfortable.

Ramiro's wish is to see his small house finished and, in the future, to see his children become professionals.  He is a very hard-working person and is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered him.

loans.use: to make some repairs to his home

loans.name: Vitalia

texts.es: La señora Vitalia vive la colonia San Carlos, de la localidad de el Torno,  es nacida en valle grande Santa Cruz, su actividad principal es la venta de comida en su propio domicilio, hace unos siete meses que se dedica a esta labor, Convive con el señor Almaquio se dedica a la agricultura en Warnes, tienen tres hijos en edad escolar; el destino del crédito es para comprar un horno para  implementar el negocio de panadería, se sienten agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le a brindado.
texts.en:
Vitalia lives in the village of San Carlos, in the township of El Torno. She was born in the valley of Santa Cruz. Her business is the sale of food from her own home. She has been in this line of business for about seven months. She lives with Almaquio, who works in agriculture in Warnes. They have three school-age children. 

The loan is to buy an oven to start a bakery business. They are very grateful to the organisation for the support received.

loans.use: to buy an oven.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es: El Sr Ronald esta casado con la  Sra. Jovana se dedica a la actividad de venta de ropa usada desde hace tres años de feria en feria y son asociados con puesto propio,  Tienen una hija de ocho años que se encuentran en edad escolar, la pareja viven  en casa de los padres de Don Ronald.  Don Ronald tiene un pequeño taller de costura en su domicilio donde reacondiciona la ropa usada y las vende mas cara que su competencia con el dinero del crédito comprara una maquina de coser para realizar estos arreglos a las ropa y la Sra. Jovana vende también simultáneamente  a la venta de refresco de mocohinchi (durazno seco) y el somó(refresco de maíz)  y ambos salen a vender juntos en las ferias, el Sr. Ronald es una persona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado. En la foto el Sr. Ronald esta con su esposa la Sra.Jovana.
texts.en:
Ronald is married to Jovana. His business is selling used clothing. He has done it for the last three years, going from fair  to fair. They work as partners and have their own stall. They have an eight year old daughter who is of school age. The couple lives with Ronald's parents. Ronald has a small sewing workshop in his home, where he mends used clothing and sells them at a higher price than his competition. 

With the money from the loan he will buy a sewing machine to make these alterations. Jovana also sells mocohinchi (drink made with dried apricots) and somo (corn drink). They both sell together at fairs. Ronald is a very hard workign person, very grateful to the organisation for the support received. The picture shows Ronald with his wife Jovana.

loans.use: to buy a 5-thread industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La Señora Lourdes es socia antigua de nuestra Institución y a demostrado ser puntual y responsable con sus créditos, ella es casada y tiene 3 hijas que se encuentran en edad escolar, dos de ellas se encuentran en la Universidad Estatal y el menor tiene 4 años y todos dependen de ella, sin embargo su esposo le ayuda con los gastos familiares y otros gastos  ya que el trabaja en la en la universidad en el sector de archivos, sin embargo ella tiene un almacén en su propio domicilio y es el único de su zona y solicitó el crédito para aumentar su capital y para la compra de más estantes para mostrar y guardar su mercaderia.
texts.en:
Lourdes has been a member of the organisation for a long while, and she has proven to be responsible and on time with her loans. She is married and has three daughters who are of school age. Two of them study at the State University and the youngest one is 4 years old. They all are dependant on her. However, her husband helps her with household expenses and other costs as he works in the archive department at the University. 

She owns a grocery store which is located in her home. She is requesting a loan to raise capital  and buy more shelves to display and store her goods.

loans.use: to raise capital  and buy more shelves to display and store her goods.

loans.name: Laura Lizbeth

texts.es: La señora Laura es propietaria de una microempresa de servicios de radio móvil trabaja con 45 móviles a su cargo, trabaja hace cuatro años en el mercado  es separada de su esposo, tiene 2 hijos varones de 5 y 7 años, ella sola mantiene el hogar,  la señora Laura. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de una línea telefónica  por que sus clientes indican que su línea telefónica en horas pico se congestiona, y con otra línea telefónica de este modo poder brindar mejor servicio a sus clientes, es un apersona joven y trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Laura owns a small mobile radio service business. She works with 45 mobile phones. She has been in the market for 4 years. She is separated from her husband and has two sons aged 5 and 7. Laura is responsible for all household expenses. 

She will invest the money in the purchase of a phone line, because her customers say that her phone line gets congested during peak hours. With the additional phone line she expects to be able to provide a better service to her customers. She is a young and hard working person, very grateful to the organisation for the support received.

loans.use: to buy a phone line.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: El señor Joel vive en su terreno ubicado en la urb. La fortaleza de la localidad de el Torno,  es nacido en Cotagaita de potosí, un valle hermoso,  es de ocupación moto taxista, trabaja en el torno, hace unos siete meses se dedica a esta labor aunque es nuevo en esta actividad le va muy bien tiene buenos ingresos, el destino del crédito es para comprar una moto nueva para trabajarla y así generarle otros ingresos, se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le a brindado.
texts.en:
Joel lives in his farm, located in the hamlet of La Fortaleza in the township of El Torno. He was born in Cotagaita de Potosi, a beautiful valley. He works as a motorcycle taxi driver. He works on the wheel. He has done it for about seven months, and although he is new to the business things are going well and he has a good income. 

He will use the loan to buy a new motorbike to use in his business and get more revenue. He is grateful to the organisation for the support received.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Limber

texts.es: El señor Limber vive en la zona los lotes, es nacido en florida Santa Cruz, es de ocupación albañil, en la ciudad, hace unos dos años que se dedica a esta labor, su esposa se dedica a la venta de comida, no tienen hijos; el destino del crédito es para tramitar sus papeles de 50 hectáreas ubicadas en San Pablo- Trinidad, y después poder sembrar cítricos, se sienten agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le a brindado.
texts.en: Limber lives in an area divided into lots. He was born in Florida, Santa Cruz. He is a bricklayer in the city. He has been doing this for two years. His wife sells food and they have no children. The loan will be used to process the documents on 75 acres located in San Pablo- Trinidad to be able to later plant citrus trees. He is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered.

loans.use: to process the documents for a parcel of land.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: El señor Dionicio vive en el barrio Paraíso a una de la localidad de el  torno,  es nacido en Nor-cinti de Chuquisaca, es de ocupación moto taxista, trabaja en el torno, hace unos diez meses se dedica a esta labor ya que le brinda buenos ingresos, el destino del crédito es para comprar una moto nueva para trabajarla y así generarle otros ingresos, se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le a brindado.
texts.en: Dionicio lives in the Paraíso neighborhood in the community of El Torno. He was born in Nor-cinti de Chuquisaca. He is a motorcycle taxi driver. He works in shifts. He has been doing this work for ten months, since it gives him good income. The loan will be used to buy a new motorcycle to work it and generate more income. He is grateful to the institution for the support it has offered.

loans.use: to buy a motorcyle.

loans.name: Mujeres Progresistas (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Mujeres Progresistas esta formado por 6 mujeres y 2 hombres, quienes son amables y muy trabajadores, laboran en diferentes actividades las  mismas que les permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida por la belleza de sus ríos y su naturaleza, las costumbres y traiciones de su gente y su  variada  gastronomía.

La Señora. Marcia vive por el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca. Este es el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una amiga quien es socia del mismo.

Nuestra socia tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 19, 17, 15 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo es discapacitado y sus dos hijos siguientes estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora en una compañía privada, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Marcia se dedica a la decoración de locales para todo tipo de evento social, esta actividad la realiza hace 3 años y aprendió este oficio por habilidad. También  tiene el negocio de Internet y cabinas telefónicas, trabaja en su local de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.

El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de accesorios para su local como: mouse, teclados, tinta de impresoras, etc.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.

La foto pequeña adjunta es de uno de los socios que por su trabajo no pudo estar presente cuando fue tomada la fotografía del grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank Mujeres Progresistas (Progressive Women) consists of 6 women and 2 men, who are kind and very hard-working. They work in different activities that permit them to support their households and help their families advance. They live in different parts of the city of Cuenca. This city is knows for the beauty of its rivers and its natural surroundings, its customs and traditions of its people, and its gastronomic variety.

Señora Marcia lives in the center of the city of Cuenca. This is the fourth loan that she has obtained through the communal bank, to which she was invited by a friend who is a member of the bank. She is 42 years old, is married, and has children who are 19, 17, 15, and 2 years old. Her oldest son is disabled, and the next two children study at a city high school. Her husband is a professional driver and works for a private company. They do not have their own house, so they rent.

Doña Marcia's work is decorating sites for all types of social events. She has been doing this for 3 years, and she learned to do it using her own talent. She also has an internet and telephone booth business. She works there every day without a fixed schedule. She is going to invest her loan in the purchase of accessories for her business site such as a mouse, keyboards, printer ink, etc. Her dream is for her family to have their own house.

The little photo attached in the corner is one of the members who, because of his work, was not able to be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy keyboards, a mouse, printer ink, etc.

loans.name: Ana Asuncion

texts.es:
En San Ignacio de la  parroquia Colon de la ciudad de Portoviejo cada quince días se reúnen los socios del Banco Comunal San Ignacio De Colon. Lugar conocido por su gente trabajadora y dedicada a la agricultura y la ganadería.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Ana, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 12, 10 y 8 años  de edad, la mayor estudia en colegio y los dos menores en escuela. Su esposo es chofer y comerciante.

Ella es una muy buena ama de casa que además de cuidar su hogar y sus pequeños hijos, también se dedica a la venta de toldos y sabanas, su forma de venta es por turnos, ella entrega y cobra por semanas. También en las tardes prepara y vende empanadas de verde, para lo cual ella instala un pequeño local en las afueras de su casa. Trabaja todos los días en ambas cosas. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil una vez al mes. Tiene cinco  años  que se dedica a estas actividades y le va muy bien.

Ella necesita este crédito para comprar víveres para preparar sus deliciosas empanadas, toldos y sabanas. Está en el Banco comunal desde hace cinco ciclos y le gusta porque los intereses son bajos.
 
Sus sueños son tener un gran local o un restaurante.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the members of the San Ignacio de Colón Communal Bank meet in San Ignacio, parish of Colón, city of Portoviejo.  It’s a place known for its people who work hard, in farming and livestock.

This is where we met Ana, who is 34 years old, married, and has three children, 12, 10, and 8 years old.  The oldest is in high school, and the two younger children are in lower school.  Her husband is a driver and merchant.

She is a good housewife who, in addition to taking care of her home and her small children, sells awnings and sheets.  She sells in shifts, delivering and collecting weekly.  In the afternoon, she also prepares and sells green empanadas (made from green plantain dough), for which she sets up a small stand outside her home.  She does both things every day.  Monthly, she goes to Guayaquil to buy her merchandise.  She has been working this way for five years, and things are going very well for her.

She needs this loan to buy foodstuffs to prepare her delicious empanadas, and for awnings and sheets.  She has been in this communal bank for five cycles, and likes it because interest is low.

Her dream is to have larger premises or a restaurant.

loans.use: buy awnings, sheets, and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Hule (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Hule se reúne cada quince días en el cantón Junín, este lugar se lo conoce por su gente amable y trabajadora y porque en este lugar se destila el mejor aguardiente de la provincia y  del Ecuador.
Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal, que les sirve de mucho ya que con los créditos ellos mejoran sus pequeños negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Magaly, tiene 49 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene seis  hijos, cinco de ellos ya son mayores de edad y la menor que tiene 12 años y estudia en escuela, los dos hijos menores aun viven en su casa. Este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque en otros lugares los intereses son más altos.

Ella tiene un pequeño restaurante en su casa en el cual prepara deliciosos platos, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 14h00, ya que solo prepara desayunos y almuerzos, sus hijos le ayudan en su trabajo. También vende ropa de todo tipo, vende en su restaurant y a veces sale a ofrecer sus productos de casa en casa. Tiene 15 años que se dedica a estas actividades y le ha ido bastante  bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear una parte para comprar víveres para preparar sus deliciosos platos como arroz, papas, carne, pescado, etc. Y tambien va a comprar pantalones, blusas,camisetas y ropa de niños para la venta. 
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en el banco y obtener los beneficios que este brinda.
texts.en:
The Hule Communal Bank meets every two weeks in Junín canton, a place known for its friendly, hard-working people, and because this is where the best aguardiente (strong alcoholic beverage specific to the region) in the province and in Ecuador is distilled.  This is a group of people who decided to come together to form this communal bank, which is very useful to them, since they improve their small businesses with the loans.  They work in various activities, such as commerce, services, sale of food, among others.

This is where we met Magaly, who is 49 years old.  She lives in a common law marriage from which she has six children.  Five of them are grown, and the youngest is 12 years old and studying in school.  The two youngest children still live at home.  This is her first cycle with the communal bank, and she likes it because in other places, interests are higher.

She has a small restaurant in her home, where she prepares tasty dishes.  She works daily from 6 a.m. until 2 p.m., preparing only breakfasts and lunches.  Her children help her with the work.  She also sells all types of clothing, selling in her restaurant and sometimes she offers her products door to door.  She has been doing this for 15 years, and things have gone quite well for her.

She plans to use this loan to buy foodstuffs to prepare her tasty dishes, such as rice, potatoes, meat, fish, etc. She will also buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children’s clothing.

Her goals are to continue with the bank, and take advantages of the benefits offered by it.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, meat, fish, vegetables, and other foodstuffs.

loans.name: Seap

texts.en:
Seap, 32, is a garment worker. Her husband, 35, sells sugar cane juice. The couple has been married since 1999 and has two children--one son and one daughter. They live along National Road two, approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Seap is asking for a loan of $500 to build a restroom for her family's use.

Photo: Seap and her husband.

loans.use: To build a restroom for family use.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap and her husband, Sophal, are fish sellers. In addition, Sopheap’s husband has started supplementing their income with a new business raising pigs. 

The couple has been married since 1990 and has two sons who are in school. They live on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. 

Sopheap is asking for a loan of $200 to help with her husband’s pig farming by buying feed for his pigs.

loans.use: To help with her husband’s pig farming by buying feed for his pigs.

loans.name: Saroeun

texts.en:
Saroeun and her husband are farmers. In addition, Saroeun’s husband also builds wooden houses. The couple has been married since 1999 and has four sons. Three are in school and another one is still young. The family lives in a village across the Mekong River and about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Saroeun is asking for a loan of $600 to purchase a motorized hand tiller.

Photo: Saroeun is standing next to the motorized hand tiller which she wanted to buy, but she does not yet have the money to purchase it. She has asked for the loan to pay for purchasing.

loans.use: To purchase a motorized hand tiller.

loans.name: Rida

texts.en:
Rida sells finished silk fabric. She buys it from the weavers in her village and transports it to sell at different places far away from her home. Her husband, Phally, has full-time employment in Phnom Penh City. They live on an island on the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. They have 3 young children, two sons and one daughter. 

Rida is asking for a loan of $1000 to renovate the house where she lives.

loans.use: To renovate the house where she lives.

loans.name: Chanroeun

texts.en:
Chanroeun and her husband are weavers. They have been married since 1993 and have two children--one son and one daughter. Both are in school. The family lives on an island of the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Chanroeun is asking for a loan of $400 to purchase weaving materials for her weaving business.

Photo: Chanroeun is weaving.

loans.use: To purchase weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.name: Sochan

texts.en:
